Estimated delivery: February 2019

Stretch goals.

As a part of our stretch goals, we are developing an amazing lamp base, that will open new horizons for Omnio Lamp. We are also working on adapters for softboxes complaint with Elinchrom and Bowens standards.

Where are we in the process.

What we need & what you get.

This is our 2nd Indiegogo project. We've launched, manufactured and shipped Poze on time, as promised, so it is safe to say we've got some experience with the whole process and fulfillment.

As we said before, we have it. Omnio Lamp is designed, built, tested and approved. We've also successfully completed the test production run, applied for an EU Declaration of Conformity and we are ready to start production. We managed to organize a whole production process at our own production facility. In order to perform our test production run, last year we ordered molds for pressing all our custom shaped aluminum profiles. Plastic housing molds will be ordered before the end of the campaign. Electronic component suppliers are secured and all other preparations are done which means we can fully comply with perk numbers we are offering and commit to shipment dates we have listed.

As in any serial production, the final product price is a matter of production volumes. We did everything we could do with our team. Now, we need your help to scale production and reduce costs of electronic components and plates assembly, production of aluminum and plastic parts and final assembling. 

We are confident and proud to present Omnio Lamp to you - this amazing community and invite you to back us and help put this fabulous instrument on the track for bright future. Check our awesome perks, share it with your circle of people who would benefit from having an entire studio in one single lamp, or have an eye for great design. If you have any questions or comments, do not hesitate to contact us, we'll be happy to answer. Every action counts!
 

1. PRE-ORDER one or more Omnio Lamps

2. GIVE  Omnio Lamp to someone special- you will give them an entire studio, not just a lamp!

3. SHARE the story with your friends, relatives, favorite blogs and cool people like you.

4. FOLLOW & SPREAD the word!  @omnioLamp

SPREAD THE WORD!

Use the Indiegogo SHARE tools on top of the page 
to help us spread the word!

 

Thank you.

Sincerely,

Branimir & The Omnio Lamp team

FAQ.

1. SHIPPING, general information

We are shipping from European Union. When ordering goods from abroad, VAT, customs/duty and other fees are paid by the importer (you) according to local rules for each country. Please check all the details with your local authorities.

 INFORMATION FOR EUROPEAN BACKERS ONLY

As we all know, when ordering goods from abroad, VAT, customs duty and other fees have
to be paid by the importer(you) according to local rules for each country. Your lamp will be shipped from Estonia, a member of EU. That means you will not have pay for customs duty and VAT as when receiving goods from abroad, because we have already covered it during a process of production. However, our special low prices that we are offering to you as early adopters, does not give us a possibility to cover these taxes ourselves. We have to ask you to cover them. The simplest way to do it was to add that amount to the shipping fee. So, you will find a $195 price for shipping (for standard Omnio Lamp that costs $590) instead of $60 (for shipping only).

In other words, if your lamp were arriving to you from out of EU, we could avoid duty and VAT, but than you would have to pay: $60 for shipping + $30 for customs duty + $135 for VAT. Total= $225
This way you save $30 and a hassle of filling several forms. 

2. DOES OMNIO LAMP COME WITH RECHARGEABLE BATTERIES?

Omnio Lamp comes with battery block (smart housing for rechargeable batteries), and without rechargeable batteries. You can choose witch rechargeables to use.

3.  WHAT RECHARGEABLES SHOULD I USE?

Omnio Lamp is a high-performance lamp, so high-performance batteries are recommended. It operates from 9xAA NIMH batteries. For best results use professional quality ones like ENELOOP 2500mA.  For home or not extensive use, any NIMH 2500-2700mA (GP, IKEA, etc) will do, but better is always better. DO NOT USE ALKALINE BATTERIES.

4. WHAT IS YOUR REFUND POLICY?

Once our project is complete, we are not able to offer refunds in accordance with Indiegogo policy. When the campaign ends, your pledges got to immediate use to ensure that funds are used as stated. 

5.  WHAT IS THE BATTERY LIFE?

With high-performance batteries, Omnio Lamp will run around 60 minutes with all 4 arms turned on at 100% brightness, or up to 4 hours with 1 arm turned on at 100% brightness.

6. WILL I BE CHARGED VAT/duties? INFORMATION FOR NON-EUROPEAN COUNTRIES

Unfortunately, we don't have a way to verify tax/VAT obligations on pledges so any applicable duties/VAT are the sole responsibility of the backer. If you would like to check whether or not you will be charged duties/VAT at the time of receiving your reward, please contact your local post office.

7. WHEN WILL I RECEIVE OMNIO LAMP?

This is our second campaign and we are confident in our own production facility and suppliers, but short delays can always appear. Some machine can break or components can be stuck on customs for a week or two. No matter that Omnio Lamp is a complex product, our test production run was performed flawlessly. We'll keep you informed about progress with full transparency.

We are using one of the world's best international shipping carriers that provide door-to-door delivery with full tracking.  It usually takes them from 3 to 10 days for delivery anywhere.

You can expect to get your lamp during a month specified in the perk.
story_txt:
An experienced Indiegogo team is back!This time we proudly present you OMNIO LAMP.


Originally conceived as a portrait and item photography lamp, Omnio Lamp turned into the most versatile lighting instrument ever.
Like no other lamp, Omnio Lamp has 4 pivoting arms, built-in barn doors, 264 finest LEDs providing a staggering 4200 Lumens of professional, flicker-free light, and a CRI 98.9 for skin tones. It gives light from 4 different sides at the same time. A programmable and intuitive 12 button display enables accurate control of brightness and color temperature with ease. The lamp is portable, maneuverable and adaptable with standard tripods, holders and hooks. 
In other words: Omnio Lamp is an entire professional studio in your hands giving you endless lighting possibilities exactly where and how you need it.
 




Talking about us



4 pivoting arms with built-in LEDs.

FOUR pivoting arms give SOFT light from FOUR DIFFERENT sides. With 264 built-in LEDs totaling 4200 Lumens of lights, there are no more technical restrains.

Built-in barn doors.

Built-in barn doors open to full 120 degrees angle. When inverted, each arm gives 2 rays of light in opposite directions: one direct and sharp and the other-reflected and very diffused.

Rotating arms for endless possibilities.

Choose between wide beam light when open or thin and precise when nearly closed. 
 


Premium flicker free light.
 

With broad color temperature and accurate brightness control, you get premium flicker-free light at any brightness level, shutter speed or frame rate.

Tungsten to daylight.

From tungsten to daylight: 2700K fixed, in a range from 3150-5700K adjustable with a step of 25, and fixed 6300K( Kelvin). Brightness control 0-100 with a step of 1 (with fast forward). Accurate color temperature through the entire dimming range. 

Mighty CRI: Only sun gives better light.

Omnio Lamp has median Color Rendering Index (CRI) > 95 and CRI 98,9 for skin tones. Only sun gives better light. Just think about all the possibilities!

Paint with light AND shadows.

Change mood in a split second. Shape light with ease and precision by simply twisting your palm or pressing one button.




SPREAD THE WORD!

Use the Indiegogo SHARE tools on top of the page to help us spread word!


Programmable Intuitive Display Control.

An Intuitive, smart and programmable 12 button display is your new game field and a true game changer. Adjust brightness and color temperature to your liking. When you find your favorite light setup, save it in on the home button (press & hold for 3 seconds). Need different light? Go ahead make changes in brightness and color temperature, turn/off separate arms, you can always get back to last saved setup by a short click. Want to save new setup instead of old one? Press & hold for 3 seconds again. Your new set up is now saved.
 


Standard 1/4'' Mounting Socket.

Standard 1/4'' - 20 mounting socket enables you to place or mount a lamp directly onto standard light stands, tripods or arms. Socket is also used to attach accessories like batteries, extended 5th arm, hooks, handles and more.


 

DC adapter. Rechargeable battery block. Or BOTH.

Omnio Lamp operates from DC adapter, a rechargeable battery block, or both. Rechargeable battery block consists of our battery housing and 9xAA NIMH batteries of your choice. You don't need to take batteries out of housing to charge them. You can plug in battery block into the lamp while it is connected to an adapter.

Lamp will be operating from adapter via battery block, and batteries will be charging at the same time. Like a laptop, you can unplug lamp with battery from adapter at any time and go. If there is no need for battery block, you can plug the adapter directly into the lamp. And, of course, you can always charge battery block separately from the lamp by plugging to adapter directly.   
• Adapter input: 100-240VAC, 50/60Hz 1,4-0.7A
• Output: 15V 4A, 60W
• Optional car 12V socket cable
• Power socket standard 2.1x5.5mm
 



PORTABLE.

Lightweight and foldable Omnio Lamp stands anywhere. Fold the lamp with one hand and you are ready to go!

Made to last & impress.
Rigid metal housing. Industrial-grade plastics. Anodized aluminum hands. Stainless steel for the strength of pivoting parts and joints. Lightweight bamboo. Custom electronic systems. All made for optimal performance and great style.
 

Embraced with adapter(s).

The light is soft, almost without shadows, but in case you still need a softbox, we’ve prepared adapters for Elinchrom and Bowens standards.


Use special effects for any scenario you might have. All programs are controlled by speed (frequency), brightness and color temperature. Use filters to add different colors or to make light beam even bigger.

 



Enlighten anything you're working on.

 Intelligent and beautiful, powerful and unexpected Omnio Lamp has no limits.  For anything requiring light, Omnio Lamp will provide the perfect setting: Interview, photo of video shoot, Advanced portrait photography, object shoot (great for e-commerce), reading and working, outdoor filming or beautiful decor.


The unlimited possibilities of Omnio Lamp

Use Omnio Lamp anywhere: professional filming, photo &video production, range of home and office tasks. Use it as a filming or commercial lamp, table or floor lamp or decor.

Omnio Lamp is made for all of us who love professional yet practical products; who want versatility without sacrificing quality.

story:
Last chance to pre-order in advance of shipping and save up to 33% off the future retail price.

中文介紹 中文教學 日本語版



YoCam is the smartest, lightest, and affordable all-in-one digital camera.












It's time to ditch your GoPro, DropCam, NestCam, dash cams, selfie cameras, and other life-logging cameras because the YoCam does it all and does it the best.






Designed and engineered to be the last line of cameras you'll ever need.

It's light weight, powerful, versatile, waterproof & most importantly - affordable.

YoCam weighs only 2 ounces (~ 55 grams) without sacrificing any functionality.






Designed to be versatile,  YoCam can do it.




With an IP68 rating, YoCam is waterproof up to 20 foot deep without an additional housing unit.


Whether you're capturing summer moments splashing in the sun or you accidentally drop YoCam into your pool - you can rest assured knowing its safe.





One of the best features of YoCam is its ability to remain stable in unstable environments. Using MoSteady™ stabilization technology, HDR and a P2P remote internet connection, you can see the YoCam difference for yourself: 





Designed to be a user-friendly as possible, you can easily take selfies with the click of an easy-to-reach button. Forget DSLRs and smartphone cameras - YoCam has a 140° super-wide angle, fixed focus lens for optimal group shots.





With the Mofily smartphone app, you can edit your YoCam photos and videos without ever touching a laptop or desktop PC. Generations of memories can be captured, edited, and published in just minutes. 



GoPros give you the fisheye and SLRs give you extra weight (for those cards, battery packs, chargers, cables, covers, etc.) - but with YoCam, you just GO!


By using the Life-Log preset mode, you can simply press and hold the shutter for 2 seconds and YoCam will automatically capture a frame every few seconds - documenting your hike, swim, or journey while you focus on what matters most.



"Good things come in small packages" and the same goes for YoCam. 

Even at its small and portable form factor it contains a powerful camera system that can record 2.7K HD footage at 30 frames per second. 

Featuring burst shots, delayed shots, slow motion and time lapses - YoCam was designed to accompany you on all of your adventures. 

Set it and forget it, so you can remember it later. 




 

In an effort to keep your digital life as simple as possible, we're introducing the One-Click Photo Book that works in tandem with our Mofily app. 

Simply pick a collection of photos taken with your YoCam, press the One-Click Photo Book option, and a customized hard-copy photo book will be delivered directly to your front door.




Whether you're outdoor adventurer or an indoor pioneer, YoCam lets you easily share your moments with loved ones and to stay connected. 

Check in your baby from thousands of miles away or send a quick hello to grandma with YoCam!







Use YoCam to record every mile of your drive and to have an extra 'eye' on the road. Access video mode, press and hold the shutter for 2 seconds, and YoCam will start recording 5 to 10 minutes worth of looping footage. 

Insurance agents will love you!






YoCam is powerful on its own, but additional accessories can aid in expanding versatility and the possibilities of your imagination. 

Here are just a few:


Remotely operate your YoCam with ease through our dedicated Bluetooth Remote.



Wear YoCam around your neck and keep the lightweight camera a click away.



The lightest way to transport YoCam, the clip mount attaches to any pocket or belt.



The smallest YoCam accessory has the most versatility by making YoCam instantly compatible with just about every action camera accessory on the market.



Tough, durable, and with a 360° swiveling head, our clamp mount can be used for pockets, backpacks, harnesses, purses, and any durable fabric.

Perfect for mounting your YoCam on any solid surface, the 3-in-1 Magnetic Stand for desks, tables, walls, and other flat areas. 
Mount YoCam(s) high on a wall and create your own security system. 



Thanks to WoCase, a camera accessories brand based in the US (and one of our collaborators), AnyBar will be fully compatible with YoCam by making YoCam mountable on any bar, pole, or video stick so you can get every angle possible.



Not just for Uber and Lyft drivers - the YoCam Suction Cup allows anyone to mount their YoCam onto their windshield or glass surface so you can always ride in HD. 




Whether you're in the pool, kayaking down a river, or surfing a killer break, the FloYo wrist strap keeps YoCam with you at all times. Capture your snorkeling with ease!



You didn't really think we'd forget about your best friend did you? With Rover, you can comfortably mount YoCam onto any collar-friendly pet and capture their view.











Built-in 700 mAh rechargeable Lithium ion battery that provides continuous recording at 1080p, 30fps, for 2 hours (with WiFi off). The continuous recording time is estimated based on shooting with a fully-charged battery. 
Actual performance may vary based on other advanced settings, temperature, humidity, and other factors that affect camera performance. Battery capacity may gradually decrease with time. 






CLICK HERE TO SHOP YOCAM ACCESSORIES







YoCam is shipping soon.

Thanks to WoCase, a camera accessories brand based in the US (and one of our collaborators), AnyBar will be fully compatible with YoCam by making YoCam mountable on any bar, pole, or video stick so you can get every angle possible.




Not just for Uber and Lyft drivers - the YoCam Suction Cup allows anyone to mount their YoCam onto their windshield or glass surface so you can always ride in HD. 





Whether you're in the pool, kayaking down a river, or surfing a killer break, the FloYo wrist strap keeps YoCam with you at all times. Capture your snorkeling with ease!





You didn't really think we'd forget about your best friend did you? With Rover, you can comfortably mount YoCam onto any collar-friendly pet and capture their view.
























Built-in 700 mAh rechargeable Lithium ion battery that provides continuous recording at 1080p, 30fps, for 2 hours (with WiFi off). The continuous recording time is estimated based on shooting with a fully-charged battery. 
Actual performance may vary based on other advanced settings, temperature, humidity, and other factors that affect camera performance. Battery capacity may gradually decrease with time. 















CLICK HERE TO SHOP YOCAM ACCESSORIES













YoCam is shipping soon.

story:
Dear. BackerLand members! Please contact us before contributing :)

 

 

"What happens if there's an action cam
based on Android OS?"

ㅡ

That's the initial idea where our long journey has began from.
After all the efforts in developing the camera,
finally we made it and decided to call it a 'SMART CAM' rather than an action cam.

 

 

So, why 'Smart cam'?

ㅡ

 

Before we find the answer to the question, let's get started with asking you some other questions.

  • Do you still connect your cams to PC or mobile in order to save and edit videos?
  • Have you ever forgotten to bring SD card for your camera when you're on traveling?
  • Do you want to get rid of all the complicated set-ups before you do a live stream?

If your answer is 'YES' for any of these questions, we strongly recommend you to try our smart cam.

 

 

Life is logging

It's VUEcam.

 


 

Our smart cam offers a number of functions to enhance its performance and convenience to us ㅡ those who are very much familiar with smartphones.

 

 

How Different

ㅡ

Our smart cam, VUEcam is a kind of a hybrid camera that is positioned between an action cam and a smartphone. Our team has been making every efforts in finding the best way to get advantages of both types of devices and VUEcam is the result.

 

How does VUEcam differ from the existing action cams?

 

Nowadays, many people are using action cams in their daily lives for various purposes, but sometimes we find that it's better to use a smartphone as action cams are not yet smart.

Here are key points that explain why VUEcam is smarter than the existing action cams.

 

Easy Data Share

ㅡ

 

Compared to normal action cams, the smart cam makes things easier.
Data transferring and screen sharing are also done simple and quick.

 

 

Then, why don't we just use a smartphone?

 


One of substantial merits of action cams which smartphones still can't compete with would be an 'angle of view'. The angle of view between two devices normally differ by 50 degrees.

Then, what does the difference affect? That is the amount of your memory and your trace.

A wider range of the angle memorizes more things of you.

 

 

Except for that, all the kinds of mounts from GoPro's, Soni's or any other brands' in the market are compatible since VUEcam has a standard size of mount hole. 

 

 

 

How It Works

ㅡ

 

Having a VUEcam means you are able to do many things.

Recording good memories with your friends and family, shooting some beautiful natural sceneries while riding, doing a live stream to share your story on YouTube, Facebook and Instagram, even monitoring your baby during labour and preventing unforeseen events. ㅡ All of these are possible.

Our versatile VUEcam will help you keep your unforgettable moments much longer and share with others quickly and easily ever.

 

 

Fast and convenient

Live Streaming

ㅡ

Rather than enduring a complicated setup process to broadcast live, all you need to do is just preparing a VUEcam and Wi-Fi. Simplifying the procedure will save your time and effort.

 

Real-time broadcasting is easily and effortlessly performed using our own app or other video platforms such as Facebook, Vimeo and YouTube on the camera.

 

Live streaming is proceeded through our streaming solution named 'VUE Streaming Engine'. VUEcam app directly connects to our streaming server on Wowza and the streaming server is also capable of combining it with some of popular platforms such as facebook, instagram and youtube. Enjoy live streaming anytime, anywhere.

Please check out our live streaming demos.

 

 

 

 

better experience with

Application

ㅡ

We have been developing our own applications for both VUEcam and android phone. We will release the android app in Google Play store soon on the upcoming April.

 

 

By using the android app, you can easily control VUEcam on your smartphone. It's available to record with the preview mode, see files in a gallery and change settings on the app.

If you're an iOS user, please wait a moment until the iOS version is released. However, you're still able to control VUEcam directly on the cam.

 

 

 

Launcher

ㅡ

To make VUEcam users have better UI/UX, We also have been working hard to make a good launcher. Gathering any ideas and opinions from our users is always welcome.

 

It's highly expandable.


Need more functional apps? Visit our 'VUE Store'. (Launching soon)

We will provide other kinds of apps such as Editor / GPS / Tracker / IP Cam for VUEcam users.

You don't need to move your best shots for editing anymore. Just open your photos and videos in editor apps on the device. Getting GPS, tracking while doing workouts is also available. In addition, VUEcam could be an IP cam for monitoring your baby and pet at home or a black box in a car.

 


Features

ㅡ

 

 

Technical Specifications

ㅡ

Width 71mm Height 58mm
Thickness 18mm Weight 73g (with battery)
Camera Lens Cut Filter Lens Camera Resolution 2 Mega Pixels
MIC Digital Microphone Speaker Dynamic Speaker
Display TFT Panel 2.3 inches OS Android 6.0 Marshmallow
RAM 2GB CPU Allwinner A83T Octa-core Cortex A7 CPU
Internal Storage 8GB (supports up to 64GB SD card) GPU PowerVR SGX544MP1
Battery 3.7V Li-ion 1000mAh (54.5x42x4.3mm) Video Streaming RTP/RTCP/RTSP/RTMP/HLS

 

 

 

Waterproof Housing

ㅡ

Waterproof Housing for VUEcam has the highest resistance level ㅡ IP68. That means it goes under the water up to 45 meters (147 feet).

 

When you go for water sports like swimming and scuba diving or when it rains, the housing will protect your VUEcam safe and keep it useful.

 

 

Where the fund goes

ㅡ

We've done prototyping and the 1st pilot production until now. At the moment, we're looking forward to achieving the goal in this funding and maximize our customers' efficiency and happiness through our product.

Most of the funding (60%) will go for a mass production and setting up facilities of VUEcam and the others will be used for shipping (from packaging design to delivery) and fees for marketing and IndieGogo commission.

 

 

Perks

ㅡ


 

Timeline

ㅡ

 

Our team

ㅡ

Let us introduce our team. We're a startup company of South Korea.

Small yet big of dream and passion. Always eager to hear from our customers.

ㅡ Partnership with ㅡ

 

 

FAQ

ㅡ

Q. Do you offer a warranty?

Yes. We provide a one-year warranty for VUEcam from the date of receiving a product. Warranty is only for exchanging a defective unit.

Q. Does VUEcam come with a memory card?

No. We are not providing an external memory card, but VUEcam has its 8GB internal memory.

Q. How's the battery life?

According to our test records, it lasts about 1 hour 30 min to 2 hours for the continuous recording in FHD 1080P / 60FPS.

Q. Who is responsible for an import duty, VAT or any other taxes?

Please remember that backers are responsible for any additional taxes. An import rate of duty is different depending on countries. Please check out your country's policy before funding.

Q. How to update its software?

Visit our newly built website ㅡ vuecam.cc where we are going to upload updates files, SDKs or any other open sources for developers.

 

 

Contact Info

ㅡ

# CS Center : cs.vuecam@gmail.com

story:
SimCam adopts the Intel deep learning VPU, With local storage, it does not only save you from Cloud service fees, but also facilitating data analysis, most importantly, your privacy is guaranteed. It can recognize reappearing faces, distinguish between human intruder and pet movement without triggering false alarm. Features 1080p full HD, 2-way audio and Wifi connectivity, SimCam has everything you expect in an AI security camera.

 

SimCam is the world’s only camera provides 100% secured privacy to your families with our Offline mode function. SimCam will still running real-time analysis and only trigger video recording when there is an event triggered. You can also sync videos to your home NAS system and no one can access the data or watch the livestream. 

 

A SimCam engineering prototype shows how human detection function works.

Fed up with the false alerts sent by your outdated Passive Infrared security system? With AI computer vision chip, SimCam can distinguish human, animal or moving trees with its movement detection technology; a video of 15 seconds, including 7 seconds before and 8 seconds after the sensor is triggered is auto recorded, in-App notification will promptly send to you. 

 

A SimCam engineering prototype shows how the facial recognition function works.

We respect your friends and family as you do and their faces are worth remembering. That’s why we integrate Intel deep learning technology to SimCam for you to register trusted faces, you can also opt out the App notification for their appearance.

 

A SimCam engineering prototype shows how the object monitoring function works.

SimCam features object monitoring, it allows you to outline the object you want to be supervised via its app; the camera records when the motion is triggered by an occurrence, it will also send a notification to your phone. 

 

 

SimCam records 24/7 in 1080p full HD video, 360-degree gimbal with 100-degree field of view (FOV) and you can easily access to live streaming in the Simcam app, and you can easily access to live streaming in the SimCam app.

 

Thanks to Sony IMX 5 Megapixels image sensor, SimCam features up to 50 ft. starlight vision snapshot, it can see the smallest details in all conditions. It can withstand temperature as low as 5 Fahrenheit; with IP65 weatherproof enclosures, SimCam can be installed both  outdoor and indoor use.

 

No matter where you are, the built-in speaker and mic allow you to directly communicate with others by using SimCam app through your smartphone. Or you can control SimCam with your voice by using Google Assistant, Amazon Alexa and IFTTT.

 

 

 

SimCam has certified with CE, FCC, CTICK, a sticker (check here) comes with mentioned logo will be paste on the SimCam.

 

 The Making Of SimCam
story_txt:
SimCam adopts the Intel deep learning VPU, With local storage, it does not only save you from Cloud service fees, but also facilitating data analysis, most importantly, your privacy is guaranteed. It can recognize reappearing faces, distinguish between human intruder and pet movement without triggering false alarm. Features 1080p full HD, 2-way audio and Wifi connectivity, SimCam has everything you expect in an AI security camera. All data is stored locally without the need to pay Cloud storage fees, no 3rd party can ever access to your information, putting your mind at ease.
 Because SimCam records video to local storage, you’ll have easy access to your footage from your smartphone and set you free from Cloud storage costs. Take a look at a comparison between Simcam and the others.
 
  SimCam is the world’s only camera provides 100% secured privacy to your families with our Offline mode function. SimCam will still running real-time analysis and only trigger video recording when there is an event triggered. You can also sync videos to your home NAS system and no one can access the data or watch the livestream.   
Built-in Intel AI VPU, SimCam record and analyze images locally, which makes you spend nothing on cloud services. All data can be saved to a up to 128GB Micro-SD card (buy separately) and supports sync to local NAS storage, privacy and stability are guaranteed.
 
 The Intel® Movidius™ 12 cores VPU, a tenfold increase in the processing speed with the powerful deep neural network, enabling real-time image analyzing and multi-tasking with the greatest precision. A SimCam engineering prototype shows how human detection function works.Fed up with the false alerts sent by your outdated Passive Infrared security system? With AI computer vision chip, SimCam can distinguish human, animal or moving trees with its movement detection technology; a video of 15 seconds, including 7 seconds before and 8 seconds after the sensor is triggered is auto recorded, in-App notification will promptly send to you.   A SimCam engineering prototype shows how the facial recognition function works.We respect your friends and family as you do and their faces are worth remembering. That’s why we integrate Intel deep learning technology to SimCam for you to register trusted faces, you can also opt out the App notification for their appearance.  

SimCam marks the beginning of your smart home revolution, in the above video, we are going to show you how SimCam recognize a pre-set family member and turn on the lights, fan or even TV (use together with SimCam smart plug).
 
Not like other products on the market can only start recording by waking up the camera after a while, which will easily miss important moment. SimCam features 10 seconds of pre-event and 20 seconds of post-event recording (30 seconds in total), allows you to easily review what motion events are causing the system to record instantly. 
  A SimCam engineering prototype shows how the object monitoring function works.SimCam features object monitoring, it allows you to outline the object you want to be supervised via its app; the camera records when the motion is triggered by an occurrence, it will also send a notification to your phone.   

We will open source software development kit (SDK) and the source code to the public through website and GITHUB. Developers can DIY their desired AI functions, such as catching your dog from stealing food on the table (as shown on above video), or identifying their own license plates and opening the garage door among other AI functions.
 
SimCam is creating an ultimate clear vision no matter anytime, anywhere.
 SimCam can livestream video via our app. SimCam records 24/7 in 1080p full HD video, 360-degree gimbal with 100-degree field of view (FOV) and you can easily access to live streaming in the Simcam app, and you can easily access to live streaming in the SimCam app.

Here is a video shows how the gimbal works once it's triggered.
 
 
SimCam's night vision.
 
Other's night vision. Thanks to Sony IMX 5 Megapixels image sensor, SimCam features up to 50 ft. starlight vision snapshot, it can see the smallest details in all conditions. It can withstand temperature as low as 5 Fahrenheit; with IP65 weatherproof enclosures, SimCam can be installed both  outdoor and indoor use. No matter where you are, the built-in speaker and mic allow you to directly communicate with others by using SimCam app through your smartphone. Or you can control SimCam with your voice by using Google Assistant, Amazon Alexa and IFTTT.

Please see above is a video shows how Alexa works with SimCam.
 
  

 We’re always serious to your home security.     
 

 In the Era of AI, it’s time to use the next-generation technology to replace the traditional IP security system. Founded in 2016 by three professors of Computer Science, SimCam Lab is  committed to leveraging facial and object recognition, deep learning  technology, together with target tracking solution based on embedded platform to close the loophole in the traditional security system.We’d like to provide a helpful alternative to the pubic through crowdfunding, allowing those with basic AI knowledge to create DIY functions with SimCam App. Our team will also provide technical support to all customers. SimCam has certified with CE, FCC, CTICK, a sticker (check here) comes with mentioned logo will be paste on the SimCam.  The Making Of SimCamA CAD drawing of the SimCam with wall mount.
 
 A CAD drawing of the SimCam with home base.

story:
* Multilingual Site: 日本語｜Español

 

 

プレスキット(日本語）

 

FITT360 is the world's first and only neckband 360 camera. Designed to capture your vivid 360° world effortlessly, this hands-free device provides a whole new way to tell your story in 360° True First-Person-View.

Designed to be unobtrusive, FITT360 is wearable throughout your daily lives without any sense of displacement or awkwardness.

Whether it is chasing after your kids, cycling with your friends, traveling or going on adventures, FITT360 makes it easy to capture the moments that matter.

 

Hands/Mount Free Simply press record and focus on your never-again moments and the experience itself.

First Person View The footages FITT360 provide will take you back to those moments in the most immersive way possible. Rewinding your world and discovering what you might have missed is now possible. 

 

Live Streaming Share your vision in real-time or preview what you have captured and share it with the world via social networks

Life Logging Embedded GPS within the FITT360 enables tracking and mapping of videos taken by FITT360. With this feature, you can even create your personal street views

Doubles as a bluetooth headset When you are not recording videos, you can still use FITT360 as a bluetooth headset to listen to your favorite tunes or to answer the calls.

 

Simply wear FITT360 around your neck and start capturing your world. Via live streaming via SNS, you can share your world with other to view it on their mobile devices or with Virtual Reality Headsets. 

3 Full HD Cameras surrounding the FITT360 captures environments of each user in the True First Person View (FPV) with up to 90 minutes of recording time.

Companion mobile application “FITT360” compensates, normalize the exposures in all 3 clips and Auto-Stitch them while minimizing the shakes of the clips to be VR-Ready.

2-Ways to Export When the time comes for you to edit the videos, you can choose to export both in 360-degree and single 2K photo/video. 

 

Demo Videos - 2016.04 FITT360 MARK1. VER-2 TEST VIDEO

 

2nd Demo Videos - 2018.02 FITT360 TEST VIDEO

 

3rd Demo Videos - 2018.02  Bike riding with FITT360

 

Starting with the design, we wanted a device that packed all the powerful features but was light and easy to use without the extra bulk. Using all the available length and width within the device, we focused on adding the thinnest banded battery with maximum performance.

Beyond the size, we wanted to make FITT360 easy to use. With FITT360, you can turn the recording on and off on the device itself without connecting to the mobile application - something most other 360-degree cameras don't offer.

Water Resistant

With the IPX6 water proof rating, FITT360 is designed to withstand environmental water hazards to endure your needs.

Heat Proof

Designed to dissipate the heat away from the neck, comfort in user experience was kept in mind.

Sizing

Global neck guides have been created in the pre-production stage of the development by measuring 500+ necks to come up with 3 different sizes - Small, Medium, Large - to fit them all.

From 2007, Kevin's quest began to create a wearable camera that could produce immersive and true first-person-view videos. After countless nights spent on figuring out the best location to place FITT360, the neckband type came to fruiting with following reasons.  

 

TECH SPECS

FITT360 isn't some idea hacked together in a garage overnight. Having spent countless days and night within Samsung Electronics over dozens of globally manufactured projects, we know what it takes to deliver reliable products to the market. We have applied the same methodologies with rigorous testing process to ensure we develop a solid and a reliable product. 

We’re redefining the way we capture our surroundings in 360 degree field of vision. While we’ve come this far with an incredibly small team, we need your help in making this technology a reality.

TIMELINE

SHAPING THE FUTURE OF WEARABLE 360 CAMERA

Our goal is to not only develop a product, but help educate the world on the potential of what a wearable 360 camera can bring. To do this, we need your support from to not only fund us, but also get the word out about what we’re developing. If you like what we are doing, please share it.

 FIND US ON SOCIAL MEDIA

Having spent countless days and night within Samsung Electronics over dozens of globally manufactured projects, we know what it takes to deliver reliable products to the market. We have applied the same methodologies with rigorous testing process to ensure we develop a solid and a reliable product. We’re redefining the way we capture our surroundings in 360 degree field of vision. While we’ve come this far with an incredibly small team, we need your help in making this technology a reality.TIMELINESHAPING THE FUTURE OF WEARABLE 360 CAMERAOur goal is to not only develop a product, but help educate the world on the potential of what a wearable 360 camera can bring. To do this, we need your support from to not only fund us, but also get the word out about what we’re developing. If you like what we are doing, please share it. FIND US ON SOCIAL MEDIA

story:
SLOPES Elite is available on ROGETI online shop!

https://www.rogeti.com

 

History of SLOPES

Back on 26th, October 2015, we  launched a successful Indiegogo campaign for the original SLOPES, the world’s first polyhedron stand for GoPro cameras (HERO 3/3+/4). With its brand new structure composed of a polyhedron bottom and a multi-direction slot, the original SLOPES provides 20 different angles to position a case-free GoPro camera in a matter of seconds.

 

What's New

 

Today, the GoPro HERO has evolved  to the 7th generation , which original red SLOPES no longer fits . Although in 2016 we had launched  another awesome edition - SLOPES Black which is compatible with almost all in-case/frame GoPro cameras (HERO 7/6/5/4/3+) , there are still many people hope we bring a new edition to enable their case/frame-free using. Furthermore, some people suggested to include a 15°-20° angled surface on SLOPES to fully leverage GoPro’s Superview and Wide and Linear mode.. Now SLOPES Elite makes it happen.

 

16 Killer Angles

SLOPES Elite has a multi-direction slot that allows the GoPro to be installed in different ways, and a newly designed polyhedron bottom that provides different positioning angles. The slot plus the bottom endows SLOPES Elite with 16 awesome angles. 

For a wide angle camera like GoPro, the composition is absolutely a tough work if you compare it to the iPhone shooting. However, when you got the right composition on such a wide angle camera, a bursting visual impact will emerge and catch the eyeball. The SLOPES Elite was designed to optimize and simplify composition processes, basing on the result of  a lot of research and experiments.

The special design has made the composition process much more efficient.  Either your GoPro field of view is set to Superview or Wide or Linear, you can always find an angle to get the horizontal line in the right position, which is one of the key to form a nice composition on wide angle camera.

 

Perfect Performance On the Ground

With SLOPES Elite, you can get breathtaking results by positioning your GoPro on the ground. No other GoPro holders can get your GoPro that close to the ground.

If your GoPro FOV is set to Superview, we recommend you use the 30° for horizontal recording; If it is set to Wide, both 30° and 18° will be awesome; If you use Linear mode, 18° will be best.

 

Perfect Performance On the Desktop

The new set of angles includes a 18° bottom surface which gives perfect result when you put your GoPro on desktop for selfies, whatever your GoPro's Field Of View setting is Superview, Wide or Linear mode. Now both the stuff on the desk and you will be represented perfectly. Everything looks so cool!

 

Unrivaled Quick Positioning

No more screwing on and off.

Most stands for the GoPro camera involve putting it into its housing (or frame), and attaching it to a traditional-style tripod, whatever it is larger or smaller. Slopes Elite is an earthbreaking alternative in that it offers faster deployment, faster angle positioning, and faster the landscape to portrait change than if using the traditional stand with the housing or frame.

You can try multiple shots to make an awesome footage including views from different angles.

 

Allows the Cable Shooting

SLOPES Elite allows you to connect the cable to your GoPro camera in all available shooting poses.

 

Ultra Slim, Ultra Light

SLOPES Elite’s ultra-slim body is as small as a car key, which makes it super portable and enables using in narrow spaces. It can free-stand on any flat surface, like footstep, windowsill, and closet top…

SLOPES Elite weighs only 15 grams, which equals three pieces of printing paper. It can definitely make your travels much easier.

 

Easy to Produce Composite Photo/Footage

The fixed view angle provided by SLOPES Elite are very handy if you want to get shots with consistent angles for producing composite photo or footage.

 

Easy to Produce 3D Photo/Footage

The fixed view angle provided by SLOPES Elite are also handy if you want to produce a 3D photo or footage. On the SLOPES Elite edition, we don't set a grooving joint like we did on previous editions of SLOPES stand, however, you can still easily put two GoPro cameras side by side and in most cases it works very well.

 

Easy to Clean

You can easily clean the dirt and sand on SLOPES Elite. Whilst, if the sand get into the screw mount of a traditional GoPro stand, you can hardly get them out and the mount might be not available to use anymore.

You can rinse the SLOPES Elite in water with no worry. Whilst, rinse a traditional GoPro stand in water might get its metal part rusted.

 

Makes the whole world your GoPro tripod

This is the SLOPES Elite. With it, your shooting will become extremely efficient. Your GoPro will be more than an action camera; now you can use it as a “24X7 full-time wide-angle camera”.

SLOPES, makes the whole world your tripod. Brought to you by ROGETI.

story:
Our Story

Hey everyone this is Kevin Davidson of K|D Imagery we're excited and delighted to bring before you this opportunity to partner with us. As a young photographer I believe our gifts and talents should serve for a purpose far greater than that of ourselves. This is the reason why the staff of K|D Imagery has decided to partner with Bishop AR Hibbert Sr. along with his ministry staff to document this historical event.


The Impact

Now our mission is to raise awareness for the needs of missionaries and for the people of Sri Lanka. Through our medium of photography and imagery, we would like to capture the story of lives which have been transformed through selfless giving. By your participation, you can help to create exposure so that these needs can be met.


What We Need & What You Get

All K|D Imagery asks is that you can help us with a donation of $15. This donation will go to helping us send our photographer to document this missions trip in Sri Lanka. IN NO WAY will our photographer be paid for this event, we believe in donating our time and effort to this cause. We are only raising money for airfare. I believe that TOGETHER we can make an impact through this campaign!

All of our partners in this Sri Lanka Experience will receive a 12 month 12 x 18in. "Sri Lanka Experience" calendar, along with a personal slideshow of this missions trip. This is our way of saying THANK YOU for your help and amazing support! In advance we thank you for your love and participation!!


Other Ways You Can Help

PLEASE GO AHEAD and SHARE WITH EVERYONE ONE YOU KNOW!!! Any and every bit of support along with donations are much appreciated!!!

story:
My Story

I started studying photography when I was in high school. I found a teacher who was an incredible mentor and helped me deal with the depression of my mom's death in 1999. I learned everything that I could and spent most of my days out shooting countless rolls of film, developing them, and seeing what I came up with in the dark room. Photography became my hobby as well as something that made life more beautiful. Everything looks different through a lens. I would not be who I am without picking up this hobby. Sometimes I feel like my life's purpose is to show other people how beautiful the world can be and capture moments for them so that they will never forget. Photography makes me feel like my life is important, I like that.

I sold my car and moved to Omaha, NE in January of 2008 after learning of my home's foreclosure in California to see what else the world had to offer me. Through a huge amount of support, I was able to start photographing "professionally" in the fall of 2010. At this same time, I reentered school and am currently studying for a BS in Environmental Studies. That means that I do equal parts chemistry and biology.. and lots of it. Lately, I have been feeling the limitations of my equipment and would like to be able to expand creatively and professionally. Unfortunately, due to school, my funds are very limited so I am reaching out.

I am a natural light photographer and take many family and individual portraits but I would like to expand my creative side too. I have a few projects in the works and would like to build on those in addition to building a larger client base. I have an end goal of showing a few collections but those also take a great deal of money to put together.

I also have hopes of establishing an in-home studio for winter months. This would be completely new to me and a direction I am very curious about.

The Impact

The impact of my campaign reaches to everyone that I photograph. By helping me now, you are helping to receive better quality photos in the future. I do have high hopes of one day publishing the few collections that I'm working on but I want them to have a vast number of photos before releasing them to the public.

The largest impact would be on me. As selfish as that feels to say, photography has been my happy place and creative outlet for over 10 years. I've struggled with anxiety my whole life and photography has helped me to overcome a large deal of it. My camera is my safety blanket and I feel that new equipment would help to rekindle my love for it and also provide a new challenge.


What I Need & What You Get

Equipment:
Canon EOS 60D ~$860 - http://tinyurl.com/3pmlpxv
Canon lens 24-70mm ~$1200 - http://tinyurl.com/3qgpnbn
Additional money for lighting, batteries, memory cards, flashes and other equipment.

What You Get:
Should I reach my goals and purchase new equipment, I will give anyone who donates $100 or more a free session (1-2 hours session time, fully edited photos and disc with printing rights released).
If you donate $50, I will give you a free mini session (30 minutes, disc included)!
Any other amount above $20 will receive an 8x10 of choice from my current collection of photos as my way of saying thank you!

A new camera body is my biggest goal. I don't think it would be difficult to reach this goal with enough help! I am currently saving money from any session to be put towards this expense as well. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Tell everyone about my campaign! It may seem strange to be doing this, but sometimes all you need is some word of mouth to help achieve your goals. Share this on your Facebook, tell your coworkers, let your friends and family know.

Other ways to help include: purchasing prints from me (holiday gifts!), booking a session, or donating props to help build my collection.

Thank you for reading and helping. I wouldn't be where I am now without the support that I've received over the past few years and I look forward to seeing where life will take me with additional support from you!

story:
Why WISCO QUEENS:

Katie Goffman is an actress, singer, and writer currently living in NYC! This show is extremely close to her heart. It is truly a love letter to her friends and family, especially her younger brother. It was inspired by their journey in NYC the past 6 years. Hundred of hopefuls move to New York City each year to escape their small town bubble, but sometimes a taste of HOME is all you need!  

When you're young and single in New York City your friends are your family and your family is always your BEST FRIEND. 

This series is a comedy ...DUH...but most importantly it's about ACCEPTANCE.

Accepting WHERE you are, WHO you are, and WHERE you're going....

No matter how you feel inside, who you love, or what you look like.

YOU are ENOUGH. YOU are LOVED.

WE ARE ALL EQUAL.

 

No matter how unlucky you may feel you are never alone.

Your family (old and new) always has your back!

 

We all need a good LAUGH right now...........

AM I RIGHT? 

 

This is Katie Goffman's first script to be FILMED. It would mean the world to her to have it funded. Whether you’re a family member, close friend, or former high school classmate, you can contribute to this film and make a dent in our budget. We have a lot of cool perks to boot!

 

The Indie Go-Go funds would go towards:

  • Hiring a Director Of Photography
  • Lighting equipment
  • Props, wardrobe, and make-up
  • Sound equipment
  • Festival fees
  • Food and catering
  • Transportation of crew and equipment
  • Locations

 

The Impact:

This web series will spread joy! Katie and her husband Devon Goffman have just begun the process of assembling their dynamite team! They are excited to share this story with the world and make a positive impact! Finding self-love and community in a city of strangers can feel overwhelming, but these zany characters find their inner JOY and spread it around! We hope you will join our WISCO QUEEN community and support this web series!

Help us sing these characters to LIFE!

What if I can't donate?

Regardless of whether you can donate or not, please share this campaign and our Facebook page with your family and friends whether through Facebook, email, or even snail mail! 

 

Thank you for your support!

story:
Letown LT9: The Smart Modular 4K Dash Cam

After many years of producing the dash cam, our team began to ruminate on some thoughts and ideas: 

  • What is the most important thing for a dash cam?
  • Is it feasible to add more functions to turn a dash cam into a smart vehicle security system? 
  • Can we produce a dash cam that allows people to choose the functions they need?

We created Letown

The real 4K starlight night vision smart modular vehicle security system.

 

MEET Letown LT9

Real 4K Definition, Perfectly Captures Every Detail 

  • GoPro's aspherical lenses
  • 3.0' LCD Screen
  • F1.4 Diaphragm
  • OV4689 Image Sensor 
  • Novatek NT96663 Chip 
  • 7 Groups of Glass Lenses

 

 With these top configurations, Letown is able to

1. record in 2160P true 4K cinematic video quality;

2. produce the high-quality image when recording against the light; and

3. provide real 166° wide angle (the so-called 170° wide angle lenses on the market are actually only 120°).

 

1. High-quality Image

Letown has an storage of 128 GB that ensures maximum 20-hour 4K video recording. Once the memory card is full, it overwrites the oldest unlocked video clips in order to keep uninterrupted monitoring for you. Of course, in addition to automatically locking videos of unexpected incidents, users can also click on the button any time to permanently save any video they like (such as the beautiful scenery on the road).

2. Superb Night Vision

3. Super Wide-angle Lens

With 166° ultra-wide-angle all-glass lens, monitoring from all directions, no blind spots with Letown. Enjoy your journey with Letown's highly sensitive, accurate and detailed capture recordings.

Demo Video

Demo Video

 

What makes Letown different

After long-term research, our team discovered the power supply scheme of using capacitors rather than the lithium batteries.  Letown is absolutely safe and durable.

Capacitor power supply & OBD power cable 

 

Features

  •  Dual-channel Recording
  •  ADAS (Advanced Driver Assistant Systems)
  • 24-hour Smart Parking Monitor
  • GPS Path Tracing
  • Easy Setup
  • Durability
  • User-friendly software
  • Selfie Mode

1. Dual-channel Recording

Letown supports dual-channel recording, allowing the dash cam to capture footage from the front camera while simultaneously recording from its SONY IMX323 1080P rear camera attachment. This setup allows you to capture both ends of the road, and videos taken by the rear camera are stored alongside those from the front camera on the memory card for easy access. With simple wiring, it can be set up in 5 minutes, monitoring the car from every direction.

 

2. ADAS (Advanced Driver Assistant Systems) 

The Letown LT9 provides real-time intelligent lane departure warnings. Equipped with Collision Warning, the camera detects the distance of the front and rear car for further safety precautions.

3. 24-hour Smart Parking Monitor

 Auto switch to parking mode when you park your car. Triggered by the motion detector, the dash cam will automatically record when people or things come closer to your car, and automatically power off if nothing happens after 30 seconds. It decreases the load on the dash cam, car battery and memory card to the greatest extent possible and effectively extends the service life (powered by OBD power cable, automatic protection for battery under 11.6V low voltage). 

Radar Module

Parking Monitor Mode

 

4. GPS Path Tracing, Real-Time Location

The GPS module helps you accurately assess the status of the accident by providing you with the vehicle speed, the direction of the collision and the severity of impact. At the same time, you can always use the JMSGPSPlayer navigation software (install from CD or download from official website) to locate and trace your car path.

GPS Module

JMSGPSPlayer Navigation Software

5. Easy Setup

Letown LT9 can be installed within 10 minutes, even if you have never used a dash cam.

6. Durability

Letown uses heat-resistant polymer materials for the suction cups of the mounts to prevent the front and rear cameras from dropping off. 

 

7. User-friendly software

Anyone can easily learn to use Letown's software with its meticulously designed simple interface.

 

7. Selfie Mode

In fact, our team also thought about another function of Letown — selfie. We designed a 360° rotatable camera mount to turn LT9 into selfie mode that catches your joyful moments on the road with friends.

360° Rotatable Camera Mount

 

For 15 months, from a simple idea to the original design, testing, prototypes and then to the final working product... we made Letown LT9, the real 4K starry night vision smart modular vehicle security system.Comparison with similar items

 

Why Letown?

 

Rewards

 

Development

 

About Us

Letown Corporation is a dash camera manufacturer and exporter in Hong Kong. Established in 2012, we specialize in various kinds of dash cameras. We are a strong R&D team with many years of professional marketing and development experience. Adhering to the spirit of "Honesty, Pragmatism, Innovation, Efficiency," we strive to make people's lives better through science & technology.

 

Timeline

 

FAQ 

Can I use Letown for my car?

You can mount Letown on most of the cars, however, we would suggest using Letown with parking monitor system in cars with less than 7 seats.

What is OBD?

OBD an acronym for on-board diagnostic, which is what we called computer port. Inside the OBD power cable, there is a 12-volt power supply and other data ports. The 12-volt power supply is connected to the car battery that works 24 hours uninterruptedly. This is why we need the vibration sensor chip and the CPU detecting to achieve automatic power supply.

Would the OBD power cable exert any influences on ECU？

No. We only use the 12-volt power supply in the OBD cable, so there won’t be any influences on the ECU.

Would the car battery be under voltage when using the OBD power cable?

No. The operating current of OBD is only several micro amps, which could be ignored considering the car current produced by the battery. To ensure that the car has enough starting voltage, the uninterrupted power supply has a low voltage circuit protection that automatically cuts off the power when the car battery voltage is under 11.6 volts.

Does my car have the OBD interface?

Almost all cars have the OBD interface that is usually on the lower left under the steering wheel. The OBD interface has a global standard so there’s no worries of mismatch.

Why my radar module does not work well?

We would suggest you mount the radar module on the windshield to make sure it works normally.

 

Risks and challenges

Like all Kickstarter projects, we will face certain risks and challenges in delivering this product at the quality we demand of ourselves. However, the Letown team brings with it decades of experience in engineering and manufacturing at scale, and we've made every effort to mitigate these risks for our backers.

With the support of our manufacturing and distribution partners, we are well prepared for the challenges ahead. We promise to be transparent and to keep our backers updated and informed about any issues that may come up and our solutions to such.

Our scope is to deliver the best possible Letown Modular 4K Vehicle Security System into your hands ASAP. So please go back to the top of the page and support us with a pledge.
story_txt:
Letown LT9: The Smart Modular 4K Dash CamAfter many years of producing the dash cam, our team began to ruminate on some thoughts and ideas: 
What is the most important thing for a dash cam?
Is it feasible to add more functions to turn a dash cam into a smart vehicle security system? 
Can we produce a dash cam that allows people to choose the functions they need?
We created LetownThe real 4K starlight night vision smart modular vehicle security system. MEET Letown LT9Real 4K Definition, Perfectly Captures Every Detail 
GoPro's aspherical lenses
3.0' LCD Screen
F1.4 Diaphragm
OV4689 Image Sensor 
Novatek NT96663 Chip 
7 Groups of Glass Lenses
  With these top configurations, Letown is able to1. record in 2160P true 4K cinematic video quality;2. produce the high-quality image when recording against the light; and3. provide real 166° wide angle (the so-called 170° wide angle lenses on the market are actually only 120°). 1. High-quality ImageLetown has an storage of 128 GB that ensures maximum 20-hour 4K video recording. Once the memory card is full, it overwrites the oldest unlocked video clips in order to keep uninterrupted monitoring for you. Of course, in addition to automatically locking videos of unexpected incidents, users can also click on the button any time to permanently save any video they like (such as the beautiful scenery on the road).2. Superb Night Vision3. Super Wide-angle LensWith 166° ultra-wide-angle all-glass lens, monitoring from all directions, no blind spots with Letown. Enjoy your journey with Letown's highly sensitive, accurate and detailed capture recordings.Demo VideoDemo Video What makes Letown differentAfter long-term research, our team discovered the power supply scheme of using capacitors rather than the lithium batteries.  Letown is absolutely safe and durable.Capacitor power supply & OBD power cable  Features
 Dual-channel Recording
 ADAS (Advanced Driver Assistant Systems)
24-hour Smart Parking Monitor
GPS Path Tracing
Easy Setup
Durability
User-friendly software
Selfie Mode
1. Dual-channel RecordingLetown supports dual-channel recording, allowing the dash cam to capture footage from the front camera while simultaneously recording from its SONY IMX323 1080P rear camera attachment. This setup allows you to capture both ends of the road, and videos taken by the rear camera are stored alongside those from the front camera on the memory card for easy access. With simple wiring, it can be set up in 5 minutes, monitoring the car from every direction. 2. ADAS (Advanced Driver Assistant Systems) The Letown LT9 provides real-time intelligent lane departure warnings. Equipped with Collision Warning, the camera detects the distance of the front and rear car for further safety precautions.3. 24-hour Smart Parking Monitor Auto switch to parking mode when you park your car. Triggered by the motion detector, the dash cam will automatically record when people or things come closer to your car, and automatically power off if nothing happens after 30 seconds. It decreases the load on the dash cam, car battery and memory card to the greatest extent possible and effectively extends the service life (powered by OBD power cable, automatic protection for battery under 11.6V low voltage). Radar ModuleParking Monitor Mode 4. GPS Path Tracing, Real-Time LocationThe GPS module helps you accurately assess the status of the accident by providing you with the vehicle speed, the direction of the collision and the severity of impact. At the same time, you can always use the JMSGPSPlayer navigation software (install from CD or download from official website) to locate and trace your car path.GPS ModuleJMSGPSPlayer Navigation Software5. Easy SetupLetown LT9 can be installed within 10 minutes, even if you have never used a dash cam.6. DurabilityLetown uses heat-resistant polymer materials for the suction cups of the mounts to prevent the front and rear cameras from dropping off.  7. User-friendly softwareAnyone can easily learn to use Letown's software with its meticulously designed simple interface. 7. Selfie ModeIn fact, our team also thought about another function of Letown — selfie. We designed a 360° rotatable camera mount to turn LT9 into selfie mode that catches your joyful moments on the road with friends.360° Rotatable Camera Mount For 15 months, from a simple idea to the original design, testing, prototypes and then to the final working product... we made Letown LT9, the real 4K starry night vision smart modular vehicle security system.Comparison with similar items Why Letown? Rewards Development About UsLetown Corporation is a dash camera manufacturer and exporter in Hong Kong. Established in 2012, we specialize in various kinds of dash cameras. We are a strong R&D team with many years of professional marketing and development experience. Adhering to the spirit of "Honesty, Pragmatism, Innovation, Efficiency," we strive to make people's lives better through science & technology. Timeline FAQ Can I use Letown for my car?You can mount Letown on most of the cars, however, we would suggest using Letown with parking monitor system in cars with less than 7 seats.What is OBD?OBD an acronym for on-board diagnostic, which is what we called computer port. To ensure that the car has enough starting voltage, the uninterrupted power supply has a low voltage circuit protection that automatically cuts off the power when the car battery voltage is under 11.6 volts.Does my car have the OBD interface?Almost all cars have the OBD interface that is usually on the lower left under the steering wheel. The OBD interface has a global standard so there’s no worries of mismatch.Why my radar module does not work well?We would suggest you mount the radar module on the windshield to make sure it works normally. Risks and challengesLike all Kickstarter projects, we will face certain risks and challenges in delivering this product at the quality we demand of ourselves. However, the Letown team brings with it decades of experience in engineering and manufacturing at scale, and we've made every effort to mitigate these risks for our backers.With the support of our manufacturing and distribution partners, we are well prepared for the challenges ahead. We promise to be transparent and to keep our backers updated and informed about any issues that may come up and our solutions to such.Our scope is to deliver the best possible Letown Modular 4K Vehicle Security System into your hands ASAP. So please go back to the top of the page and support us with a pledge.

story:
Em Suma (ENGLISH VERSION BELOW)

Ricardo Guerreiro ama o mundo natural. Partilhá-lo através de histórias que acha não só interessantes como importantes dado o seu valor ecológico ou cultural, é uma paixão.

Tendo trabalhado na ornitologia e observação de cetáceos de 2002 a 2009, a fotografia era um hobby que o acompanhava na actividade profissional. Sentindo que queria chegar a mais pessoas com as histórias que ia retratando, decidiu dedicar-se profissionalmente à fotografia em 2010.

Desde então, realizou a sua primeira exposição a solo, publicou em livros e revistas, foi autor de um livro infantil e de um livro fotográfico. Foi ainda co-autor de um filme de história natural sobre a serra da Arrábida.

ACIMA: Algum do trabalho publicado pelo Ricardo

Por Que Precisamos de Si

Ricardo encontra-se a rodar o seu segundo filme de história natural e iniciou um projecto fotográfico sobre bovinos autóctones do Alentejo. Contudo, em Maio último, praticamente todo o seu equipamento fotográfico foi roubado durante trabalho de campo.

Ao contribuir para esta campanha, está a ajudar directamente o Ricardo a terminar o trabalho que tem pendente e a iniciar novos projectos naquilo que acreditamos ser uma bonita e relevante contribuição para que a população conheça o seu património natural e cultural através da fotografia.

O Que Precisamos de Si

A presente campanha é uma tentativa de angariar fundos para a substituição de tanto material roubado quanto possível e a sua contribuição irá directamente para as necessidades mais imediatas de trabalho do Ricardo:

- uma câmara SLR; uma lente grande-angular; uma câmara de vídeo profissional; cartões de memória; baterias extra; mochila para equipamento fotográfico; uma câmara GoPro; outros acessórios de uso diário

O valor total de equipamento roubado ao Ricardo é cerca de 7.500€ e esta campanha é de Valor Flexível pelo que todas as contribuições contam.

O Que Temos Para Si

Somos um grupo de 57 fotógrafos amadores e profissionais que doou várias imagens e tempo para realização de oficinas a favor desta campanha. O Ricardo tem também alguns dos seus trabalhos publicados, disponíveis para oferecer pela sua contribuição.

Deixamos o convite para ver os presentes que preparámos para si (coluna à direita) e escolher os que melhor se adaptam às suas possibilidades e interesses. (Veja também a secção Descrição de Alguns Presentes, mais a baixo).

Outras Formas de Ajudar

Se deseja ajudar o Ricardo mas não o pode fazer directamente pela contribuição monetária, há pelo menos mais uma forma: espalhe a palavra. Divulgue a campanha pelos seus contactos e partilhe a sua opinião sobre porque acha importante contribuir.

Não hesite em contactar-nos (campanha.rg@gmail.com) se tiver questões e/ou sugestões sobre outras formas de ajudar o Ricardo.

Obrigado!

Descrição de Alguns Presentes

Livro Infantil Para Colorir - Numa página, uma fotografia de um dos projectos do Ricardo, sobre vida selvagem em meio urbano. Na página seguinte, um desenho da mesma imagem para os mais novos colorirem ao mesmo tempo que observam a fotografia. 24 págs; 9 fotografias/desenhos.

 

Almada Natureza Revelada (livro fotográfico) - capa dura 222 págs; bilingue (Português e Inglês). Autor: Ricardo Guerreiro

 

Impressões Fine Art - Temos um total de 120 fotografias de 57 fotógrafos amadores e profissionais. Por favor escolha do link em baixo e envie um e-mail com a sua escolha para campanha.rg@gmail.com

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/2789941/cam...

 

Master Class - sete horas de formação com cinco destacados fotógrafos de natureza/viagem portugueses. Auditório da Colorfoto, Lisboa, 28-Set-2013 (programa sujeito a ligeiras alterações).

Programa:

Alexandre Vaz - Fotos Individuais versus Narrativas Visuais: quando o todo tem de ser mais que a soma das partes

Rúben Vicente - Em Viagem: preparar e tirar o melhor da expedição

Ricardo Lourenço - Sobre a Água: técnicas de construção e utilização do esconderijo flutuante

Miguel Claro - Entre Crepúsculos: capturando os sujeitos nocturnos

Luís Quinta - Composição de Imagem

(ENGLISH)_______________________________________________________

In Short

Ricardo Guerreiro loves the natural world. Sharing it through stories he finds not only beautiful but ultimately important due to their ecological or cultural value is his passion.

Having worked in ornithology and whale-watching from 2002 to 2009, photography was a long time hobby. He made the leap to professional photography in 2010 feeling he had to reach more people with the stories he came across while at work.

Since then he had his first solo exhibition, published in magazines and books, a children's book and a coffee table photobook. He also co-authored a film about the Arrábida mountain range, a rich wildlife area south of Lisbon, Portugal.

ABOVE: Some of Ricardo's published work

Why We Need You

Ricardo was now working on his second film and on photographic project about native cattle from southern Portugal but had virtually all his equipment stolen while on field work.

By helping, you are ultimately helping Ricardo finish his work at hands and beginning his future projects on what we believe is a relevant and beautiful contribution for the people's knowledge of both their natural and cultural heritages through photography.

What We Need From You

We are trying to fund as much as possible of Ricardo's replacement equipment. Your contribution will go directly to Ricardo's most immediate needs of gear to work:

- one SLR camera; one wide angle lens; one professional video camera; memory cards; extra batteries; photo equipment backpack; one GoPro camera; other daily use accessories

The total amount of equipment stolen from Ricardo was around 7.500€ and this is a Flexible Value Campaign so every contribution counts.

What You Get

We also have something to offer in return of your contribution. We're a group of 57 professional and amateur photographers who donated many photos and time for workshops in favour of the campaign. Ricardo also has some published work that he wants to offer to those who contribute to the campaign.

We invite you to check the perks we have prepared and choose the ones that best fit your possibilities and interests. (See the Description of Some Perk Items section below).

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot help us directly, but still want to help Ricardo, there's at least a way: get the word around. Spread this campaign through your contacts and share your opinion of why you'd like to help.

Feel free to contact (campanha.rg@gmail.com) us with questions or suggestions on other possibilities to help Ricardo.

Thanks!

Description of Some Perk Items

Children's Book - One page has one of Ricardo's photographs from an urban wildlife project he did, the following page has the picture drawn so children can paint it while looking at the image. 24 pages; 9 pictures/drawings.

 

Almada Nature Uncovered photobook - hardcover 222 pages; billingual (Portuguese and English) by Ricardo Guerreiro

 

Fine Art prints - We have a total of 120 pictures from 57 amateur and professional photographers. Please choose from the link below and e-mail your choice to campanha.rg@gmail.com

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/2789941/cam...

 

Master Class - seven hours with five prominent Portuguese nature/travel photographers at Colorfoto, Lisbon, 28-Sep-2013. (Subject to minor changes in the program).

Speakers and themes:

Alexandre Vaz - Individual Images versus Visual Narratives: when the whole has to be greater than the sum of the parts

Rúben Vicente - Travelling: preparing and making the best of the expedition

Ricardo Lourenço - On the Water: building and usage techniques of hydrohides

Miguel Claro - From Dusk Till Dawn: capturing the night subjects

Luís Quinta - Notes on Image Composition

 

Campanha com o apoio de | This campaign has the support of:

Naturlink - a ligação à natureza (http://naturlink.sapo.pt)

Traduvárius (http://traduvarius.com)

Colorfoto (http://colorfoto.pt)

9th Muse - Tailor-made Musical Solutions (http://9thmuse.net)
