Since solutions on the market did not fit our needs, we decided to build our own stabilization system. With an engineering degree in background and a lot of creativity we built the first prototype from the components of a toilet lid and roller skates. A year and many more prototypes later we created STABYLIZR: a compact and easy to use system for everyone.  
STABYLIZR Prototype History & Stefan our silent team member Thanks to all of our friends, family, and backers who have supported and encouraged us throughout this whole process. We could not have done this without you! We would like to specially thank the following people who have helped us throughout our campaign:
Video: Filmabteilung H4 (Natascha Gertlbauer und David Brucker)
Graphic Design: Nadja Boubachta

PR: Florian Schauer-Bieche

Models, Makeup: Fedor, Liis, Lynette, Tamara, Victoria, Nico, Chris
Support from Switzerland: Timon Renfer, Roland Malaluan
Andreas Ruthner, Dominic Haffner and many more
   With your help we can bring STABYLIZR to life. We have a fully functional 3D printed prototype, which produces amazing footage and is ready for mass production. We have everything set with our suppliers, production and assembling partners in Austria. By backing our campaign you will help us fund the tooling, first manufacturing run and packaging costs. Thanks to your support and our partners we will be ready to start production as soon as we reach our campaign goal. We are excited to deliver a great product at an affordable price.There is one more thing: Please share our project on your network!  A few clicks for you make a big difference for us.   UPDATE: PRODUCTION HAS STARTEDWe have been working for over a year on STABYLIZR and developed a fully functional 3D printed prototype. We are mass production ready! We have our suppliers and production partners ready to produce all parts that we need in the required quality and quantity. To guarantee quality, shorten communication channels and support local economy we decided to fully rely on Austrian partners. We will start with the plastic injection molding production as soon as we hit our target!      RIKS AND CHALLENGESHowever, we know that life is not always fully predictable and there might be unforeseen troubles waiting for us on the road to mass production. We have a great network of industry experts and other startups that have manufactured products before. We will further leverage this network to ensure we can bring STABYLIZR to life and into your hands.The main challenges we see are in manufacturing: We have experienced partners that help us to get STABYLIZR to the required level of quality. We have worked closely with our partners during the production of STABYLIZR prototypes and they are eager to support our project. We have consciously chosen partners in Austria who we can fully rely on to make sure the product is delivered in the right quality and on time. HEY ACTIONCAM LOVERS!Videos ermöglichen es uns unsere Geschichte zu erzählen und diese mit unseren Freunden zu teilen. Dabei befinden wir uns jedoch oft in Bewegung, was wiederum zu verwackelten und unscharfen Videos führt. Übernimm die Kontrolle und mach dank STABYLIZR bessere und fließendere Videoaufnahmen.WIE FUNKTIONIERT DASSTABYLIZR ist ein innovatives mechanisches Kamerastabilisierungssystem. Es gleicht die Bewegungen zwischen deinem Körper und der Actioncamera aus. Dadurch entstehen verwackelungsarme und fließende Aufnahmen, ohne nachträgliche Bearbeitung. Spare Zeit und Geld.Durch die innovative zum Patent eingereichte Konstruktion ist ein kompaktes, leichtes und robustes Design möglich. STABYLIZR ist 100% wasserdicht, allzeit bereit und benötigt keine Batterien. ein professioneller mechanischer Stabilisator. Ideal um besondere Anlässe, alltägliche und sportliche Aktivitäten zu filmen. Mit STABYLIZR zu filmen ist super einfach und benötigt keinerlei Vorkenntnisse.  STATIV FUNKTION: Selbst wenn du einmal nicht in Bewegung bist, hilft dir STABYLIZR dabei, bessere Videos zu machen. Durch seine Konstruktionsform und sein robustes Design dient er als Stativ auf unebenen Flächen, Stangen, Bäumen, nahezu überall.  BAISC GRIP (inkludiert)  Der Basic Grip ist im Lieferumfang enthalten. Er wird aus widerstandsfähigem, weichem Schaumstoff hergestellt und liegt großartig in der Hand. Das ganze System ist so leicht, dass es sogar schwimmfähig ist. Für schwerere Setups empfehlen wir jedoch zusätzlichen die Floaty Backdoor.    POWER GRIP Wir lieben smarte Gadgets und hassen es keinen Akku mehr zu haben. Deswegen haben wir in unserem POWER GRIP eine Power Bar integriert mit der die GoPro oder andere Geräte bis zu zweimal aufgeladen werden können. Dieser kann zusätzlich zum STABYLIZR für nur 30€ statt 49€ bestellt werden. Hol dir deinen POWER GRIP für nur €30!  STABYLIZR funktioniert mit der GoPro Hero und Hero [2,3,3+,4,Session]  und Actioncameras im GoPro Format. Die Actioncam darf maximal so groß sein wie die GoPro Hero3 mit großem Gehäuse und BacPac. Das enspricht einer Abmessung von etwa 78x69x48mm. UPDATE: Xiaomi YI kann leider nur im Frame nicht in dem Housing benutzt werden. Der Kopf des STABYLIZR ist mit jedem Standard GoPro mount kompatibel. STABYLIZR kann mit deiner Actioncamera und 
Verschiedenen Gehäusen, 
Rahmen und 
zusätzlichen Akku und LCD BacPacs 
eingesetzt werden. Durch die Balancemutter kann das System ganz einfach abgestimmt werden. SUPER EINFACHES SETUP 1) Anstecken und Ausrichten der Kamera   STEP 1: Anstecken und Ausrichten der Kamera  2) Abstimmung der Balancemutter und schon kannst du loslegen.  STEP 2: Abstimmung der Balancemutter und schon kannst du loslegen  
STABYLIZR

Größe: 158x120x76mm 
Gewicht: 240g (STABYLIZR ohne Kamera) 
Material: PAGF- Polyamid mit Glassfaser verstärkt 
 2-Achsen: Nicken (140°) und Rollen (360°) 
 100% Wasserfest
POWER GRIP Kapazität: 2200mAh, Input: 5V, 1000mA; Output: 5V, 1000mA    
Gründer: Wolfgang Fallmann und Miriam Boubachta Unsere Geschichte Wir lieben es, unsere Sport und Outdoor Aktivitäten zu filmen. Mit dem Resultat waren wir leider oft nicht zufrieden. Da die derzeitigen Lösungen auf dem Markt unsere Bedürfnisse nicht erfüllt haben, beschlossen wir unser eigenes System zu entwickeln. Mit einem Maschinenbauabschluss in der Tasche und viel Kreativität entstand der erste Prototyp, aus den Komponenten eines Klodeckels und Rollerskates. Ein Jahr und viele Prototypen später haben wir STABYLIZR kreiert: ein kompaktes, einfaches System für alle.  
STABYLIZR Prototyp Geschichte & Stefan unser stilles Teammitglied An dieser Stelle möchten wir uns gerne bei unseren Freunden, Familie und Unterstützern bedanken, die uns während des gesamten Prozesses immer Beiseite gestanden sind. Speziell in Bezug auf die Kampagne möchten wir folgenden Personen danken: 
Video: Filmabteilung H4 (Natascha Gertlbauer und David Brucker), 
Graphic Design: Nadja Boubachta, 
PR: Florian Schauer-Bieche 

Models, MakeUp: Fedor, Liis, Lynette, Tamara, Victoria, Nico, Chris 
Support aus der Schweiz: Timon Renfer, Roland Malaluan 
Andreas Ruthner, Dominic Haffner und viele mehr
   Mit deiner Unterstützung können wir STABYLIZR zum Leben erwecken. Wir haben vollfunktionsfähige 3D gedruckte Prototypen, die großartige Videos erzeugen. Mit unseren Fertigungs- und Assemblierungspartnern aus Österreich haben wir alle notwendigen Schritte für die Produktion festgelegt und können mit der Massenproduktion sofort starten. Durch deine Unterstützung werden die Werkzeugformen, die erste Produktionsserie und die Verpackung finanziert. Nach dem Erreichen des Zieles starten wir sofort mit der Produktion. Wir freuen uns, ein super Produkt zu einem guten Preis liefern zu können. Bitte unterstütz uns indem du die Kampagne in deinem Netzwerk teilst. Ein paar Klicks für dich, machen für uns einen Riesenunterschied.    UPDATE: PRODUKTION BEGONNEN Nach über einem Jahr an der Entwicklung von STABYLIZR haben wir nun vollfunktionsfähige 3D gedruckte Prototypen. Unsere Zuliefer- und Fertigungspartner sind bereit, die Komponenten in der notwendigen Qualität und Quantität zu produzieren. Um die Qualität sicherzustellen, Kommunikationswege zu verkürzen und die lokale Wirtschaft zu unterstützen, haben wir uns für Produktionspartner in Österreich entschieden. Diese stehen in den Startlöchern! Sobald wir das Ziel erreicht haben, starten wir mit der Spritzgussfertigung. Risiken und Herausforderungen Uns ist bewusst, dass immer etwas Unvorhersehbares eintreten kann und uns Hindernisse auf dem Weg zur Auslieferung begegnen werden. Wir bauen deswegen auf ein Netwerk aus Experten und anderen Startups, die bereits Produkte produziert haben. Dieses erweitern wir ständig, um sicherzustellen, dass wir STABYLIZR in der richtigen Qualität und nach Zeitplan zu dir liefern können. Die größte Herausforderung stellt die Produktion dar, daher vertrauen wir hier auf einen erfahrenen Partner, mit dem wir bereits während der Entwicklung der Prototypen zusammengearbeitet haben. Alle produktionstechnisch notwendigen Anpassungen wurden bereits durchgeführt. Wir haben uns bewusst für österreichische Produktions- und Assemblierungspartner entschieden auf die wir uns voll verlassen können, um so zu garantieren, dass wir wie geplant ausliefern.

story:
WE REACHED OUR GOAL OF $4,000!!!  

We're Pumped You're Pumped!
Want To Find Out More About Ripclear?

Learn More Here!  ▶


UPDATES!

We're really excited to announce that we reached our goal of $4,000 through online and offline contributions. We're lucky we have such great friends, family, and customers, so thank you! 

This means, as promised, that we are on schedule to deliver our first full production of Ripclear for late April or early May. We've already lined up manufacturing and we're in production now. 

We'll make sure to keep you posted with any updates but again, thank you for all your support!



For international buyers, please add $25 to your order for shipping.

Shipping internationally is really costly, but we'll make it up to you, promise! If you order a product and need it shipped internationally, we'll throw in 5 additional rips to your package! Eventually, we will be able to save you this cost by have international distributors but we thought regardless of price you might like the opportunity to try the product. We know you're awesome and we don't want pesky international boarders holding us apart any longer!! 





Ripclear is a simple, elegant new way to protect your ski and snowboard goggle lenses. Just apply our universal design to any goggle lens and you'll be able to ride and travel care free — no more scratches in your vision!

Protect any goggle, any lens, from any brand!

We're offering you 3, 5, 10, 25 packs or a Ripclear Season Pass so you can protect all your lens' or share them with friends however you want!

Watch the video above, and you'll see what the hype is about!


Quick Stats

Ripclear Protective Film *Patent Pending Design  
The new, worldwide, ski and snowboard goggle lens protecting standard.

Universal Shape Fits Most Goggles Perfectly
Apply your rip to any goggle lens. Smith, Oakley, Dragon, Electric, Bolle, Spy, Arnette, Giro, Scott, Uvex, VonZipper, Anon, and Salomon... anything.

Easy to Apply Thin Film
Apply the Ripclear film in seconds so can always be ready to charge any mountain with any brand of goggle.

Simple adhesive system 
Unlike the 'post' systems, we use a simple, non-permanent, low-tack adhesive.

'Invisible' Design
'Disappears' once it is applied to the lens.

Keeps Your Sight Line Scratch and Defect Free
Full optical clarity and protection from scratches and lens damage.

In Poor Weather Wipe your Lens Without Worry
Reduce wear and tear on $50+ replacement lens.

3, 5, 10, 25 Rip Packages or a Yearly Ripclear Plan
We're making sure you have enough for your trip, just in case things get wild.

Mega Referral Program
Refer 3 friends through social media get a free Ripclear 3X package!



Will it Fit My Goggles?

Ripclear ships with Rips, Wipes, a Microfiber cloth, and our love. 

Want more Rips, Wipes, and Love? subscribe!

(There's a massive, if not gigantic, list of goggles our rips will fit at the bottom of the page, check it out).


If you have a goggle lens, Ripclear will protect it.

We’ve developed a universal shape that works for just about every ski or snowboard goggle on the market.

The Secret

Our rip has been tested, tested, and tested some more and we plan on testing hundreds more goggles just to make sure we can offer the best product possible. The perimeter shape has been optimized for both flat lens goggles and spherical lens goggles. 

There's over a 1,500 goggles and over 20 million (yes, 20 million) Skiers in the United States that could use Ripclear to protect their lens. (If you want to see a list of goggles just some of the models at the bottom of the page!)




"Genuinely Better Is Very Hard"


We've taken Mr. Ive's seriously, "genuinely better is very hard". It's taken a year to get to this point and we've tested, tested, and tested some more. We're confident you won't find another product on the market that is better at keeping your lenses clear and scratch free. 

We're working hard to make a product that's genuinely better, I think Mr. Ive's would agree we are on our way and we hope you do too!


Interested in blue ocean strategy? (We are) 

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blue_Ocean_Strategy



How to Apply Ripclear To Your Goggles

Visit www.Ripclear.com/HowToApply for a fully illustrated FAQ)

1:  Clean your lens with the provided wipes and microfiber cloth.

2:  Warm up the Ripclear Rip for easy application in your hands, a hair dryer, or with a microwave for 45 seconds.

3:  Line up your 3 layer lens protector and remove the bottom white layer.

4:  Apply the center first and then using the microfiber cloth push outward on the top edge and then move diagonally down and to the right until the right side is applied completely with no bubbles. Repeat the same process with the left side.

5:  Now that you’ve applied your Rip, wait until you start your first run to “Ripclear” your outer protective layer, leaving a fresh and clear protective film on your lens.



the Ripclear application guide included in package



How does it work?

Very simply. Peel off the protective  to reveal a low tack residue free adhesive. It is rated for a wide range of temperatures and will keep working in the harshest conditions.

We've included a microfiber cloth and lens cleaning wipes meant to clean your lens as they should be, with care and soft clean cloths. 



Ripclear Three Layer Architecture

We know there are times after you apply your rip but before you are riding when you might scratch, rub, or touch your lens diminishing the optical clarity you want. 

Ripclear optical clarity and protection

The good thing is, we've made the product have 3 layers. (see image)

1. An outer protective layer to rip minutes or seconds before riding.

2. The main Ripclear layer that is applied to your lens for protection.

3. The base layer that when removed reveals the the low tack adhesive backing. 





Where We Are Now

Ready to Rip, Ready for Orders!

Over the last year we have diligently designed, tested, and sourced our product to ensure you'll get a great product and come back for more. We've tested. prototype, and refined our design of this innovative product. 

Luckily with your help we've already come a long way. We know we have a long way to go but we're jamming as hard as we can to help protect your lenses,

Stay tuned.... we're trying to make waves 


Your Perks

Here's a summary of the 'pre-order perks' we are offering for our launch campaign:






Frequently Asked Questions


Question: How Many do you Need?

Answer: how many days, lenses or goggles do you ride a month or want in 3-5 days? 

We sell combos of Ripclear Rips and cleaning wipes in packs of 3, 5, 10, or 25, We also offer a custom Ripclear shipping schedule with individual packages and monthly subscriptions. 

Note: Skilled riders and professionals such as mountain patrol, ski racers, or park riders could use a rip a day, during a contest, or on a weekly basis. These riders are typically focused on performance and regular maintenance so they need a high quality low cost solution.

In on the mountain, in the weather, there is nothing like a fresh lens before the big run!



The Story:
Ripclear - The Fight Against Scratches

Protect Your Lens From Lens Rash
With Ripclear's Universal Lens Protector


Yeah, scratches….

Ripclear’s story started because of one issue, lens scratches. We’ve all experienced it, the $100 pair of goggles ruined because of one careless drop, forgetting your protective bag on your big trip, hitting the glades and that tree branch, or by just wiping your lens (and scratching it) in the wintry mix on the summit. Oh, we all know it. But here’s the thing, Ripclear knows how to stop it for good!

Over the last year we've been perfecting a product that can be applied to any goggle lens simply and with outstanding results. We built Ripclear’s product because we wanted to solve a recurring problem in the lives of our friends, family, and now hopefully the world.  The great thing is, with your contribution, now we can solve this problem that many of us have faced before.  

Since we started Ripclear, we’ve tested a variety of shapes, material compositions, low tack adhesives, and static cling films. We’ve researched dozens of suppliers for our product and we’ve seen the results on dozens of goggles through rigorous alpha testing to acomplish 1 goal: 

Prove we can stop lens rash and save you from buying another $80 replacement lens. Pretty neat, I know!


Scott, Ryan, and Zach in Detroit Designing Ripclear's Graphics

The great thing is, we have an idea and we can follow through on it! The Ripclear team’s background is perfectly suited for the product and customer experience we’ve built for you. Ripclear.com has dedicated and passionate skiers and snowboards with real world experience bringing successful products to market.



What’s most important to us is that we’re a tight group of friends and business partners wanting to solve a problem we literally had in front of us.  We’re also pumped we had an excuse to ski and snowboard at a mountian that gets an average annual snowfall of 462 inches (1,173 cm); our home mountain, Mount Bachelor!

What's my contribution for?

If you've developed a product like, you can understand how the costs pile up.

Ripclear was born and operates as a lean startup which keeps expenses incredibly low — even still, there are some significant costs that you help will help us cover with your order. 

Here are the primary ones:

  • Production Tooling
  • Initial minimum production run
  • Patent & Trademark protection
  • Quality Assurance
  • Extra Research and Development for future products
  • Shipping

We've worked on the cradle to cradle plans for Ripclear




How safe is Ripclear for my lens?

Ripclear test, test, test and then test some more!

Ripclear LLC has taken great lengths to test a variety of materials, low-tack / static adhesives, and weather testing to ensure your rip is as invisible and focused of a product we can deliver. It is the gold standard of goggle lens protection.

Material research and development is slow and expensive, but we think spending the last year has been the most important part of our product and you will surely agree. 



When to Expect Delivery

We plan delivery for Early May 2014. Fast, I know! 

Will I have it for the end of the season? YES! 

Even for a product as seemingly simple as Ripclear there's a series of critical steps which in some cases should not be rushed and in others simply cannot be. That said, we've worked hard perfecting our designs, sourcing, and timelines to deliver a product before the end of the season. 

Speed with quality. We'll keep you updated as we go.


We want your love and support for Ripclear TODAY, 

click on one of these contributions above:







Thanks for sharing our story and for contributing anything you can! It truly means a lot to us and our dream. 

If you love Ripclear, want to help us see our dream come true, and love our entrepreneurial story, please help us get this amazing product off the ground any way you think you can! 

Tell your Facebook, Twitter, Google+, or any other network of friends... maybe even real life friends about our story. 

We know the internet is a noisy place and we're happy we could keep you interested and with a quality service.

If you got to this point we would like to offer you a 5% off your first purchase on our webstore at www.Ripclear.com. 

Use promo code: Ripclear-Indiegogo2014


Also follow us for any updates or just get some great content we post regularly. You can join us here:









 

APPENDIX

We've still got you here huh? 

Thanks for that!! Here are some other goggles which we support.


Goggle Compatibility Guide

If it is a goggle lens you can protect it with Ripclear™.

Here's a list of just some of the goggles Ripclear protects. 

(Hint: All your goggles are in here somewhere...)

  • 100% (60)
  • Bobster Eyewear (31)
  • Bolle (54)
  • Bushnell (2)
  • Carrera (4)
  • Chopper (4)
  • CliC (1)
  • Cloud 9 Goggles (2)
  • Dragon (177)
  • Dragon Alliance (95)
  • Dye (14)
  • Edge I-Wear (3)
  • elope (10)
  • Elvex (2)
  • Emgo (19)
  • Fly Racing (6)
  • FogTech (1)
  • Giro (22)
  • Global Vision Eyewear (8)
  • Gucci (1)
  • Liquid Image (24)
  • Oakley (110)
  • Scott (149)
  • Scott Sports (58)
  • Scott USA (330)
  • Smith Optics (127)
  • Spy (81)
  • THG (4)
  • Thor (4)
  • Unique (1)
  • Uvex (18)
  • Valken (1)

Yeah, scratches….Ripclear’s story started because of one issue, lens scratches. We’ve all experienced it, the $100 pair of goggles ruined because of one careless drop, forgetting your protective bag on your big trip, hitting the glades and that tree branch, or by just wiping your lens (and scratching it) in the wintry mix on the summit. Oh, we all know it. But here’s the thing, Ripclear knows how to stop it for good!Over the last year we've been perfecting a product that can be applied to any goggle lens simply and with outstanding results. We built Ripclear’s product because we wanted to solve a recurring problem in the lives of our friends, family, and now hopefully the world.  The great thing is, with your contribution, now we can solve this problem that many of us have faced before.  Since we started Ripclear, we’ve tested a variety of shapes, material compositions, low tack adhesives, and static cling films. We’ve researched dozens of suppliers for our product and we’ve seen the results on dozens of goggles through rigorous alpha testing to acomplish 1 goal: Prove we can stop lens rash and save you from buying another $80 replacement lens. Pretty neat, I know!Scott, Ryan, and Zach in Detroit Designing Ripclear's GraphicsThe great thing is, we have an idea and we can follow through on it! The Ripclear team’s background is perfectly suited for the product and customer experience we’ve built for you. Ripclear.com has dedicated and passionate skiers and snowboards with real world experience bringing successful products to market.What’s most important to us is that we’re a tight group of friends and business partners wanting to solve a problem we literally had in front of us.  We’re also pumped we had an excuse to ski and snowboard at a mountian that gets an average annual snowfall of 462 inches (1,173 cm); our home mountain, Mount Bachelor!
What's my contribution for?

If you've developed a product like, you can understand how the costs pile up.
Ripclear was born and operates as a lean startup which keeps expenses incredibly low — even still, there are some significant costs that you help will help us cover with your order. Here are the primary ones:


Production Tooling

Initial minimum production run
Patent & Trademark protection
Quality Assurance
Extra Research and Development for future products
Shipping
We've worked on the cradle to cradle plans for Ripclear
How safe is Ripclear for my lens?


Ripclear test, test, test and then test some more!
Ripclear LLC has taken great lengths to test a variety of materials, low-tack / static adhesives, and weather testing to ensure your rip is as invisible and focused of a product we can deliver. It is the gold standard of goggle lens protection. 
Material research and development is slow and expensive, but we think spending the last year has been the most important part of our product and you will surely agree. 

  When to Expect Delivery
We plan delivery for Early May 2014. Fast, I know! 
Will I have it for the end of the season? YES! Even for a product as seemingly simple as Ripclear there's a series of critical steps which in some cases should not be rushed and in others simply cannot be. That said, we've worked hard perfecting our designs, sourcing, and timelines to deliver a product before the end of the season. Speed with quality. We'll keep you updated as we go.We want your love and support for Ripclear TODAY, click on one of these contributions above:

Thanks for sharing our story and for contributing anything you can! It truly means a lot to us and our dream. 
If you love Ripclear, want to help us see our dream come true, and love our entrepreneurial story, please help us get this amazing product off the ground any way you think you can! 
Tell your Facebook, Twitter, Google+, or any other network of friends... maybe even real life friends about our story. We know the internet is a noisy place and we're happy we could keep you interested and with a quality service.If you got to this point we would like to offer you a 5% off your first purchase on our webstore at www.Ripclear.com. Use promo code: Ripclear-Indiegogo2014Also follow us for any updates or just get some great content we post regularly. You can join us here:










 
APPENDIX
We've still got you here huh? 
Thanks for that!! Here are some other goggles which we support.Goggle Compatibility Guide
If it is  a goggle lens you can protect it with Ripclear™.
Here's a list of just some of the goggles Ripclear protects. (Hint: All your goggles are in here somewhere...)
100% (60)

elope (10)

story:
The Problem

I have used this camera to put together tons of free shoots to help friends and models out. It's been used so much the the camera is wearing out and won't focus correctly, nor will my USB port for tethering work (Tethering allows me to show you in real time your photos on my computer screen). Also I do film work and other such things to help others out. Now I'm stuck with a camera that has had a lot of use. It's just worn out, and I need to buy a new one as the repairs would cost more than the camera. What would getting this new camera improve:

  • Photo Quality, going from an 18 Mega Pixel camera to a 22 Mega Pixel camera would make photos look much sharper and cleaner. Plus it would boost the print quality through the roof.
  • I would be able to finally shoot events for my friends and family. My camera has a maximum ISO of 6400 and is super noisy in the dark. If I were able to get my new camera I would have an ISO of 25k which would allow me to shoot almost completely in the dark. Also for film work, I'd be able to shoot my horror films with much better picture quality in dark scenes.
  • Faster and more precise focus. I would be able to do photo shoots from start to finish without having focus problem. My T3i had lots of issues in low light finding focus, and if it did it would focus on noses, or lips instead of eyes on auto. 
  • Built in Wireless will allow me to have the photo I just took of you be able to appear on the computer so you can see your photos and results in real time.

I have never charged much for photos, and I've done tons of free work and helped people on so many levels to get great photos for whatever they needed them for. I'm not the type of person who generally asks for help, but I need it here. With the state of my camera right now, it's near impossible to do what I do. If you've liked my work, and want to help me out, I will continue to put out great work for you to enjoy and would finally be able to shoot all these great events my friends put out there.

What We Need & What You Get

Well here's sort of a run down on what I need.:

  • The camera I am looking at, is the Canon EOS 6D. It's one of Canon's cheapest full frame cameras on the market. It has 11 auto-focus points built in, which would allow me much more diversity for photos than I had previously been allowed. It's currently at 1899.00 on Amazon. We would get free shipping as we have a Prime account.
  • Well what I can offer you is specialized photo shoots. I have a full studio with the best studio lighting I could afford. To give you the best look. I will have multiple options for people who choose to help me out here.
  • The funds earned in this campaign will 100% go into the purchase of a new camera.

The Impact

You'd not only help improve the quality of my pictures, but you'd help many others receive wonderful photos as well. I do a lot of free work to help people out that need it and I do a lot of work with people around the community to help with their projects as well. This camera would be able to help me do so much more and no limit me to a studio setting. Things this would impact right away.

  • Modeling and Head shots. I do a lot of these for people, a lot of the time pro-bono. Plus a lot of videos as well. I've got a project coming up dealing with mental issues and how they're perceived.
  • I've done over 200 photo shoots and have shot over 40,000 photos alone. So believe me, the work I plan to do after this camera will only go to serve this community better and give people the confidence in themselves that I know I can help create with a beautiful photo.
  • Photography and Film is my passion and love. Without a camera that is working correctly its near impossible to do my work. Please help me with this. Had it not been for Stacy and I's wedding,we wouldn't be in such dire straights with our savings, but we're behind on bills, and struggling to get caught up. So a new camera isn't in the budget.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know not everyone can afford to help me out, but here's a few great ways you can:

  • Just get the word out. We all have Facebook, and tons of ways to connect to our friends. If you feel I deserve the help then share this campaign.
  • If you want to offer your makeup/hair/design work to help with donators, this could be a huge help.

Thanks for taking the time to read. Any help at all is appreciated beyond words.

story:
In the Press

What Testers Are Saying

On-Board Diagnostics (OBD) Key Features

DashPal OBD is the most reliable and versatile automotive gadget that pulls real-time data from your car's computer, and reveals all the info on the App. It gives you a peace of mind wherever your vehicle and driver are. 

Vehicle Compatibility

Auto Diagnostic

Understand the check engine light in your car and monitor the health of each vehicle in your family from DashPal App.

If something goes wrong, DashPal will let you know exactly what the issue is with easy-to-understand alerts, so you can get it fixed before hitting the road.

No more wondering what that check engine light means, getting stranded by a sudden breakdown, or having to hope your mechanic is honest.

Real-time Location

Track your car’s location in real-time and see where it is right in the DashPal app.
So you’ll always know exactly where you left it-or where your new driver’s taken it.
 

Driving Behavior

See how you score when it comes to safety and economy.

DashPal App analyzes acceleration, speed, braking and cornering to give you dynamic feedback to save up to $2100 a year and reduce the accident rate by 41%.

Driving History    

DashPal records all your trips from the moment your car starts. 
Check the DashPal app to see where you’ve gone, your average and max speeds, trip time and distance, as well as fuel costs. 

Speed and Boundary Alerts

Set custom Speed Alerts in the DashPal app to know when speed is exceeded and set boundaries when your car enters or exits those areas.

The DashPal App

 

Dash Cam Key Features

170° Angle  

Capture more of your surroundings (up to 5 lanes of traffic) with DashPal’s industry-leading 170° angle.

1080P

Advanced Sony sensor and Ambarella chipset combine to capture every detail in full HD 1080p in both day and night time.

Moments Captured With the DashPal Dash Cam

Note that videos play in default at 720p, to see in 1080p, go to this link and make sure to select 1080p HD from settings.

The DashPal Design

 

The DashPal Production

Package Set-Dash Cam & OBD

Package-Dash Cam Only

Package-OBD Only

Specification 

OBD

Dash Cam

Installation Procedures-Dash Cam Only

Installation Procedures-Dash Cam & OBD 

Timeline

About Us

We’re a small team of friends, designers, and engineers fascinated by two things: the thrill of the journey and the power of technology.    

We believe in fully embracing the freedom of the open road while carefully avoiding the hazards around its twists and turns.  

Inspired by the extraordinary innovations of the smart car movement, DashPal is our first adventure in leveraging technology to keep drivers connected and protected - wherever you go. 

Our mission is to empower you to enjoy peace of mind knowing you and your loved ones are safe - even if you can’t afford to buy a new car with the latest smart technology built in.  

We believe DashPal is an elegant realization of that mission and we couldn’t be more excited to share it with you. 

Risks & Challenges

The DashPal dash cam and OBD are ready to start production as soon as we reach the funding goal. We already have the manufacturer in place and have finished preparations. Our experienced engineering team has more than 15 years’ track record of bringing products to market, so as long as we reach out funding goal, your DashPal dash cams and OBDs are guaranteed to be delivered on time.

So in brief, we're super confident we can deliver and incredibly high quality product, and on time — and are so, so thankful that you're on this journey with us!

story:
Hello everyone my name is Luis Hernandez I am the creator of the blog Socalcorgi.com and https://www.facebook.com/SoCalCorgi
 I have one Corgi named Desi and we try to attend as many Corgi/dog related events as possible. we originally bought a GoPro to make videos of all the Corgi/dog Events that we attend. it took us a while to save for the GoPro and now we have no way to document and share pictures and videos of the events we go to. 

Events we go to are Corgi beach day every 3 months it is held at the Huntington Dog Beach. This past Corgi Beach day there were over 300 Corgis in attendance.

SocalCorgi Picnic- held in september hence the funds neded by day being a a day or 2 before the 15th of September.

What we need is about $600 to replace the Gopro and SD card that was stolen so we can share more videos and pictures of corgi events we go to in the SoCal area, and if we get to go to the Corgi Camping trip next year we will share that aswell.

ALL FUNDS RAISED WILL GO TOWARD THE PURCHASE OF A GOPRO and SD Card, AND ANY LEFT OVER WILL BE SENT TO CORGI PALS INC

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

IF YOU ARE NOT ABLE TO DONATE PLEASE JUST SPREAD THE WORD ABOUT THIS.

story:
GoFish Cam is a patent pending wireless, underwater action-adventure camera that sits on your fishing line and captures the real action of the sport in conjunction with our mobile application. 

Meant for trolling, cast-and-retrieve, and bottom fishing in both salt and freshwater environments, the GoFish Cam has been designed with a stabilized, waterproof design to allow anglers to record the action down to 150 meters (~500 Feet) underwater without the wobble. In 2014, two brothers came up with an idea for an underwater fishing camera while on a fishing trip. After securing funds from friends and family, and investing more than a year of time, GoFish Cam was born.

Equipped with HD 1080p color video and night vision, the GoFish Cam catches the complete underwater experience through a 170° wide-angle lens and built-in microphone even in the deepest, darkest of conditions. It’s fishing like you’ve never seen before – trust us!

It’s easy to share the exciting action and your catch with friends, family and the GoFish Cam community. The mobile application creates limitless possibilities for its users! It provides a simple user interface to review, edit, and share action-captured videos through your own social networks, directly from the GoFish Cam App. 

In 2014, two brothers came up with an idea for an underwater fishing camera while on a fishing trip. The two brothers found Kieran Howlett an avid angler, but also a tech genius! Together, the three partnered with BeKnown, and have invested more than a year of time working hard to bring to market the best underwater fishing camera. 



Use of Funds: We want to be transparent on how we spend the funds from our supporters. Here is a projection of how the funds will be invested.

GoFish Cam is a great technology and product and we believe it can impact the fishing world in a BIG way! We’re a new start up so that’s why we need your help. We truly appreciate the love!

Please help us spread the word via the Social Media buttons above 

Use our contest to share and enter: http://gofishcam.com/Giveaway

 TAG YOUR FISH CATCHES USING #GOFISHCAM

When can I purchase a GoFish Cam? 

GoFish Cam will be shipping its first units in September of 2016!

Pre-order now here at IndieGogo to save on price!

In addition, it can be purchased on our website: www.GoFishCam.com. To be kept up to date about when GoFish Cam will be released, sign up to our newsletter on our website. 

What is the cost of a GoFish Cam? 

GoFish Cam's suggested retail price is $169.99 U.S. Be sure to check out our website early for savings. 

Does the camera record sound? 

Yes! The GoFish Cam has a built in microphone to make sure that the entire experience is captured underwater. 

Can I record in the dark? 

Yes! GoFish Cam has been designed with a green light emitting diode (LED) ring around the camera lens. The lighting gives an extra 1M of visibility. 

How does GoFish Cam remain waterproof? 

We’ve designed the GoFish Cam to be extra durable and water resistant. It has been tested to work to 150 meters (~500feet!). 

What do I do if my line snaps and the camera falls off? 

The GoFish Cam has been designed to sit on the fishing line. It sits between your casting line and lure (or leader line). We suggest using a leader line. We recommend using a heavy braided casting line and attaching the camera in between the leader and casting line, so if it snaps, the chance is it'll snap on the leader leaving your camera still attached to the casting line. Also, in the near future, GoFish Cam may be offering a warranty program for GoFish Cam clients. Purchase the warranty policy, and in the case that you lose your camera, get a new camera at a heavy discount. Further details on this will be provided at a later date.

How do I get started? 

Upon receiving your GoFish Cam, make sure to read the manual and register your camera on the mobile application. Instructions are easy: Download the app, enter your product key code and record! 

Where can I share my videos? 

GoFish Cam’s mobile application will allow users to share videos through most major social media channels – Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Youtube. If you notice we’re missing one, let us know and we’ll do our best to accommodate! 

Can I see my videos on my mobile device? 

Absolutely! GoFish Cam has developed a mobile application to work with your Smartphone. It works alongside the camera wirelessly. We encourage users to review, edit, and share footage. Currently, the video cannot be streamed in real-time underwater. That's a feature we're working on.

How to Use the GoFish Cam?

The camera can be used for three different fishing styles; Trolling, Casting, Bottom Fishing.

Trolling & Casting:

Trolling is the most popular style the GoFish Cam is used for. In this style of fishing there exists the most tension, as there is always a drag. The drag keeps the camera extremely steady and will allow exceptional quality footage.

Casting is another popular style the GoFish Cam is used for. In this style of fishing there may be some shaky footage, but we are working on some new features for production to fix that. Currently, heavier lures for casting works better than lighter ones.

Bottom Fishing:

The GoFish Cam can also be used for bottom fishing. In this style of fishing, make sure the weight is attached before the camera as per above. This will help the camera face the bait to capture the right footage. 

How Do I Attach The GoFish Cam To My Line?

The GoFish Cam is very easy to attach to a fishing line. There are two ends to the camera. The back end will be attached to the casting line and the front end to your leader line. You can either tie the lines straight to the camera or tie your line to a snap and use that to connect to the camera.

How Do You Stop The Camera From Spinning?

The camera is built with a stabilization fin. The fin works best when there is tension or drag from both ends of the camera. As long as you're trolling, reeling in, or battling a fish you'll find less spinning. The more action, the more stable! We're also working on new features for the production run to ensure that we minimize any spinning (hopefully fully).

How Far Does The WiFi Go?

The WiFi has been tested to 40Ft out of water.

Current technology for WiFi does not allow it to go speak to a mobile devicde under water as the water disrupts the signal. We are working closely with researchers and different institutions to make sure that when WiFi has under water capabilities, the GoFish Cam does too!

How Does The WiFi Work?

The GoFish Cam emits its own WiFi signal. The camera works similar to how your house's WiFi; when you leave the range of your house your phone disconnects, and once your phone comes back into range, it reconnects. When the camera comes back into range of your phone, it picks up on the WiFi signal and reconnects. This allows you to review all the footage on your GoFish Cam via our app on your mobile device.

The app also lets users leverage and learn from each other's experiences. It provides users with data like what bait or lures to use in specific locations, what works for specific types of fish, where to find them, and when to go fishing!

Use of Funds:
We want to be transparent on how we spend the funds from our supporters. Here is a projection of how the funds will be invested.




Note: this use of funds schedule includes IndieGoGo pledge money and other outside investment money from our seed financing round.











GoFish Cam is a great technology and product and we believe it can impact the fishing world in a BIG way! We’re a new start up so that’s why we need your help. We truly appreciate the love!


Please help us spread the word via the Social Media buttons above 



Share on Facebook: Facebook.com/GoFishCam





Share on Instagram: Instagram.com/GoFishCam





Share on Twitter: Twitter.com/GoFishCam


Use our contest to share and enter: http://gofishcam.com/Giveaway
 TAG YOUR FISH CATCHES USING #GOFISHCAM





When can I purchase a GoFish Cam? 
GoFish Cam will be shipping its first units in September of 2016!
Pre-order now here at IndieGogo to save on price!
In addition, it can be purchased on our website: www.GoFishCam.com. To be kept up to date about when GoFish Cam will be released, sign up to our newsletter on our website. 
What is the cost of a GoFish Cam? 
GoFish Cam's suggested retail price is $169.99 U.S. Be sure to check out our website early for savings. 

Does the camera record sound? 
Yes! The GoFish Cam has a built in microphone to make sure that the entire experience is captured underwater. 
Can I record in the dark? 
Yes! GoFish Cam has been designed with a green light emitting diode (LED) ring around the camera lens. The lighting gives an extra 1M of visibility. 
How does GoFish Cam remain waterproof? 
We’ve designed the GoFish Cam to be extra durable and water resistant. It has been tested to work to 150 meters (~500feet!). 
What do I do if my line snaps and the camera falls off? 
The GoFish Cam has been designed to sit on the fishing line. It sits between your casting line and lure (or leader line). We suggest using a leader line. We recommend using a heavy braided casting line and attaching the camera in between the leader and casting line, so if it snaps, the chance is it'll snap on the leader leaving your camera still attached to the casting line. Also, in the near future, GoFish Cam may be offering a warranty program for GoFish Cam clients. Purchase the warranty policy, and in the case that you lose your camera, get a new camera at a heavy discount. Further details on this will be provided at a later date.
How do I get started? 


Upon receiving your GoFish Cam, make sure to read the manual and register your camera on the mobile application. Instructions are easy: Download the app, enter your product key code and record! 
Where can I share my videos? 


GoFish Cam’s mobile application will allow users to share videos through most major social media channels – Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Youtube. If you notice we’re missing one, let us know and we’ll do our best to accommodate! 
Can I see my videos on my mobile device? 
Absolutely! GoFish Cam has developed a mobile application to work with your Smartphone. It works alongside the camera wirelessly. We encourage users to review, edit, and share footage. Currently, the video cannot be streamed in real-time underwater. That's a feature we're working on.
How to Use the GoFish Cam?
The camera can be used for three different fishing styles; Trolling, Casting, Bottom Fishing.
Trolling & Casting:





Trolling is the most popular style the GoFish Cam is used for. In this style of fishing there exists the most tension, as there is always a drag. The drag keeps the camera extremely steady and will allow exceptional quality footage.
Casting is another popular style the GoFish Cam is used for. In this style of fishing there may be some shaky footage, but we are working on some new features for production to fix that. Currently, heavier lures for casting works better than lighter ones.
Bottom Fishing:





The GoFish Cam can also be used for bottom fishing. In this style of fishing, make sure the weight is attached before the camera as per above. This will help the camera face the bait to capture the right footage. 
How Do I Attach The GoFish Cam To My Line?
The GoFish Cam is very easy to attach to a fishing line. There are two ends to the camera. The back end will be attached to the casting line and the front end to your leader line. You can either tie the lines straight to the camera or tie your line to a snap and use that to connect to the camera.
How Do You Stop The Camera From Spinning?
The camera is built with a stabilization fin. The fin works best when there is tension or drag from both ends of the camera. As long as you're trolling, reeling in, or battling a fish you'll find less spinning. The more action, the more stable! We're also working on new features for the production run to ensure that we minimize any spinning (hopefully fully).
How Far Does The WiFi Go?
The WiFi has been tested to 40Ft out of water.
Current technology for WiFi does not allow it to go speak to a mobile devicde under water as the water disrupts the signal. We are working closely with researchers and different institutions to make sure that when WiFi has under water capabilities, the GoFish Cam does too!
How Does The WiFi Work?
The GoFish Cam emits its own WiFi signal. The camera works similar to how your house's WiFi; when you leave the range of your house your phone disconnects, and once your phone comes back into range, it reconnects. When the camera comes back into range of your phone, it picks up on the WiFi signal and reconnects. This allows you to review all the footage on your GoFish Cam via our app on your mobile device.   


Follow along with the GoFish Cam team and keep up with our progress: http://www.GoFishCam.com

story:
• Transforming the traditional film camera into an instant camera without any modifications 
  • An unprecedented instant photography experience using your most reliable and familiar camera and lens 
  • Innovative design allows you to carry or store it easily and freely 
  • Discovering the real you 
  • Utilizing the commonly used Fujifilm Instax Square instant film

From the beginning of the twentieth century until today, 135 Single Lens Reflex (SLR) and Rangefinder cameras are dependable, lightweight, and leading technology in capturing countless classic images.

Now, you can use Fujifilm Instax Square through the Instant Magny 35 in the decisive moment. The new camera accessory, the Instant Magny 35, enables you to use a 135 SLR and Rangefinder camera to capture instant photographs. It is specifically designed to capture images using film cameras without any modifications, bringing passionate photographers an unprecedented instant photography experience!

An instant photo turns a moment into a solid photo eternally, which charms photographers of all generations. The Instant Magny 35, developed by NINM Lab, is ideal for SLR and Rangefinder cameras of Leica, Nikon, Canon and Olympus. Let all passionate film photographers experience the feeling and control of images developing.

  • Detach the original camera back
  • Install the Instant Magny 35's enlarging optics film back onto the camera
  • Then, attach 3 parts properly.
  • Pull the dark-slide on the Instant Magny 35
  • Proceed to take the picture as usual. Press the film ejection button and take the film out to develop

 

 

  • For convenience, the Instant Magny 35 uses a strong mechanical modular design. It is comprised of enlarging optics film back, aluminum lens barrel, and film ejection unit. These three components are connected by a bayonet mount, making it simple to assemble and disassemble in order to transport or store. 

  • With an integrated dark-slide and control of the on-off switch, accidental shots are prevented and error of taking out film without shooting is eliminated

  • Unlimited multiple exposure to inspire unlimited creative ideas

  • A film counter LED tells the user the number of film(s) left

Seeing your image in a photograph is seeing from the others’ perspective. People tend to be more familiar with their image in the mirror, but seeing themselves in pictures is not. However, when you use the Instant Magny 35 to capture portraits, the subject will feel more intimate with the image because this is the true “you” that you see in the mirror every day. 

Due to the focal plane of the Instant Magny 35 through a monolithic mirror, a mirror image is projected onto the Instax Square Instant film, which is the ideal result from the consideration of optical engineering and the process of product development. As a result, a familiar image of the subject can be captured as the photographer is taking portraits.

The 135 instant backs previously developed were not designed for general use, an example being the Speed Magny system introduced by Nikon in the 60s. In 1959, Nikon revealed Nikon F and brought the SLR technology up to a professional level. When Japan’s economy took off towards globalization in the 60s, two large scale events took place in Japan. One was the 1964 Tokyo Olympics and the other was the Expo of 1970 in Osaka. Both events provided Japan with important opportunities to showcase their technology and management skills to the world. 

Nikon mastered the world’s most exceptional photography system at the time, such as releasing photos immediately during those two important events. At that time, Mikami Co. LTD Tokyo Japan, a Japanese optics company, invented an attachment for Nikon F to produce polaroid pictures - Speed Magny 100. It could magnify the 135 image to almost 4x5 large Polaroid peel-apart instant film. With the instant Polaroid, images were able to be published to the world immediately. However, the Speed Magny was not suitable for general use due to the large size and heavy weight. Now, the Polaroid peel-apart film has stopped production.

The Instant Magny 35 utilizes lightweight and sturdy engineering plastic and aluminum alloy. The use of these materials brings the total weight to 485 grams, similar to the weight of an iPad, which is only a quarter of the weight of the Nikon Speed Magny (approximately 2 kg). As the weight is roughly the same as general zoom lenses, you can shoot easily without burden.

 

The Instant Magny 35’s optic scheme enlarges the 24x24mm focal plane image to 62x62mm. Travel distance of the optic dimension needs to be over 10cm, so the Instax Square Back cannot be assembled in the back of the camera. As a result, the design of the Instant Magny 35 includes a high reflective rate mirror to lead the optic axis to the lower portion of the camera. In addition, it greatly shortens the rear extended optical structure. Regardless of whether the SLR or Rangefinder camera is used, it can be easily connected to the Instant Magny 35 and is ready to shoot at any scene.

The design of a high reflective rate mirror reduces the light loss of an image during the enlarging process. In the past, the Nikon Speed Magny adopted a design of double mirrors, which could convert the image back to normal, but was responsible for the large size of the camera. It also led to another serious issue: the light loss rate hitting 5 stops during the enlarging process. The Instant Magny’s light loss rate is controlled within 3 stops and its exposure value simultaneously turns the ISO800 on Instax Square film to ISO100. As the aperture lens system on the 135 camera is relatively large, the Instant Magny is a convenient and reliable accessory for taking instant photographs.

UPDATE @ Oct 9 2018 - 
Photos taken with latest Nikon Version Functional Prototype

UPDATE @ Aug 9 2018 - 
Photos taken with Leica Version Functional Prototype!

Camera: Leica M3 | Lens : Summicron 90mm f2 Version 1 @ f/4

UPDATE @ Jul 6 2018 - 
Photos taken with Nikon Version Functional Prototype!

Camera : Nikon FM-2 + Lens : Nikkor 50mm f1.2 @f4

  • Film: Fujifilm Instax Square
  • Exposure area: 62mm x 62mm 
  • Enlarging lens construction: 2 Groups 5 Elements 
  • Enlarging lens aperture: f/4 
  • Maximum effective aperture: f/4 (If using aperture larger than f/4, the incoming light value will remain at f/4. Yet, you can still get the narrow depth of field effect.)
  • Reflex Mirror: Front Surface Mirror 
  • Power Supply: 4 x AAA batteries 
  • Film Feeding Out: Automatic 
  • Others: LED film counter, tripod socket, dark slide 
  • Dimension: 
    • Film Ejection Unit: 118 (L) x 123 (W) x 34.8 (H) mm
    • Aluminum Lens Barrel: 96 (L) x 96 (W) x 62.64 (H) mm
    • Nikon Enlarging Optics Film Back: 65.98 (L) x 141 (W) x 53.2 (H) mm
    • Leica Enlarging Optics Film Back: 50 (L) x 89.5 (W) x 51.8 (H) mm
    • Olympus / Canon Enlarging Optics Film Back: TBC
  • Weight: Approx. 485g (without battery and film pack)

We ship worldwide! Our logistic hub is located in Hong Kong. International orders may be subject to import taxes and handling fee. We hate international taxes as you do; however, we cannot get rid of it. We highly appreciate your understanding.

NINM Lab team is comprised of members from all over the world, including experienced product designers, engineers, and marketing consultants.

We are passionate about photography, music, coffee and products full of rich history. Many years of production experience has provided the team members with innovative product concepts, as well as the ability to turn imaginative concepts into reality.

The Instant Magny 35 is our first product, and is a team member as well - the specialty of optic engineers. But NINM Lab is not limited to only photographic products, we will bring many new innovative and unpredictable designs in the near future.

We sincerely thank you for your support!

Press Enquiry: hello@ninmlab.com

Download Press Kit

Risks and challenges

NINM Lab’s team members have extensive experience in development of products, so we are well aware that developing a new product is not easy and there are various variables involved in the process.

We are devoted to making the Instant Magny 35 compatible with more brands of SLR and Rangefinder cameras. Currently, the Instant Magny 35 is available for specific cameras from 4 major brands. The core technology of the Instant Magny 35 is an optic system developed to magnify 135 frames into Instax Square. In theory, the Instant Magny 35 can turn all 135 frame cameras into instant cameras. Specific camera models of five major brands are currently compatible. Our team is working hard to develop the compatibility on other cameras. Our emphasis is on the ability to remove the 135 camera back. Stay tuned for more developments!

NINM Lab’s team members are as passionate about photography as you are, so we are doing our best to develop products with an affordable price that satisfy you and make you proud. With the cooperation of the factory, we hope to ship the Instant Magny 35 to all of you promptly. However, the production process is full of unexpected circumstances. We will make regular announcement regarding the production process.

We sincerely thank you for your support!

story:
Short Summary

Hi, I'm Kris!

A photographer from Birmingham, UK. I'm a nightclub photographer too, that's where I make my living & how I pay my bills. I work with some of the biggest events in the UK (Gatecrasher & Uprawr)

Something unfortunately happened on Friday 3rd October which caused my main lens I use to shoot each event to break in two pieces (it's being held together with duct tape at the moment)

This is where YOU come in, I need £500 to buy a replacement lens so I can continue shooting & making a living.

Thankfully I have some great friends who are willing to let me borrow a similar lens for the duration of this campaign, but that's only two weeks!

It'd mean a lot if you could donate, THANK YOU!

What I Need & What You Get

  • The funds will completely be spent on buying a new replacement lens, even if I don't get the full funding, any money will help!
  • I'm willing to offer some awesome perks for rad donations.

The Impact

  • This is my livelihood & how I keep a roof over my head, the impact is great as this is how I pay all my bills!


Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that times are hard & some people can't contribute, but even if you can share this out to other people that would be amazing!
