story:
Campaign Goal

Hi Everyone.  We are excited to announce that the Seek Mount will be exhibited at 

Eureka Park at CES 2018 in Las Vegas!

We are looking for a few early backers to help support us in accelerating the prototype design and getting everything ready for this fantastic opportunity.

Be an early supporter and lock in a discount of up to

50% OFF 

of the launch price as well as other award options.  Please see the awards section for details.

 

                                                          

Seek Mount Product Description

The Seek Mount consists of a tracking mount and a marker tag.  Attach a small camera like a GoPro, cell phone, or point-and-shoot to the mount and it will automatically  follow the tag wherever it goes.  The Seek Mount can be used in a fixed position or on-the-move and is ready to track as soon as the power is turned on. Combine this with a range of 600 feet and the Seek Mount will give you a versatile and easy-to-use system for capturing all of life's great moments.

 

Final System Rendering

 

 

Use the Seek Mount on-the-go or in a stationary position

 

Use with multiple camera types

 

Product Features

  • ​Range:                               3 to 600 feet (field tested)
  • Users:                                50 simultaneous (bench tested)
  • Pan Range:                      360 degrees continuous
  • Tilt Range:                       +-90 degrees
  • Tracking Speed:             ~180 degrees/second (field tested)
  • Tracking Modes:             slow/medium/fast/TBD
  • Mount Run Time:            ~2.5 hours (calculated)
  • Tag Run Time:                 ~4 hours (calculated)
  • Mount Size:                      2.8" diameter, 1.5" height
  • Tag Size:                            2.6" diameter, 0.5" height 

 

 

 

                                                          

Risks & Challenges

A significant amount of the risk for this project was centered around the development of the custom tracking sensor that is the heart of the Seek Mount system.  Many months and years were spent researching, designing, and testing this sensor until we achieved the performance required to utilize it in a product design.  Particular attention was paid to maintaining a compact manufacturable design, with extremely high performance, and a very low final cost that is suitable for a consumer electronics product.  We are happy to say that most of the substantial risk associated with this system has been driven down by this effort and we are confident and ready to move on to the pre-production and manufacturing stages for this project.  The next stages of the design process will of course carry their own risks and challenges, but the Seek Mount team along with its manufacturing partners have the experience and tools necessary to advance this system into a final commercial product.    

 

                                                          

Experience & Background

Hi, my name is Joe Cardenas and I am the Co-Founder of Moov Electronics and the principal designer of the Seek Mount system. I have over a decade of experience working as an Electrical Engineer with companies ranging from small technology firms to the largest defense contractors.  I hold an MS degree in Electrical Engineering and have been heavily involved in fundamental research and development as well as end-to-end product design during my career.  My true passion is developing unique technologies for the consumer market that have the potential to bring new and interesting capabilities into our everyday world.  

The Seek Mount is one of these projects and I look forward to having you involved.  Selecting a perk would be great, but even just leaving some feedback in the campaign or video comments would be much appreciated.  It would be great to get as much input on this project as possible, so please share this with whoever you think might be interested using the indiegogo share tools. 

Thanks again for checking out this campaign page and I look forward to receiving your input.

story:
* As of February 17, 2016

With the best light reduction and resolution capabilities, PowerXND 2000 filters can be used in a wide variety photography as well as video applications. It’s one filter that can replace multiple fixed ND filters.

The PowerXND 2000 has 11 stops (ND 2000) of light reduction capability which has been only available with a few fixed neutral density (ND) filters until now.
See the PowerXND 2000 variable ND filter in simulation:


Designed in California, the PowerXND 2000 has an innovative filter frame design which reduces the overall volume of the filter. This reduced profile is important for keeping vignetting to a minimum on wide angle lenses.

The filter frame of the PowerXND 2000 is optimized to reduce height and volume. With a filter height of 5.5mm when mounted on a lens, the PowerXND 2000 is about half the height of other variable ND filters and has a smaller overall volume.

Multiple layers of nano coating are applied to glass surfaces for anti-reflection purposes and to protect filter surface from dust, water, oil, and soil contaminations.

Multiple layers of nano coating are applied to glass surfaces for anti-reflection purposes and to protect filter surface from dust, water, oil, and soil contaminations.

Multiple layers of nano coating are applied to glass surfaces for anti-reflection purposes and to protect filter surface from dust, water, oil, and soil contaminatio

Neutral density filters can be used to reduce light passing through them so that A slower shutter speed can be used. 

When taking a photo of a waterfall or moving stream, a slow shutter speed can be utilized to produce a pleasing yet smooth photo.

For example, this photo is taken In a sunny afternoon in Southern California, using the PowerXND 2000 can bring down the shutter speed to 5" instead of 1/100".

Please visit the Gallery section for sample photos. They are taken with an early prototype of the PowerXND 2000. Some of them are post processed slightly for artistic purposes such as color saturation. 


Specifications

  • Range:  ND 16 – 2000 (ND 1.2 – 3.3, or 4 – 11 stops) 
  • Slim profile of 5.5mm (37 - 82mm), 8.5mm (95mm and 105mm)
  • Available filter thread sizes:
  • 37mm, 39mm, 40.5mm, 43mm, 46mm, 49mm, 52mm, 55mm, 58mm, 62mm, 67mm, 72mm, 77mm, 82mm, 86mm, 95mm, and 105mm.

  • MSRP $189  $139 - One PowerXND 2000 filter in the large size group, including 67mm, 72mm, 77mm, and 82mm. 
  • MSRP $124  $90 - One PowerXND 2000 filter in the medium size group, including 49mm, 52mm, 55mm, 58mm, and 62mm.
  • MSRP $80  $59 - One PowerXND 2000 filter in the small size group, including 37mm, 39mm, 40.5mm, 43mm, and 46mm. 
  • MSRP $245   $180 - One 86mm PowerXND 2000 filter. 
  • MSRP $329  $242 - One 95mm PowerXND 2000 filter. 
  • MSRP $479  $352 - One 105mm PowerXND 2000 filter.
Shipping within the USA is free. We charge a nominal fee for international shipping.

Risks & Challenges

The design work is finalized. The final filter design is slightly different in visual appearane than the prototype filter shown in the video and photos. We will update them once we have the nearly full production samples.

Full production once the funding will be started in April. Shipment is scheduled for May.



Since the launch of our Kickstarter campaign, the PowerXND 2000 has been featured on many websites and blog sites. 


We finally receive a test report from an Imatest Certified Lab. They put four ND filters through several tests: Aurora PowerXND 2000, Brand B variable ND (4 - 400), Brand H variable ND (4 - 400), and Brand H round glass based ND 1000 filter.

A summary of the test report is available at: http://aurora-aperture.com/2016/03/30/powerxnd-2000-lab-test/

As seen in the report, the Aurora PowerXND 2000 achieves highest score across all ND settings, even slightly ahead of the Brand H fixed ND 1000 filter.

Next is color check. All variable filters are tested in MIN setting. Again, the Aurora PowerXND 2000 achieves highest color accuracy result.

FAQ

  • What does ND 16 or ND 200 mean? 

    There are two ND notation systems, one with an integer number such as ND 16, and another with a decimal number such as ND 1.2. The integer notation represents the amount of light transmittance decided by that number. For example, the light transmittance of ND 2 is 1/2 (50%) or one stop, whereas ND 16 is 1/16 (6.25%) or four stops. In other words, an ND 2000 filter only allows 1/2000 or 0.05% of the light being passed.

    The decimal system uses 0.3 as incremental value for each stop. Thus an ND 1.2 is same as ND 16. For further information, please refer to this Wikipedia article :https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Neutral-density_filter

  • Does my (fill in the blank) camera or lens work with PowerXND 2000 filter? D

    As long as the lens has a standard filter thread and it matches one of the sizes we offer, the PowerXND 2000 filter will work with your camera and lens. Some lenses do not have a filter thread such as Nikon AF-S 14-24/2.8G or Canon EF 11-24/4L, they are no supported with the PowerXND 2000 filter, yet. Some fixed lens cameras like GoPro also do not have a filter thread but there are third party filter adaptors available.

  • When using the PowerXND 2000 filter near or at the maximum setting, the camera can not auto focus. What is the solution? 

    At the maximum setting, there is only 1/2000 or 0.05% of light entering the camera. This may be well below the camera’s AF low light limit. The solution is to put the filter at the minimum setting, perform framing and focus, lock the focus by switching focus mode to manual focus position or using other focus lock mechanism on the camera. Then carefully rotate the PowerXND 2000 front ring to the desired setting without causing the camera to move, then take a picture. In fact this is an advantage of using the PowerXND 2000 variable ND filter than using fixed ND filters since there is little chance of moving camera position by carefully rotating the front ring.

  • Pictures taken with PowerXND 2000 at the maximum setting are way under exposed. Why is that? 

    This is most likely caused by the camera metering system being interfered by light leakage from the camera’s viewfinder eyepiece. At the maximum setting very little amount of light enters the camera through the lens, whereas light from the optical viewfinder at the back of the camera could leak into the camera metering system and amount of leaked light could be more than the light from the lens, thus the metering system would fail.

    Many DSLR cameras have a viewfinder eyepiece shutter that can be closed. It’s strongly recommended to close this shutter before taking a picture when using the PowerXND 2000 filter at the maximum setting. If there is no built in eyepiece shutter in your camera, use whatever available to block the viewfinder eyepiece when taking a picture, or switch to liveview mode.

  • What do the scale indicators (round dots) on the filter mean? Are they directly related to the light reduction stop? 

    No, the scale indicators on the filter are indication of variable ND light reduction direction and they do not correlated to ND value. When setting the filter to the Min setting, it’s at ND 16 or four stops. When setting to the Max setting, it’s at ND 2000 or 11 stops.

  • Will you make the scale indicators directly related to each stop? 

    Currently there is no plan to have scale indicators calibrated to each ND stop. There is a technical difficulty in doing so since the f-stop is not linear light transmittance. If we were to make the scale indicators related to each ND stop, there would be very crowded indicators near the MAX end of the scale. We will try to find a better solution in the future.

  • Is the PowerXND 2000 color tint free?

    Within most of the working range the filter is color tint free. When the filter is set to nearing the maximum ND, there may be a slight magenta tint that can be easily corrected in post processing such as adjusting white balance.

  • Does the PowerXND 2000 filter have cross X patterns common in variable ND filters? 

    There is a MAX indicator on the PowerXND 2000 filter. When using the filter inside the MAX range, there is no cross X pattern. However, when turning the filter passed the MAX setting, heavy blue cast and distortion could happen which is outside of the filter specification already. We do not recommend using the PowerXND 2000 filter over the MAX setting.

    It’s worth to mention that variable ND filters in the market today all exhibit this cross X patterns when being set to over seven stops, our PowerXND 2000 filter is very clean and safe to use at seven stops due to the four stops extra headroom.

  • Can you use a physical limiter to prevent users rotating the filter passed the MAX setting?  

    We could put a physical limiter in the filter so users will not able to see the cross X patterns. However, by doing so the filter frame would become much bulky and won’t maintain the slim frame structure which is important to prevent vignetting. We choose to allow users to select what is acceptable range to themselves and to use the slim frame as a higher priority.
story_txt:
* As of February 17, 2016
With the best light reduction and resolution capabilities, PowerXND 2000 filters can be used in a wide variety photography as well as video applications. It’s one filter that can replace multiple fixed ND filters.

The PowerXND 2000 has 11 stops (ND 2000) of light reduction capability which has been only available with a few fixed neutral density (ND) filters until now.See the PowerXND 2000 variable ND filter in simulation:



Designed in California, the PowerXND 2000 has an innovative filter frame design which reduces the overall volume of the filter. This reduced profile is important for keeping vignetting to a minimum on wide angle lenses.
The filter frame of the PowerXND 2000 is optimized to reduce height and volume. With a filter height of 5.5mm when mounted on a lens, the PowerXND 2000 is about half the height of other variable ND filters and has a smaller overall volume.
Multiple layers of nano coating are applied to glass surfaces for anti-reflection purposes and to protect filter surface from dust, water, oil, and soil contaminations.

Multiple layers of nano coating are applied to glass surfaces for anti-reflection purposes and to protect filter surface from dust, water, oil, and soil contaminations.


Multiple layers of nano coating are applied to glass surfaces for anti-reflection purposes and to protect filter surface from dust, water, oil, and soil contaminatio

Neutral density filters can be used to reduce light passing through them so that A slower shutter speed can be used. 
When taking a photo of a waterfall or moving stream, a slow shutter speed can be utilized to produce a pleasing yet smooth photo.


For example, this photo is taken In a sunny afternoon in Southern California, using the PowerXND 2000 can bring down the shutter speed to 5" instead of 1/100".
Please visit the Gallery section for sample photos. They are taken with an early prototype of the PowerXND 2000. Some of them are post processed slightly for artistic purposes such as color saturation. 



Specifications


Range:  ND 16 – 2000 (ND 1.2 – 3.3, or 4 – 11 stops) 
Slim profile of 5.5mm (37 - 82mm), 8.5mm (95mm and 105mm)
Available filter thread sizes:
37mm, 39mm, 40.5mm, 43mm, 46mm, 49mm, 52mm, 55mm, 58mm, 62mm, 67mm, 72mm, 77mm, 82mm, 86mm, 95mm, and 105mm.



MSRP $189  $139 - One PowerXND 2000 filter in the large size group, including 67mm, 72mm, 77mm, and 82mm.

story:
What is The Universal Lens Hood? 

At some point in shooting, we utilize lens hoods to enhance our shot and/or protect our lenses. The Universal Lens Hood is the best way to both enhance and protect your camera lenses. Period.

It's designed to fit 99% of camera lenses. It holds any sized circular filter and can help enhance any photo. Truly a universal, durable and multi-functional product backed by a lifetime warranty from the company that has set out to keeping your photography gear KUVRD (pronounced 'covered').

Now you can travel with less gear and less stress knowing you can remove any glare/reflection from any shot, enhance your photo using any sized circular filter with any sized lens and still have the added protection wanted against the elements.

 

Here at KUVRD (pronounced 'covered'), our passion has been to outfit modern explorers to move forward with less.

Going on two and half years now, we’ve been doing just that by designing innovative camera accessories and successfully funding them here on Kickstarter.

The goal has always been the same; to create tools that help eliminate photographer's anxieties and enhance their workflow. And now, more than ever before, we're thrilled to state, "We've done it again". And this time, with our most innovative product yet;

The Universal Lens Hood.

 

Testimonials

Kelly Lopez

Warranty

The Universal Lens Hood does have a warranty. In fact, a lifetime warranty! For as long as you own the product, you're 100% insured against defects in material and workmanship. However, we do NOT provide a warranty against damage or any other defects/issues caused to your lenses WHILE using or NOT using the Universal Lens Hood. In addition, we will not replace lost or stolen Universal Lens Hoods.

If your lens breaks while using our product, we are not liable for your camera gear, its repair/replacement, nor act as a financial insurance agency against potentially harmful issues to your camera gear, especially your lenses. The Universal Lens Hoods acts as an enhancing tool to prevent glare and help to avert elements from potentially contacting your lens. That is it. We strongly advise you seek out and invest in insurance for your gear just as any other professional would do in any other industry! :)

Customs & Duties

Unfortunately, we cannot mark any pledge/reward as a 'gift'. It is illegal to do so. In addition, import duties and taxes are NOT INCLUDED in our reward levels. These charges vary by country and are completely out of our control. We are shipping the Universal Lens Hood all over the world and it is impossible for us to build the various customs charges into the multiple reward levels of Kickstarter.

But, this online tool can help you calculate additional costs;

http://www.importcalculator.com

Remember, we are the creators of KUVRD and the Universal Lens Hood, not international customs. You can use this tool as estimates when determining additional costs in receiving our products.

Risks and Challenges

Our biggest foreseeable challenge will be properly calculating, negotiating, and fixating costs and pricing with manufacturers for materials. Silicone is a rather volatile material, where, based on municipal laws, seasons and other related material-based industries, much of the cost of material used in the Universal Lens Hood can almost double overnight thanks to some shift or change in one of those aforementioned factors.

Luckily, we've already made a Purchase Order for 20,000 units of the Universal Lens Hood! Hopefully if we need to make another PO for this Campaign, based on the demand and current pricing of silicone, we'll be able to fixate or even decrease the unit cost! Our second biggest challenge is determining a realistic 'estimated date of delivery'. Based on our history with our current chosen manufacturers, we can have a unit created and in our hands within 45 days. Taking into account holidays, quantity of units, priority of our order with the manufacturer and shipping to customers worldwide, we gave ourselves a buffer of an additional 60 days to handle any 'hiccups' throughout the process.

There are always unforeseeable risks, setbacks and hiccups which is why we plan to be transparent and do everything we can to keep our customers (you, the backer) happy.

story:
Whether you’re a photo or video enthusiast, semi-enthusiast, hobbyist, smartphone journalist or a full professional, there’s no doubt the goosepod will find multiple uses in your video or photo creator’s kit.

Typical Uses

In 2016, my 10-year-old daughter and I created a YouTube channel we called Osmo Tips. We had just purchased the DJI Osmo, a handheld, 3 axis, gimbal-stabilized camera that shoots smooth video.

Our goal was to share as many tips and tricks on using the Osmo. 

In a relatively short time, we attracted the attention of thousands of photo and video enthusiasts from around the globe.  To keep our YouTube audience inspired, we went all out to review as many camera gear or accessories that would work with the Osmo. This was our first insight into the opportunity that would become the goosepod.

To keep up with the intense nature of our video creating process, we constantly searched for quick and efficient ways to make the most of the gear needed to shoot our videos. 

All our shoots involve mounting and setting up the multi-cameras, lights, microphones, audio recorders as well as the gear we're actually reviewing.  This often took ages… sometimes more time than the actual shoot itself, and usually spreading over a few days.

Releasing a video every week, meant it was only a few days before we started the whole process all over again and again and again...

 Something had to change…

We took a really long hard look at the products available on the market today but felt that they all fell short in one way or another…We knew we wanted the most flexible, yet robust system to mount our gear easily and reliably. We wanted a material that would bend easily, maintain it’s shape, and sustain the weights of most camera gear.(500g – 1kg).  

Armed with this requirement, we got in touch with a local tube manufacturer and after several weeks of tweaking our design and specifications, we started working through several prototypes to a point where we are ready to launch the real thing .

The Making of Prototype #12

The goosepod consists of a main tube, the backbone, that has a ¼ inch male tripod thread on one end, and a ¼ inch female thread on the other end, both of which are standard thread connections used between a camera and a tripod or other accessories.

The goosepod modular system consists of a backbone and several optional adaptors and attachments, that make it quick and easy to mount most camera gear and accessories. 

As Easy as 1,2,3!

It Works great with Quick Fit Adapters!

 

The goosepod’s flexibility comes directly from its construction. It is made from gooseneck tubing which is nothing new of course, but the way we have approached the specifications of this particular gooseneck material, means it can be used where maximum positional accuracy, support and mechanical strength is required. 

To make the goosepod strong and durable, we opted to use a military grade spring with a mild steel 'D' section wire to achieve unique “stay-put” properties, which allows the goosepod to maintain its bending radius.

The complete range of goosepods will cater for light, medium and heavy-duty cameras and accessories. We have developed specifications for 3 tube diameters, each one coming in 2 lengths, so we’ve got you covered. 

In order to bring the goosepod to life we need your generous support to help us cover the initial cost of tooling and first production runs. With higher production volumes, the price of the goosepod will come down, a direct benefit for everyone.

In return, you will have contributed to the quest to make shooting days efficient, fun and productive. This is the quest for the goose!

How You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Make a Pledge and Back the goosepod. Be part of a movement that sees the potential of the goosepod as a serious camera gear mount and accessory.
  • Get the word out and make some noise about the goosepod on social media, in your circles or simply around your friends and family.
  • Sharing is simple - Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Choose a Perk that's right for you

After the campaign ends and only if we have been successfully funded and received the full backing required, we will contact you with detailed updates, right up to the time your goosepod arrives on your doorstep.

Our aim is to have the goosepod in your hands, just  in time for Summer 2017!

1.    Kickstarter Campaign Starts

2.    Kickstarter Campaign Ends

3.    Industrial Production Begins

4.    Shipping Begins

​

Once we hit our target fund goal, we will be unlocking additional reward options to add to the goosepod stable. 

£10,000 – choose a color for your goosepod

£15,000 – choose a silicon rubber coating for your goosepod 

£20,000 -  choose a different base mount for your goosepod 

Risks and challenges

We are dedicated to producing and delivering the goosepod to our backers in the highest quality standard and on schedule. 
We have passed prototype and testing stages successfully and are confident about the production process. 
As with all Indiegogo projects, delays and unforeseen incidents may occur. We are dedicated to working towards solving them all.

Choose a Perk that's right for youAfter the campaign ends and only if we have been successfully funded and received the full backing required, we will contact you with detailed updates, right up to the time your goosepod arrives on your doorstep.Our aim is to have the goosepod in your hands, just  in time for Summer 2017!1.    Kickstarter Campaign Starts2.    Kickstarter Campaign Ends3.    Industrial Production Begins4.    Shipping Begins​Once we hit our target fund goal, we will be unlocking additional reward options to add to the goosepod stable. £10,000 – choose a color for your goosepod£15,000 – choose a silicon rubber coating for your goosepod £20,000 -  choose a different base mount for your goosepod Risks and challengesWe are dedicated to producing and delivering the goosepod to our backers in the highest quality standard and on schedule. We have passed prototype and testing stages successfully and are confident about the production process. As with all Indiegogo projects, delays and unforeseen incidents may occur. We are dedicated to working towards solving them all.

story:
The world’s first 3D 8K 360° VR camera embedded with AI chip for professionals

Detu MaxMobile is a professional grade AI 360° virtual reality panoramic camera that is equipped with true 3D capabilities. The camera can capture stunning 12K images, 8K videos and live stream (wired and wireless) with incredible clarity.

Designed for professional photographers and VR content creators, the camera is equipped with an AI chip to create superior quality UHD real 3D VR images. The AI chip enables real-time object tracking to capture realistic 3D portraits. The deep learning algorithm also selects and stitches together the videos and images inside the camera - without the need for a PC.

Detu MAX has already been awarded German Design Award 2019 and CES Asia Innovation Award 2018 for its outstanding features and professional photographers aimed design.

"There’s 3D, 8K, 360, VR, AI, HDR, RAW and stabilization all packed into a metallic body. That turned out to be enough to get the Detu completely funded in just ten minutes on Kickstarter" -Digital Trends

"The 'Detu MAX' camera works by imitating the way the human eye captures its surroundings...This means that the content will be more comfortable for users to experience to push them further into the rendering than ever before." - Trend Hunter

 

MaxMobile imitates how your eyes capture the world. Create the most lifelike 3D panoramic images and 360° views with binocular visual image simulation. See true 3D images with MaxMobile through VR glasses to experience the most realistic VR immersion.

MaxMobile can take 3D images with perfect clarity from a distance of 1 meter. With MaxMobile content creators are never held back, they can get close to their subject and create the very best 3D content. 

 

 
*Hint: Please select the 8K 3D resolution to see the MAX details.
 

Click to watch one of our demo videos below:

1. On-vechicle capturing:

 

2. In the middle of a boxing ring:

 

3. In a coffee shop:

 

If you're interested in seeing the unstitched footage from the Detu MaxMobile click "here". 

 

 

Take a drive, explore the wild, set off into the sunset on an endless road, seize moments of freedom. Aerial photo breathtaking sceneries on earth from a new perspective. Sometimes, beauties vanished before we had time to react.

That’s why we create MaxMobile. It can be mounted on any type of vehicles, aims to help you capture vivid 3D view in 360° directions dynamically during the journey.

 

Want to share the journey with your families, friends, even the world? MaxMobile is exactly what you are looking for. Equipped with 4G module, 4K@120fps 3D High-speed capturing, in-camera stitching, six-axis stabilization, portable designed, it can do stable live streaming anywhere.

The MaxMobile captures and produces stereoscopic virtual reality 360°. Use VR glasses to experience the most realistic VR immersion, courtesy of the MaxMobile.

 

Get real-time object detection. Advanced and powerful AI technology ensures subjects are always in perspective. Simply select the area to be tracked and MaxMobile will do the rest. 

Object-tracking is a perfect tool while live streaming, it can track a presenter walking across a stage and ensure they are never lost from shot. 

Detu MaxMobile includes an AI chip with powerful deep learning capabilities to create 12K photos and 4K 3D videos inside the camera, without the need for a PC.

The AI chip also enables the camera to track objects with ease. 

 

 

Engineered to enable users to create 3D VR live streams with ease, the camera can connect to a computer via an Ethernet cable, or wireless live streaming is possible over 2.4G and 5G dual Wi-Fi. It can live stream directly to YouTube, Facebook, and other 360°-enabled platforms.

 

Get extreme detail and color reproduction capacity with high-dynamic-range (HDR) imaging and video. Visualize stunningly detailed panoramas at up to 12K resolution.

Ensure professional quality images every time with Detu MaxMobile.

Maintaining the highest quality is critical. With Detu MaxMobile, all photo and video files are preserved in their original format so you’ll always be working with the highest quality RAW photos and LOG videos. 

Store content easily with dual SD cards. It is recommended to use higher capacity and writing speed cards especially if filming.

 

 

The 4800mAh lithium-ion high capacity removable battery supports up to 60 minutes of continuous shooting. You can purchase a second battery and swap out during shoots if needed.

The MaxMobile Tripod is a portable, but sturdy solution for filmmakers to create that perfect shot. It can be adapted in height easily to accommodate any environment. 

 

 

 

 

 

We know firsthand how important it is to always have be prepared for the moment when your battery dies so we’ve worked with our logistics company to provide these add-ons to you at no additional shipping charge.

  • Pledge an additional $49 to receive the external battery charger with your pre-order. 
  • Pledge an additional $69 to receive an extra removable battery with your pre-order.

You can add as many of these add-ons as you would like.

Detu MAX Debut at NAB SHOW 2018

Some clips and pictures from when the Detu MaxMobile was first showcased at the NAB Show in Las Vegas. 

Like what you're seeing? Want to help? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!

The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make the product!

We can't do this without you.

 

Risks and challenges

Our core team is composed of four members with over 30 years of experience in creating and delivering high-quality camera products so we’ve been around the block and know how to deliver.

We are so excited about this project and have had many sleepless nights making sure that everything is perfect. Still, as with any hardware project, challenges may arise. Unexpected delays related to manufacturing, production or natural disaster sometimes occur. Materials and component shortages can happen as well. We can’t foresee every problem so we’re committed to fixing any challenges that may arise during the fulfillment process.

We are holding ourselves and our partners to the highest standards because we want to deliver the most amazing camera this world has ever seen.

story:
Who's Dan?

As a professional photographer, I have been fortunate enough to capture images of people thriving in various landscapes around the globe.  Whether it's a rock climber pulling down on overhanging stone, a yogi experiencing a glimpse of enlightenment or a Nepali farmer having tea along a Himalayan trail - I love to witness and document people living their passions. 

 

What's Dan Doing?

It gives me great pleasure to announce that I will be spending time in Ecuador this May volunteering my photography services and equipment to work with the non-profit organization: CRACYP (which stands for Rural Forestation and Progress Network Corporation, en Espanol).  They are in need for someone to produce powerful imagery and tell their story of environmental sustainability projects they have launched in Ecuador.

 

Who Is The CRACYP?

This NGO exists solely to facilitate reforestation and rural development in an agricultural area of extreme poverty. Their mission of "Progreso Verde" or "Green Progress" is all about social and economic development. But they do this in a way which protects the environment.  They build environmental awareness and motivate and assist local communities to take practical conservation action.  CRACYP's many sustainable development projects help to increase incomes to the point where people are able to think further ahead than the next meal and can afford to care about the environment.

 

The Bottom Line

As you all know, travel expenses are not so cheap these days. Airfare, local transportation, travel insurance, food and accommodations all add up pretty quickly. (This is the part where I ask for your help). In order to follow through with this project without having to move my wife and dog out of our house and into our Subaru, I'm going to need to raise some funds. $3000 worth of funds to be exact. 

The ultimate goal of the project will be to provide CRACYP with powerful imagery that will be used to share the organization's mission via their website, marketing material and through editorial pieces. I will also assemble a collection of images from this project for gallery exhibits around Seattle. A percentage of the proceeds from all images sold will go directly to CRACYP.

100% of the proceeds go towards the funding of this project.

If I surpass the goal of $3000, the extra funds will continue to go straight into the project for offsetting costs such as gallery exhibits, production costs and extended time in Ecuador to produce even more images

I thank you all for your consideration. If you have any questions at all, please email me at dan@danholzphotography.com. I would love to hear from you.

If you can't donate right now, no worries.  You can still help by sharing this cause with anyone who may be interested.  Pass it on!!

story:
No coards, no wiring, let you stay completely free of wiring hassles. Moobox camera offers you a new perspective to home security. It breaks the mold of traditional security cameras, and gives you the freedom to install cameras at anywhere you want. You can put it on the table,  the shelf, mount it on the wall, put it under the ceiling etc...

 

 

Moobox camera requires to work with the hub which is connecting to your home WIFI router. And one hub could connect up to 4 moobox cameras. You could easily setup them around your house and make your home more secure.

 

The camera is in the sleep mode when everything is fine. And it will wake up immediately to start video recording when any motion is detected. At the same time, an alert with the snapshot will be pushed to your smart phone and let you be aware what is happening. Moobox makes sure you never miss any important moment.

 

See live streaming video on your smartphone at any moment from anywhere. No matter you are in the office, in the hotel or even in the different city, your home is just a tap away.

 

During the live view, you can not only hear what's going on, but also talk back through your smartphone just like you are in the real scene.

 

Moobox allows you to stream live high qulity 1080P HD video without overloading your Internet bandwidth. With 120 wide-angle view and amazing night vision you can see everything from anywhere in the world.

 

The camera is battery-operated. With our MBPS technology, we makes the camera working under the extreme low power consumption mode. The camera will go into a sleep mode in the most of time and wake up immediately when motion is detected or user starts the live view from a phone. Hence, the camera could run up to 90 days for one fully charge.

 

The installation has never been that easy. 4 steps make the system up and run in mins. You are all set!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Camera live stream

Camera night vision

 Pair the Camera and the Hub

Motion detected and alerts 

 

 

 

 

  • Are you offering a warranty on moobox cam?

         Yes, we are offering a 1   warranty. 

  • Where is the videoclip stored?

There are two options for video recording.Cloud storage — video clips would be stored on our cloud (based on AWS). It would be stored for 7 days and for free.Local storage — The hub could support inside microSD card, and it could support up to 128G.

  • Whether 16G local storage would be enough?

The size of 15 seconds videoclip is about 2M. 16G storage can save more than 8000 videoclips and it should be enough for several years.

  • How long will it take to fully charge the camera? 

         It will take about 5-6 hours.

  • Where do we ship?

       We ship the products worldwide with FREE Shipping.

  • Where will you be shipping from? Have you calculated import fees?

We will be shipping from Hong Kong China, so you will need to determine additional fees and import taxes based on your country and we are not responsible for it.

  • Can you ensure a shipping date?

We are confident with our product timeline, however we will let all backers know if any unexpected changes come up.

 

E-mail : customerservice@imoobox.com

story:
Friends,

Someone broke into Aydin Tuna Palabiyikoglu's car and stole all his photographic equipment. Tuna has contributed to the Turkish community with his talent and generosity countless times. Now it is time for us to give him back, to be generous. It is time for us to show our solidarity in the community.

His cameras and photographic lenses have been stolen. Tuna makes his living (and takes wonderful pictures of our events) with the help of these equipments.

I put here $15,000 as a goal. Please contribute in any amount you can.  

Please share this in your timelines to raise more. 

Many thanks in advance,

Merve Göknar

story:
Summary

Hey everyone! My name is Justin Bond and I started J. Bond Media around a year ago. After picking up my first camera, I fell in love with photography, and my passion for it has continued to grow ever since. As I learned more, I found that this could be a way to serve people. Photography has allowed me to bless others with the skills I have been gifted with. The Opportunities I've had to photograph, promote, and document  people has allowed me to build up those around me. By showcasing peoples talents, businesses, and goods, my heart has grown to use my skill to serve others.

In order for me to continue in the direction of photography, I am in need of some improvements to my gear. Unfortunately, the camera I have now is failing  me, and has become insufficient for the quality of work I'd like to do.  This campaign is designed to help me obtain the tools that I need in order to continue to do what I love, grow my skill, and serve others. My camera has become faulty, and is no longer able to perform the necessary tasks to take high caliber photos. This has kept me from doing what I love, and providing others with quality pictures. I feel that I am called to this field, and truly do have a passion and heart for photography. Although, in order for me to do my work with excellence, I need sufficient camera gear. 

In order for me to continue doing all of this, I need your help. By your support, you are not only helping me attain the tools I need, but you are enabling me to further my passion, and ultimately your support will go to furthering others benefit.

What We Need & What You Get

Here are the details.

If you are willing to come alongside me, your generous contribution will allow me to fill the need I have for a new camera body.

Fortunately, I have had various artists and businesses that have stood by me and partnered with me. So when you give your financial support, I can give an adequate gift back to you, the supporter. So when you give, you are able to receive different offerings.

 In order for me to reach this tangible goal, I need you, the supporter. But I don't want it to just end there. Here are some of the ways I can give back to you. 

Some of these amazing perks are:

1. An 8x10 print of the famous portland, OR sign that I have photographed. 

2. An 8x10 selected print of various musical artists, autographed and personalized to you! They have graciously stood by me and are willing to support this cause! There will be a few shots of Andy Mineo, Propaganda, and Eshon Burgundy to choose from. 

3. My good friends over at Portsmith Co. have supported me and donated their famous CNCH wallets to give those of you who have donated. 

4. I am also giving away 2 hour photo sessions. Whether you are a senior, family, model, athlete, musician, or what have you, I am more than willing to photograph you for a few hours and photograph what YOU would like to capture. This will include two 8x10 prints of your choice, as well as the edited high resolution images we took from the shoot.

If for some reason, we do not make it to our goal, do not worry! These funds will be put into the piggy bank and will be added to the camera fund. This will play a crucial part in getting one step closer to this goal!

    The Impact

    In order to continue to serve people with my gifts, I need your support. Since I have blessed others with my own gifts, I am in need of reinvestment from you to help me to continue to do so. 

      Other Ways You Can Help

      If for some reason you are unable to support financially, don't worry. You can help in other ways. 

      PRAY: First of all, pray that this campaign would bring glory to God and that it would help bless people.

      SHARE: Share this campaign using the Indiegogo share tools. Spread the word and tell your friends and family. Share it on all of your social media sites! And go follow and like my Instagram!

      Your support and belief in me plays a HUGE role and I am thankful for each and everyone of you!

      Thank you!

      Justin Bond

Since I have blessed others with my own gifts, I am in need of reinvestment from you to help me to continue to do so.   Other Ways You Can HelpIf for some reason you are unable to support financially, don't worry. You can help in other ways. PRAY: First of all, pray that this campaign would bring glory to God and that it would help bless people.SHARE: Share this campaign using the Indiegogo share tools. Spread the word and tell your friends and family. Share it on all of your social media sites! And go follow and like my Instagram!Your support and belief in me plays a HUGE role and I am thankful for each and everyone of you!Thank you!Justin Bond

story:
For the very first time, you could enjoy instant film with your beloved lenses including but not limited to M42, Canon FD/EF, Exakta, Pentax K/PK, Contax/Yashica​ C/Y, Nikon F, Olympus OM.
We also offer a lens package perk if you don't have any of the lenses above but want to feel the instant magic with NONS SL42.

 

Featured On

 

An Interchangeable-lens Instant Camera

 

  • EF mount – SL42 is a passive EF mount camera, compatible with EF lens, and also lots of vintage lenses with an easy-to-get adapter.
  • Instax mini film – SL42 works with the widely-available Instax mini film.
  • Single-lens Reflex (SLR) – The precise SLR structure and prism based viewfinder inside SL42 make it easy to frame and focus accurately.
  • Intuitive design – We take care of the hard part, so you can enjoy using SL42 with its powerful, yet easy-to-use functions. SL42 is perfect for both pros and beginners.

 

 

We love instant films, we love the feeling of holding an instant photo, waiting for the image to develop. But sometimes we wish our instant camera could do more. With SL42, we hope to bring diversity & excitement into the instant film world. 

After 400 days of hard work, we succeed to combine EF mount and the instant film together.

 

 

When shooting with Instax mini film, the image field of full frame lens will provide a unique style of round frame (the diameter of frame varies with different types of lenses).

 

 

Go Beyond the Limit of Instant Camera With Various Types of Legendary Lenses

 

 

For the first time, you can enjoy experimenting with different combinations of focal lengths and apertures on instant film.

 

 

Rediscover the Joy of Film Photography, Instantly

 

Film photography is making a comeback and SL42 brings a new way to feel the authentic aesthetic of film photography. Unlike taking photos with your phone or your digital camera, with SL42 you can create a dreamy tone on your instant photos with special film grain. 

 

 

More importantly, shooting with SL42 is an absolute joyful experience. Take your time, think about the composition, exposure and focus.

Press the shutter, and witness the captured moment reappearing in front of you. A sensation that digital photography will never offer you. 

 

 

Take Total Control of Your Camera

 

SL42 offers a wide range of functions including manual focus, adjustable aperture, shutter speed control, multiple exposure, flexible adaptability for cable release, and hot shoe for external flash.

 

 

Also, with the single-lens reflex structure, you can easily see the real brightness and depth of field through the viewfinder.

 

 

With SL42, we aim to offer you the most creative possibilities and the least technical constraints for your unique creation.

Now it’s time for your imagination and creative mind to shine with SL42.

 

How to Use

 

  • Mount your lens

 

 

  • Install batteries
  • Load Instax mini film
  • Choose a shutter speed

 

 

  • Push the slider to replace the viewfinder

 

 

  • Adjust the focus

 

 

  • Press the shutter button

 

 

  • Press film ejection button and wait for the film processing

 

 

Specifications

 

  • Passive EF mount (no electronic signal to auto-focus or adjust electric control aperture)
  • Shutter Speed (11 modes): 1/500, 1/250, 1/125, 1/60, 1/30, 1/15, 1/8, 1/4, 1/2, 1 second and Bulb mode
  • Standard hot shoe
  • Power supply: 2 AA batteries
  • Film: Fujifilm Instax mini film
  • Film size: 54 x 86 mm (width x height)
  • Picture size: 46 x 62 mm (width x height)
  • Mechanical dimension: 158 x 65 x 116 mm (width x depth x height)
  • Weight: 462 g
  • Package: Camera body, EF mount cap, 2 AA batteries, Manual

 

Reward Lens

Offered in 'Early Bird Lens Package' and 'Early Bird Total Package' only.

 

  • Focus length, f=50 mm
  • Minimum focus distance, 0.4 meter
  • Aperture range, F1.8 - 22
  • Construction: 6 elements in 5 groups
  • Mechanical dimension: 63 x 46 mm (diameter x height)
  • Weight: 203 g

 

 

More Samples

 

 

Milestone

 

 

 

Reward

 

 

Bonus

 

Once reached our BONUS GOAL, which is HKD 1,000,000 (USD 128,742), a free neck strap will be provided for each camera.

 

 

  • Color, Brown; material, cowhide
  • Full length, 145 mm; leather part, 100 mm
  • Width, 1.5 mm; thickness, 0.25 mm

Media Kit

 

Please download the MEDIA KIT here.

story:
My Story

My name is Forrest Mankins. I'm 24, a professional musician, a photographer, and artist from Tulsa, Oklahoma.  I spend a good deal of time traveling and pursuing my dreams. 

  • Last week my Canon DSLR and lens were stolen from me, and I am seeking to replace them.  It's very difficult to find steady work when potential employers know you must leave to tour, write, and record at different times, and there is no other way that I will be able to replace these anytime soon.
  • I've never thought about my camera as a possesion.  It was a tool that allowed me to produce the things I constantly feel pulled to create.  I used it to share how I see the world; nature, people, places, in single moments.  I've only just begun my path with art, and I'm asking for your support.  

What exactly am I asking for, and where is it going?

I'm asking for $1485.  Why $1485?  The cheapest that I can get what I need is $980.  That's a refurbished camera, one discount lens, and a memory card.  Not an upgrade, but a replacement.  So again, why on earth would I be asking for $1485?!  The prints I am offering are on high quality photo paper, and as a result cost me a bit more - especially as individual orders. I also have to securely ship these so they arrive at your door in perfect condition. So there it is, $980 goes straight to the camera, $504 is all for production, shipping, and this website's marginal percentage.

 

  • For your contributions, I'm offering photoshoots, lessons, a lens, and of course prints!  Near the top of this page is a tab that says "Gallery."  Click on it to view photos and pick your favorite(s), and then click the "Campaign Home" tab to come back to this page and make your contribution!  Click each photo for a larger view, and to see sizing availability.  Leave the name(s) of the photos and sizes you want in the Comment Box when ordering!
  • Regardless of how much we raise, after production costs, all of it is going straight to a camera.  I don't really have an off switch when it comes to creating.  

 

One last thing 

  • If you have any questions about any of this, ask me!  I'd be more than happy to talk to you, here's my email!  forrestmankins@icloud.com
  • If you can't contribute financially, it's still a huge help if you share this with the people in your life, whether by Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Tumblr, email, etcetera -- the top of the page has a Share tool that's really easy to use  Everything truly helps and is greatly and humbly appreciated. 

Thank you so much for your support, it means the world.  

 

To view photos:

Near the top of this page is a tab called "Gallery."  Click it to see all the photos I am offering.  Clicking on a thumbnail will bring up a larger image with watermark on it, and will show sizing availability.  Click "Campaign Home" to come back to this page and order!

story:
So much more than just an encoder

YoloBox is first a recorder that we'll automatically archive all your events so you don't have to do any additional work. They are available for viewing within seconds after your event and the videos are captured with high resolution and great contrast.

YoloBox is then a fairly big screen that allows you to directly monitor what's going on with your live streamed events in real-time and control settings just like a phone App , it's a professional Monitor + Control Panel, but two in one. which is easier and more flexible for you to watch. 

The most compelling feature, YoloBox helps your camera go live instantly. Professional live streaming would be up and running in seconds with YoloBox.

YoloBox Plus is a powerful tool for creators to do multi-camera production. You can choose to broadcast from two cameras, from a combination of one camera with your local video, or even from two local video sources. 

YoloBox Plus supports ‘Picture in Picture’ feature that will allow producers to show two camera shots in one graphic layers at the same time. Furthermore, you can now change which video source to appear on the screen with one simple click.

Not only can it stream from DSLR, DV, action cams, drones, and your local videos, YoloBox are now able to stream your Screen from mainstream smartphone, tablet, and computers including Apple, Samsung, Huawei products and more!

The Conventional VS. Us

YoloBox allows you to work using Wifi, Ethernet, or 4G network, and all various ports just to make sure that you’re connected all the time. 

We are trying to EXCEL on every tiny little specs possible to ensure your live streaming experience, whether it's about cloud service or network connection. Our breakthrough streaming technology supports an unlimited number of viewers. And, our automatic speed adjustments maintain video quality with no buffering.

After more than two years of generational updates, we are proudly introducing our "next generation" YoloBox to the global stage. It's smaller, thiner and lighter physically. And in functionality, it's even easier-to-use and more reliable. It's really the 'Next Generation' Live Streaming Solution.We’ve grown quickly and now capture and stream HD-quality video for hundreds of customers, from local communities to global brands, from startups to Fortune 500 companies.

We’re thrilled with the growth we’ve seen since our launch but we’ve only scratched the surface. As a game-changer, what really excites us is watching our customers leverage our technology in ways we could have never imagined.

Originally it was just us with computers and strapping a camera to our wrist with this dream of making it easier for people to capture and share live videos of themselves, to where we are today.  Whether it’s Prototype Yunxi Box, or YoloBox, our software, our apps, our new mounts and accessories, our products and the experience has caught up with our dreams, and we’re finally building the experience that we’ve always wanted to.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

As we have successfully shipped our previous generation products in east-asian markets a few months ago, we are quite confident to lower the unforeseen risk to its minimum, though they will arise in any innovative hardware.

Firstly, we have built a long term relationship with our experienced suppliers. The mass-production of last generation product is a solid validation of their capability and reliability. We do not anticipate delays to our delivery plan. Also we have been conservative in setting our timelines.

Secondly, quality control on engineering and design remains a major focus for us. We spent over one year designing, developing, perfecting this product. Together with our partners, we will implement quality routines to deliver the best product possible in your hands.

Thanks for all the support! We are excited to take this next step with you, the Kickstarter community!

story:
Hello Indiegogo Backers! We are the boud team, the developers of PIC. First and foremost, we would like to thank you all for supporting our previous PIC campaign. Your patience throughout the campaign was greatly appreciated. Thanks to your generous support, we were finally able to make PIC a reality. We are now back on Indiegogo inDemand ready to offer our upgraded model of PIC! Your continued support would be greatly appreciated!

 

 

 


PIC was born from the idea that cameras were meant for play! Existing action cams are often unwieldy or complicated to use. Smartphone cameras are limited by their narrow lens, while also being hard to position for a good shot. With its free-form flexible design, PIC's unique moldable body lets you decide how to play with PIC and enjoy the gorgeous image and video results.

 


With the advancement of portable camera technology, the potential for the creation of interesting content has undergone a rapid evolution. With PIC, you can shoot engaging share-worthy time lapse and animated GIF videos and share it instantly through to your social media channels like Facebook, Instagram, or Snapchat.

 


Adorable and eye-catching, PIC is clearly no ordinary camera. With customizable character designs and a wide range of colors, PIC is the most fun you’ll ever hava with a camera. 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Featured as a winner of the CES 2016 Innovation Honoree Award!
PIC has been spotlighted by major media outlets and consumers around the world!

 


 

 


Do you believe that a camera this small can offer excellent quality? Believe it! PIC’s 135° wide-angle camera lens is the smallest of its kind. Shoot in 1080p Full HD resolution to capture any moment in stunning detail. The equipped 8 MP image sensors offer crisp resolution, light sensitivity, and intuitive auto focus functionality.

 


Did your PIC get caught out in the rain? No waterproof case? No problem. PIC is highly splash resistant and can withstand day-to-day water exposure. You can even wash PIC in running water. However, as PIC is SPLASH PROOF please don’t submerge PIC in water for prolonged periods of time.

 


PIC’s time lapse feature lets you fast forward your life. With its poseable design, PIC will hold its position for hours allowing you to capture breathtaking time lapse content. See the buzz of busy city life or watch a flower bloom with PIC!

 


Create endlessly entertaining animated GIFs that play a short clip on loop. Create your own meme, thumbnail Facebook profile pic, or eye catching Instagram/SnapChat content. Life is just more fun with animated GIFs.

 


Choose the PIC that matches your style. Choose between a line-up of colors and customize PIC using unique head caps. Frank and his Friends are stoked to meet you! Unique holiday themed caps are currently in development!

 


Connect PIC to your smartphone via WiFi direct or BLE 4.0 to view a real-time preview of your footage. Control PIC from your smartphone remotely and transfer video and image content from PIC to your phone. You can also upload your content to social media platforms like Instagram, Facebook and Snapchat.

 
 

PIC is controlled through its simple one-button control. PIC is as easy to use as a selfie-stick but comes equipped with multifunction capabilities! 
 

 


PIC’s 16GB memory can store two hours worth of Full HD (1080p/30f) videos. Equipped with a 630MA battery, PIC can shoot continuously for 70 minutes. Film your next party, concert or travel destination. PIC will automatically organize your content into 4GB files.

 


Software updates including firmware upgrades for PIC will be provided through over-the-air OTA transmission. No physical cable connection is required. PIC will continuously be upgraded as development continues, even after your unbox it.

 

 


 

 



 
 

PIC’s companion application is available for both iOS and Android. The PIC App provides a number of functions including live-preview, slow-motion, time lapse, GIFs and a gallery of your content. Unlock the full power of PIC with the PIC App.

 
 
 
 
 
 

 

 

 

 


In developing PIC, we have formed a strategic partnership with Altek, the world’s premier camera manufacturing plant. Through our partnership we are confident in our ability to produce the highest quality camera. Through Altek we have received numerous quality assurances and production system validations. We will uphold the highest standards in PIC’s development!

story:
What's this about?

I've been into photography for a few years now, but it was only last year that I could afford a proper DSLR camera. Since then I've mostly made do with the lens that came with the camera, and only recently bought a cheapo secondary lens.
I'm starting to feel a bit limited by these two lenses already and am looking to add another one to my collection, something which would expand my options quite a bit and allow me to take different kinds of photos than I have been able to up to this point. Lenses can be kind of expensive though and I wasn't sure how I'd acquire the funds I needed. That's when it occurred to me: Indiegogo! I'll set up a campaign here and offer  some nice perks in exchange for contributions, like personal handwritten postcards, desktop wallpaper and prints of my photos.

So check out the video above, those are the photos I'm selling.

What will a new lens do for me?

A new, high quality lens will provide me with options. Options to take different kinds of photos than my current gear will allow.

Why should you contribute?

For the sheer joy of knowing you've made a difference to my hobby, and a nice customized, handwritten thank-you postcard to commemorate that fact.
But let's say that does nothing for you. Well, if you like any of my photos (see the video if you haven't already) you can get prints. Perfect for framing and hanging up in the living room, or perhaps to give as a gift. Or maybe you like the sound of the pack of desktop backgrounds to liven up your computer's desktop?

What happens if I don't meet the goal?

The money, minus the cost of perks, goes into a closed bank account until I've saved up enough for a new lens. You're contributing to get me a new lens, and my word to you is that that's exactly what your contribution will be going to.

What happens if I exceed the goal?

Well, that depends on by what amount I exceed the goal. First of all more money means a better lens. Beyond that I might be able buy some filters for the lens, maybe a camera bag, a decent tripod or some other photographic equipment (feel free to make suggestions in the comments).

---

If you contribute $10 or more make sure to tell me in the comment box how I should customize your perk: the resolution of the desktop wallpapers, and for $20 and up which photo(s) you want out of the ones in the video.
story_txt:
What's this about?
I've been into photography for a few years now, but it was only last year that I could afford a proper DSLR camera. Since then I've mostly made do with the lens that came with the camera, and only recently bought a cheapo secondary lens.I'm starting to feel a bit limited by these two lenses already and am looking to add another one to my collection, something which would expand my options quite a bit and allow me to take different kinds of photos than I have been able to up to this point. Lenses can be kind of expensive though and I wasn't sure how I'd acquire the funds I needed. That's when it occurred to me: Indiegogo! I'll set up a campaign here and offer  some nice perks in exchange for contributions, like personal handwritten postcards, desktop wallpaper and prints of my photos.
So check out the video above, those are the photos I'm selling.
What will a new lens do for me?
A new, high quality lens will provide me with options. Options to take different kinds of photos than my current gear will allow.
Why should you contribute?
For the sheer joy of knowing you've made a difference to my hobby, and a nice customized, handwritten thank-you postcard to commemorate that fact.But let's say that does nothing for you. Well, if you like any of my photos (see the video if you haven't already) you can get prints. Perfect for framing and hanging up in the living room, or perhaps to give as a gift. Or maybe you like the sound of the pack of desktop backgrounds to liven up your computer's desktop?
What happens if I don't meet the goal?
The money, minus the cost of perks, goes into a closed bank account until I've saved up enough for a new lens. You're contributing to get me a new lens, and my word to you is that that's exactly what your contribution will be going to.
What happens if I exceed the goal?
Well, that depends on by what amount I exceed the goal. First of all more money means a better lens. Beyond that I might be able buy some filters for the lens, maybe a camera bag, a decent tripod or some other photographic equipment (feel free to make suggestions in the comments).
---

story:
Me and My Story:

I am Jaymie, a Sophomore photography major at the Fashion institute of Technology in NYC.  On April 24th i was robbed, along with my personal belongings, my camera bag containing FIT's Canon 7D and 28-135 lens was stolen.  I have to replace the equipment (2500 USD) and i can't check out equipment until it's replaced, which affects my final projects.  There are 3 weeks of school left, if the camera is not replaced, my account will be put on hold and i will not be able to graduate from the Associates program and/or move on the the Bachelor's program. 

I've switched career paths to become an image-maker, putting myself into a major financial bind to achieve a dream I believe in. I have no way to pay this debt.

My Gift to You:

There are a lot bigger causes to donate to, i understand that, i appreciate anything you can give.   For those, whose donations are over $100 dollars i will gift a photoshoot and or a print.


Other Ways You Can Help:

Please use the SHARE button and pass along my story.  Thanks so much!

story:
The Pano5+1 MarkII is available on ROGETI online shop!

https://www.rogeti.com

The Pano5+1 MarkII is a patented panoramic photography head, boasts the capability of effortlessly capturing a complete 65.5 mega pixels 360°X180° spherical panorama with a single GoPro. With the capability for RAW capture on the HERO 5 Black, the Pano5+1 MarkII could be very suitable for most commercial uses as a lightweight replacement for DSLR on the heavy panoramic photography head and the tripod.

Compatible with
GoPro HERO 5 Black
GoPro HERO 4 Silver/Black
GoPro HERO 3+ Silver/Black
GoPro HERO 3 White/Silver/Black

Click above to experience the 360° VR photo captured on Pano5+1 MarkII

 

-->  See Video Tutorial    

1, Install the base mount on a tripod or on a compatible beverage bottle. Put the main stand on the base mount and place your GoPro into the vertical cradle. Spin the main stand to reach the five notches on the base mount, and take one picture at each of the five places.

2, Take out the GoPro and put it upward in the top cradle to take the zenith shot.

If you want to patch the ground with a nadir shot, then:

3, Take off the main stand and put on the Nadirshot Holder with the GoPro. Spin the Nadirshot Holder to reach the two notches on the Basemount, and take one picture at each of the two positions (which are with a difference of 180°).

4, Now you can drag all of the eight panoramic pieces into a stitcher software such as AutopanoGiga, PanoramaStudio3Pro, Hugin (a free software)  or other like that and you will get an excellent spherical panorama in minutes.

Click to see this panorama

 

 

360°X180° / 65.5 Mega Pixels

The Pano5+1 MarkII enables the shooters to capture eight panoramic pieces with a GoPro camera to form a complete 360°X180° environment. That way it offers an overwhelming image quality when compared with any twin-eyes camera ranging from 2k,4k to 8k.

 

Accurate Node Position

For proper panorama photography, the camera should be rotated strictly around the lens nodal point, especially when you want to get a seamless panorama. However, the nodal point is nowhere near the actual camera mounting point, so it is impossible to do it with a common tripod head.

The Pano5+1 MarkII cooperates a genius design to achieve the easiest camera locating for panoramic photography. It has two intersected drop-in cradles which share the same nodal point position: The vertical cradle is for pointing the camera all around, while the look-up cradle is for the zenith shot. When the camera in the cradle of the Nadirshot Holder, the lens node will stay in the same position. There is no sliding plate and even no joint in this structure so that it eliminates the loss of accuracy in deployment. Such a scheme ensures that software used for photo stitching produces a precisely composed VR environment with minimum post-production intervention. Both the shooting and post-production become super easy.

 

GoPro HERO 5 will WOW you on Pano5+1 MarkII

RAW photo capture

It's amazing that the GoPro HERO 5 Black offers RAW photo capture. The files are saved as a .GPR file and can be opened in popular applications such as Adobe Camera Raw and Lightroom. If you are familiar with RAW editing, we recommend shooting in RAW to get the best image quality, especially when you intend to apply the Pano5+1 MarkII and a HERO 5 Black for professional use.

Tips: The Basemount in gray color could be used as a White Balance card.

Voice Control

Now you don't have to hold your smart phone while shooting a panorama. In fact, you don't even have to open GoPro's Wi-Fi and connect it to the phone. Just say “GoPro, take a photo.” No need to press any button.

GPS

The GoPro HERO 5 has GPS built into it so that your stitched panorama have the chance to include the GPS data. You can benefit from it especialy when you want to upload a batch of panoramas to Google Street View or any website including the map service.

Waterproof

The GoPro HERO 5 Black is natively waterproof, which means you can shoot panorama without worry in the rain or snow.

 

Past GoPro models are accepted as well

Not only can you fit this on the GoPro HERO 5 Black, but the Pano5+1 MarkII also includes an Adapter for past-model GoPro cameras. With this Adapter, the HERO 3, HERO 3+ and HERO 4 can fit into the Pano5+1 MarkII and the lens nodal point of these models can be exactly aligned to the pivot point as same as the HERO 5 Black does.

 

Transparent Build

Both the Pano5+1 MarkII main stand and the Nadirshot Holder are built in transparent. The transparent material produces less shadow and is better for nadir patch.

 

Basemount looks so small

Compared to the original Pano5+1, the Basemount of the MarkII version is much smaller and the camera position in the cradle is lifted greatly. All these efforts are aimed at reducing the Basemount projection area in the panorama. The Basemount projection area in the panorama which is captured on the Pano5+1 MarkII is just 1/4 of what is captured on the original Pano5+1.

 

Flexible Solutions for Standing

The Basemount of the Pano5+1 MarkII has three threads in its bottom. One thread is for PET bottles of energy drinks like Gatorade, one is for Pop drinks like Coca-Cola, and a standard 3/8” threaded hole is for the tripod. In addition, our standard package includes a 3/8" to 1/4" thread transfer screw for a mini-tripod. You can choose the most suitable stand in different projects.

  • A standard tripod provides steady standing. Its column can be raised to move the lens farther from the tripod legs.
  • A mini tripod is steady and portable.
  • Standing on a bottle could avoid the appearance of the tripod legs in the panorama and has the minimum requirement for the standing area. Plus, the capability to shoot without a tripod adds more portability to the Pano5+1 MarkII.

 

One Case Contains All

Every Pano5+1 MarkII comes with a handy case that pulls together every part you will need to work with: the Pano5+1 MarkII main stand, the Nadirshot holder, the Basemount, a 1/4"-3/8" transfer screw, and the Adapter. You can also place your GoPro camera inside with two spare batteries in it.

That way, you don't have to find each part in your camera bag when you want to shoot a panorama. Just open the case and set up at once. The profile line within the box will enable you to place each part quickly and accurately.


Integrated Niche for Faster Loading

The Pano5+1 MarkII main stand has a niche beneath its vertical cradle. You can put your GoPro into this niche when you want to travel without the case.

 

Know more about SLOPES Black

Know more about ROGETI Tripod/Bottle Mounts Suite

 

Enjoy the VR Tour!

A few examples of panoramas captured on the Pano5+1 MarkII. Click on the following pictures to enjoy the VR tour!

Mounted on a Coca-Cola 1.25L bottle

 

Mounted on a professional tripod

 

Mounted on a clamp mount

 

Mounted on a mini tripod with an extending pole

 

 

 

General

 

How much is retail price?

Retail price is 59USD.

Is there any free software for stitching panoramas?

Yes. Please find Hugin which is a free but powerful stitcher software.

Can I buy certain component of the product in case of lost or broken in the future?

Yes. Just contact us through email or other contacts listed on our website.

 

Payments and Shipping

 

What payment options do I have?

You can pay via credit card or PayPal. Select a perk and you'll see the available payment methods at checkout.

When does it ship?

We will send out the item in three days after you make the order.

What is the cost of shipping to my country?

Pano5+1 Mark2 is free shipping to HongKong. We ship it worldwide and the regular shipping cost is 6USD for most of the countries. To find out the shipping cost to your country, choose the perk you wish to pledge for and click on it. Fulfill your shipping address and the shipping cost will be added to your perk.

 

Technical

 

Which stitcher software should I choose?

  • The best choice is AutoPano Giga. It always produces perfect stitching if you get the correct settings.
  • The latest version of Panorama Studio Pro is also perfect on stitching. The only problem is it has no 'Including' but the 'Excluding' mask, which makes the masking not that easy in certain cases.
  • PTGui requires more manual settings. If all the settings are correct the stitching result can be very good as well.
  • The Hugin, which is a free software, performs good but not as exellent as the previous three.

 

Where can I find tutorials of the stitcher softwares?

We have put some related tutorials on our website. Click here and scroll down to the end of the page then you can find them. In the future we will put more tutorials and tricks to tap into the potentials of your Pano5+1 MarkII. 

Can I took bracketed shots on the GoPro camera to make a HDR panorama?

Yes. The GoPro allows the +/-2EV manual explosure compensate in 1/2EV step. If you want to do it automatically, there is an IOS app named GoProHDR.

The Main Stand and the Nadirshot Holder are built in transparent material. Are they easy to be broken?

The transparent material we used on Pano5+1 Mark2 is the high quality Polycarbonates (PC). This material is strong, tough and more expensive than many other plastic materials. It is often used on product which requires the high intensity build, such as the GoPro housing.

Why not make it motorized?

Motorized panoramic head often have severe problems with stitching when there is moving people and moving car. With the manual rig like Pano5+1, however, you can easily avoid the moving objects.

Can Pano5+1 MarkII fit Xiaomi Yi camera?

No.

Can Pano5+1 MarkII fit my SJ action camera?

Not tested by now. However, if any action camera can fit into the waterproof housing of GoPro Hero4/3+, and its view angle is equal to GoPro or even wider, we think it maybe works.

 

 

Follow us and discover us

FACEBOOK / INSTAGRAM / YOUTUBE
