story:
Welcome to pixelFlik!

When you go about your day listen for how many times you hear:

      "Can you send me that photo?"

as you read this, please keep the above question in mind.

Just this month, I was asked this very question several times by many different people. Each time I answered sure, no problem, that's easy, you've probably done the same. But then, if you are like me, you quickly realize that for anything other than sharing by posting to Facebook or Instagram it gets complicated. Especially when it comes to more than one photo or video. Sure you can upload everything to Dropbox and send out a link or try the email attachment route, but then your recipients have to download everything and organize it themselves. That’s a hassle that takes too much time! Not to mention, for those who are not technically nimble, these methods may alienate them from ever getting to view those captured precious memories.

When it comes to events and memories that matter, people care, they tend to spend time selecting the best photos, enhancing them and organizing them into albums. What’s more, the people whom these photos are shared with then have to spend time extracting, downloading, and organizing them as well -- double the work with half the fun.

On a daily basis, this scenario repeats itself millions of times all over the world. Some call it "photo hell". Organizing photos into albums, enhancing them, commenting on them is something we want to do. We want to then see those efforts from all of our devices, and we want to share them with our family and friends. For the technically minded this can be done but it's not easy, for everyone else, it is nearly impossible. This is why thousands of photos of family, children and other memories are trapped in peoples phones, camera SD cards and digital photo libraries.

So we thought -- there has to be a better way. A way that gives users structured memory sharing across multiple groups (we call them Tribes); easy cross-device sharing where the devices can be either Android or iOS, Mac or Windows, and ideally be as simple as taking a photo or video. As a bonus, wouldn’t it be great if we could also take back some of our privacy, and only share these photos and videos with the people we want to share them with?

Well, we’ve built it and we call it pixelFlik.



PixelFlik is an App that runs on both Android and iOS. With pixelFlik you designate Tribes (groups of users) that represent your family, friends, other parents of your kid’s soccer team, your tennis buddies, your mommy club, etc.

Once you define your Tribe, you are done with the sharing bit. From that point on, if a Tribe is selected, any photo or video you take is automatically distributed to the members of that Tribe, to all of their devices. The photos aren’t altered or compressed and remain in their original resolution, and are distributed without doing anything other than taking the photo. The same applies to videos.

That is the beauty of pixelFlik -- ONE CLICK SHARING -- where the click is the act of taking the photo or shooting the video.  There are of course the customary safety measures, like, make my Tribe the default always. That way any photo you take is only shared to your devices. You have to copy it to another tribe to share it there.

In our early tests and trials, once people have tried it, they universally love it. Photo organizing and sharing the way it should be, no muss no fuss. It just works! In fact it works so well that our early adopters have estimated that it saves them up to two hours a week. If you think about the time you spend sharing photos and videos, who gets what, or saving what has been shared with you, then you know what we mean.

PixelFlik is for families first, that’s why we also created pixelFlik.tv. PixelFlik.tv is an optional TV set-top-box that connects to the pixelFlik cloud. It’s just like having a giant cell phone at home. Any photos and videos you take get delivered to the unit and can be viewed on your high definition TV. It is great for distant family members that are not so technically savvy (think grandma), and is really cool to have on display at parties.

My children’s grandmother lives in Europe. Every Saturday evening she sits down and gets videos and photos of her grandchildren in real-time just after they wake up. It’s so cool! My son has learned to take photos and get Grandma to to turn on the TV so that she can see them right after he takes them. The bonding is amazing.

I really hope that you like the premise of pixelFlik. We’ve created some early adopter perks for you to take advantage of; that, frankly, will help us make pixelFlik even more awesome.

We’ve created pixelFlik for you, us, your family and ours. But guess what, it’s great for business too. Our professional photographer friends are itching to use it to distribute photo libraries with their clients, our professional legal friends are already testing it with their clients. Simply put, it is so much easier than email.

So please, check out the perks, and as you do so, think of your Tribe and let us know how you plan to use pixelFlik.

Regards, The pixelFlik team.

P.S. For the techies in the crowd, pixelFlik is really a mashup of an online cloud storage service, an instant photo sharing system, a distributed photo and video album, and private publish subscribe service.  It’s technically cool, but functionally simple. Check out the sections that follow for more information.

PixelFlik App Summary

The pixelFlik app will eventually be available to both Android and iOS devices for purchase and download.


          


If it’s your first time as a pixelFlik user, you’ll have to register, after that you can add as many devices as you want. The Home screen is the first screenshot. We’ve organized Photos, Videos, and Files into it’s own area.

For the Android version, we will have a “Pro” upgrade that will allow you to turn your phone into a hotspot to share locally using wi-fi. It's great for meetings.

There is a “Take Photo” button to shoot photos and video within the app, but you can also shot photos and video from the phone camera directly. Which you can setup to auto import into pixelFlik -- so cool.

When you touch the “Tribes” button you get the tribe management page.

Here you can manage your tribes, create them, join them, leave them, and select the current default.

We have worked hard to create an interface that lets you manage your photos or videos by creating structured folders. The organizational structure is shared with others in your Tribe. So you do it, they get it. Simple.


pixelFlik.tv Summary

PixelFlik.tv is optional. You do not need this to use pixelFlik, but it is sure handy for distant family and for sharing events and memories together by the TV. To do this we created a set-top box unit that works with pixelFlik.


The pixelFlik.tv device provides the following unique features:

  • Android-based device. As mentioned earlier, it’s just like having a giant cellphone at home. PixelFlik.tv uses a customized pixelFlik app, so the screenshots and functions that you learn on the phone are the same on the tv.box -- except that you use the remote not a touch screen.

  • Always connected to your TV. Hopefully you (or your parents or in-laws, friends, etc.) have a high definition TV to view all the beautiful, high resolution photos and videos everyone is producing.

  • Very easy to operate. It’s just like operating a TV, not a PC or even like a smartphone.

  • Has a wi-fi router function. Your local devices can connect to pixelFlik.tv via wi-fi.

  • It has storage! A lot. Standard model has 16GB (giga byte) of storage. Deluxe model has 2TB (tera byte) of storage. Both models have a SD slot for additional storage. 16GB can storage approximately 50K photos or 65 minutes of high resolution video. 2TB is more than 125 times more storage than the Standard model.

The pixelFlik app is the only tool you need for easy sharing. So when is pixelFlik.tv useful? We believe it’s great for at least three situations:

  1. Non-technical people who want to receive and view photos & videos. Great example are grandparents. Their adult children can use pixelFlik app to shoot photos and videos of the grandkids. The photos just show up on the grandparent’s pixelFlik.tv. So simple.

  2. Events and gatherings where there are lots of photos & videos being shot and displayed. Examples include weddings, tradeshows, conferences, concerts, night clubs.

  3. Home storage. For you tech comfortable folks, PixelFlik.tv is available with 2TB of storage. Standard model has 16GB with available SD slot for significantly more storage. Offload your smartphones photos and videos. Use pixelFlik.tv like a network attached storage.


How pixelFlik Works

PixelFlik is obviously software deployed as an app built for Android and for iOS.

The pixelFlik services are controlled and facilitated by the pixelFlik cloud. Of course, the internet is the backbone for transporting all the data between pixelFlik apps through the pixelFlik cloud.


Each registered pixelFlik user has their own account. The account can include multiple Android and iOS devices. For example, I have a Mac laptop, an iPhone, an iPad, and pixelFlik.tv (an Android device). I choose for all my devices to have a pixelFlik app (the pixelFlik.tv has an Android app built-in). When I shoot a photo or receive one as a Tribe member, all my devices receive a copy of the photo.

A Tribe is a collection of accounts that you have been invited to join. Anyone can start a Tribe and they can give the Tribe any name. You can invite other pixelFlik users to your Tribes. There are of course control options available for a Tribe. For example, the Tribe creator may want the items shared to be Read-only.

Within each Tribe, you can organize the content. For example, I can create folders and sub-folders for photos and videos I shoot. I can organize the photos and video by each day of my vacation or I can create folders for each city in France I visited. The structures are replicated in each Tribe member’s devices. No more time wasted re-organizing photos that you receive.

What We Need

We need your help so we can ship the product. We’ll use the funds to polish the Android version and to finish the iOS app.

We're targeting $300,000:

  • $200,000 for software developers. We’ve already made a lot of progress, but there is still a little more that needs to be done! The remaining software development efforts will be focused on completing some software features and polishing the products.

  • $100,000 design and purchase of the pixelFlik.tv boxes. Some integration effort with the box’s electronics. We will have delivery of the 16GB version within a few months of this campaign’s conclusion. The funding will help us complete and deliver the 2TB model well before Christmas 2017.

If you can’t help us with your dollars, then please give us your support by spreading the word. Help us create a product that saves people time and gives everyone some of their privacy back.

Spread the Word!  Use the Indiegogo share tools.

We're on FB, Twitter, Instagram:

https://www.facebook.com/PixelFlik/

https://twitter.com/pixelflik

https://www.instagram.com/pixelflik/

What You Get

You get early access, sweet discounts, and a product that you can actually use and that’ll save you time and make your life a little better.

Risks and Challenges

The pixelFlik App and pixelFlik.tv has been under development for the last year and is now in Beta testing.

We, the founders, have substantial business experience. This isn’t our first rodeo. We have the product development 90% complete, so we’ve mitigated most of the traditional risks. We have a great team of software engineering rock-stars. With your help, we WILL deliver on this campaign.

Schedule

August - deliver Android App

September - deliver 16GB pixelflik.tv box

Fall - deliver iOS app

Fall - deliver 2TB pixelFlik.tv box

1st half 2017 - deliver next evolution of pixelFlik.tv

Click on the “Back It” button at the top or the “Estimate” buttons at the end of each Perk.

Thank You!
story_txt:
Welcome to pixelFlik!When you go about your day listen for how many times you hear:      "Can you send me that photo?"as you read this, please keep the above question in mind.Just this month, I was asked this very question several times by many different people. Each time I answered sure, no problem, that's easy, you've probably done the same. But then, if you are like me, you quickly realize that for anything other than sharing by posting to Facebook or Instagram it gets complicated. Especially when it comes to more than one photo or video. Sure you can upload everything to Dropbox and send out a link or try the email attachment route, but then your recipients have to download everything and organize it themselves. That’s a hassle that takes too much time! Not to mention, for those who are not technically nimble, these methods may alienate them from ever getting to view those captured precious memories. When it comes to events and memories that matter, people care, they tend to spend time selecting the best photos, enhancing them and organizing them into albums. What’s more, the people whom these photos are shared with then have to spend time extracting, downloading, and organizing them as well -- double the work with half the fun.On a daily basis, this scenario repeats itself millions of times all over the world. Some call it "photo hell". Organizing photos into albums, enhancing them, commenting on them is something we want to do. We want to then see those efforts from all of our devices, and we want to share them with our family and friends. For the technically minded this can be done but it's not easy, for everyone else, it is nearly impossible. This is why thousands of photos of family, children and other memories are trapped in peoples phones, camera SD cards and digital photo libraries.So we thought -- there has to be a better way. A way that gives users structured memory sharing across multiple groups (we call them Tribes); easy cross-device sharing where the devices can be either Android or iOS, Mac or Windows, and ideally be as simple as taking a photo or video. As a bonus, wouldn’t it be great if we could also take back some of our privacy, and only share these photos and videos with the people we want to share them with?Well, we’ve built it and we call it pixelFlik.





PixelFlik is an App that runs on both Android and iOS. With pixelFlik you designate Tribes (groups of users) that represent your family, friends, other parents of your kid’s soccer team, your tennis buddies, your mommy club, etc. 
Once you define your Tribe, you are done with the sharing bit. From that point on, if a Tribe is selected, any photo or video you take is automatically distributed to the members of that Tribe, to all of their devices. The photos aren’t altered or compressed and remain in their original resolution, and are distributed without doing anything other than taking the photo. The same applies to videos.
That is the beauty of pixelFlik -- ONE CLICK SHARING -- where the click is the act of taking the photo or shooting the video.  There are of course the customary safety measures, like, make my Tribe the default always. That way any photo you take is only shared to your devices. You have to copy it to another tribe to share it there.
In our early tests and trials, once people have tried it, they universally love it. Photo organizing and sharing the way it should be, no muss no fuss. It just works! In fact it works so well that our early adopters have estimated that it saves them up to two hours a week. If you think about the time you spend sharing photos and videos, who gets what, or saving what has been shared with you, then you know what we mean.
PixelFlik is for families first, that’s why we also created pixelFlik.tv. PixelFlik.tv is an optional TV set-top-box that connects to the pixelFlik cloud. It’s just like having a giant cell phone at home. Any photos and videos you take get delivered to the unit and can be viewed on your high definition TV. It is great for distant family members that are not so technically savvy (think grandma), and is really cool to have on display at parties. 
My children’s grandmother lives in Europe. Every Saturday evening she sits down and gets videos and photos of her grandchildren in real-time just after they wake up. It’s so cool! My son has learned to take photos and get Grandma to to turn on the TV so that she can see them right after he takes them. The bonding is amazing.
I really hope that you like the premise of pixelFlik. We’ve created some early adopter perks for you to take advantage of; that, frankly, will help us make pixelFlik even more awesome.
We’ve created pixelFlik for you, us, your family and ours. But guess what, it’s great for business too. Our professional photographer friends are itching to use it to distribute photo libraries with their clients, our professional legal friends are already testing it with their clients. Simply put, it is so much easier than email.
So please, check out the perks, and as you do so, think of your Tribe and let us know how you plan to use pixelFlik.
Regards, The pixelFlik team.


P.S. For the techies in the crowd, pixelFlik is really a mashup of an online cloud storage service, an instant photo sharing system, a distributed photo and video album, and private publish subscribe service.  It’s technically cool, but functionally simple. Check out the sections that follow for more information.

PixelFlik App Summary
The pixelFlik app will eventually be available to both Android and iOS devices for purchase and download.

          
If it’s your first time as a pixelFlik user, you’ll have to register, after that you can add as many devices as you want. The Home screen is the first screenshot. We’ve organized Photos, Videos, and Files into it’s own area.


For the Android version, we will have a “Pro” upgrade that will allow you to turn your phone into a hotspot to share locally using wi-fi. It's great for meetings.
There is a “Take Photo” button to shoot photos and video within the app, but you can also shot photos and video from the phone camera directly. Which you can setup to auto import into pixelFlik -- so cool.

When you touch the “Tribes” button you get the tribe management page.

story:
CLICK HERE FOR

ONLINE SHOP

The first pocket-sized dolly for smartphones and cameras, makes it possible for everyone to capture cinematic footage. Now it is easier than ever to achieve perfect linear and curved movements with only one tool.

A new way of use; Attaching the Gimbals to Muwi will bring you 4-Axis Motion & Target Tracking ability. Thanks to the gimbal technology, now Muwi has the power of thousands of dollars cost equipment.

 

With our incoming App, Cameras will move smarter. (Soon)

 

Whether you're a pro or an amateur, MUWI makes professional videography available to anyone, anywhere and at any time.

With a retractable phone holder and patent-pending rotary legs, MUWI allows you to achieve perfect linear and curved movement with only one tool.

MUWI is handy. You can easily achieve truck, pan and dolly shots.

Our mission is to empower and inspire people to tell better stories and to make professional videography available for anyone, anywhere at any time.

We’ve tried hard to develop additional abilities for MUWI to make it easy to use and boost your creativity.

FLOW is the most intuitive and simple way to get automated motion. Just turn it on and scroll for speed adjustment.

Turn MUWI into a motorized dolly with just one click. FLOW is totally compatible with MUWI’s rotary legs and other add-ons.

With FLOW-X, MUWI becomes completely hands-free. You can adjust speed, direction and control your camera remotely.

Via Bluetooth connection and remote controller, MUWI starts to shoot and moves at the same time.

Muwi App is under development and will come soon with a firmware release update to your Flow X. With the help of the App you will able to control your cameras more precise and smarter.

FLOW X will go fast enough to follow the action and slow enough to capture perfect time-lapses.

TRACK will turn your MUWI into a lightweight and easy to setup slider that can be mounted to any tripod.

No need to worry about how to ride MUWI without a surface. TRACK is designed for both outdoor and indoor usage with or without a tripod.

TRACK is made from airplane grade aluminum to ensure the best quality and stability. It’s foldable and compact, just put it into your backpack and discover the world.

SWIVEL CLIP is the smartest way to attach any camera. Just snap the SWIVEL-CLIP, and mount your DLSR, mirrorless or action camera.

The snap-on clip grabs MUWI safe, rigid and steady enough to never let them swinging.

MUWI is compatible with the most of the smartphone and action cam gimbals.

 

The secure ball joint will allow you to point your camera 360 degrees steadily.

MUWI and the add-ons, together, is the sleekest, portable and easy to use videography gear ever designed. See the below table for rewards for the possible early bird and Kickstarter prices.

 

 

Photographers, videographers, film makers, directors, bloggers, students, hobbyists, professionals and amateurs with motion picture passion. Watch our stories and share yours with us.

 
 
 
 
 
 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

We know very well how to prepare for the product development process and how to deal with problems that may occur in any stage. We made our business plan perfectly. Designing, prototyping, and testing were finally finished after many MUWI iterations. We have suppliers and vendors that we have been working with for more than 10 years.

However, developing an innovative product always carries risks in the production stage that might not be foreseeable. These can create delays and extra costs. That’s why, from the very beginning ‘til the end, we tested and tested MUWI with users to eliminate as many risks as possible. And, in the end, we came to the result: that MUWI works perfectly, allowing us to take all the video footage that you’ve seen.

We’ve worked really hard and are still pushing harder and harder. Our purpose is not only delivering MUWI on time to our Kickstarter backers, but to deliver it better than you see. We aim to expand the MUWI family through more innovative video motion control products for everyone. So, as MUWI is our core structure, it must be perfect (with all its add-ons) and must give %100% backer satisfaction. 
We believe in transparency and promise to always keep you updated on the process. And we’ll try to answer all your questions on time.

story:
As a landscape photographer, I am always out in the field taking risks.  And this past week I took a risk that cost me dearly.  While shooting up in Yosemite, my camera set up toppled over a bridge and fell into the Merced River.  I was devastated.

Recently I decided to make photography my life... I was going to dive in head first.  Shoot epic locations and take people around California on photo workshops.  This was my goal and my dream. I spent years studying and perfecting my art.

At the moment I was about to jump in head first, my gear decided to do the same.... but into the cold waters of the Merced River in Yosemite.  It felt like I was punched in the face three times and in the gut twice.  I was sick to my stomach.  The tools that I needed for my new adventure were gone.  I felt hopeless for a minute.

But then I decided that I needed to pick myself up... reboot.... start over.  My dream of doing photography full time would never be crushed.

I want to show you the most amazing images of the southwest and beyond.... I want to take other photographers to these incredible locations. But I need your help. 

You can help me achieve my goals by donating to this project.  Your support will mean so much and will serve as an inspiration to my for years to come.  Please consider signing up at one of the levels below.  I can't thank you enough for your support... you are all amazing.

story:
My name is Ashley Osborn. I'm a 20 year old from Chicago, IL who has been photographing bands and artists for a little over two years now. This year I launched my magazine, Highlight Magazine and it's been incredibly sucessful. I work very hard in the industry and I'm very goal driven. I'm currently interning, running a magazine and shooting all that I can. I was a marketing student at Columbia in Chicago but my financial situation has forced me to take time off.

All of my work can be viewed here: www.ashleyosbornphotography.com

Today I went to the apple store because my trackpad on my 15in MacBook Pro was not working. It was being weird and it basically looked like somebody had hacked my computer and was moving it around and I was also unable to left click. Each time I clicked it was as if I was right clicking and it was odd. When I was at the store, they told me it was common for this type of thing to happen, and they were going to replace it and have it ready for me in about an hour. So I left the store and wandered around for a while. About an hour later, I was waiting outside of the store again, a man from the store called and told me that there were some problems. He asked me to come in and sat me down and explained that some type of liquid (I still have no idea what the hell it was) was inside and was currently eating away at the motherboard. The only thing I can think of that happened was in the fall of 2010 when I spilled coffee in my backpack coming back to my dorm from class. Other than that, I have no idea.

He told me that they could fix it but they would have to completely replace the motherboard, send it in to be fixed and that it would cost me $1350 to get it fixed. My applecare won’t cover this because it was an ‘external source’ that caused the problem. I also explained to him that I am a photographer and I’m scared of losing all of my photos. He told me to not even work on the computer because he thinks it could die any minute on me with no warning. As I’m typing now, my cursor is moving around and twitching.

I immediately started balling my eyes out in the store because the past few months of my life have been a mess. I just quit my job and started at Starbucks literally a few days ago. I barely know at this point how I am going to pay my rent for August. I don’t even have money to buy a hard drive to save my photos, but luckily I’m blessed with amazing friends and one of them (Brian Carpenter) just offered to buy me a hard drive so I can at least back up my work. I’ve also been able to back up my most important work on my roommates hard drive and I’m thankful for that as well.

My plan right now is to apply for a best buy credit card and make $100 payments a month on a new laptop. My parents can’t help me or anything so it’s basically all on me.

I hate being that person on the internet, but I seriously can’t function without a computer. Being a photographer, I need a place to edit and work on my photos. If I can’t do this, there will be no Highlight and no more Ashley Osborn photography. I had a 15inch MacBook pro. But Best Buy currently is selling a 13inch MB Pro and a two year full insurance plan for about $1800 so that's all I need. I can downgrade - I'm completely fine with that. I just need something.

EDIT: A refurbished 13 inch Macbook pro for $900.

It would mean the world to me if you could help me at all. Thank you so much.

I will email you about all rewards so you can chose your photos! :)

My name is Ashley Osborn. I'm a 20 year old from Chicago, IL who has been photographing bands and artists for a little over two years now. This year I launched my magazine, Highlight Magazine and it's been incredibly sucessful. I work very hard in the industry and I'm very goal driven. I'm currently interning, running a magazine and shooting all that I can. I was a marketing student at Columbia in Chicago but my financial situation has forced me to take time off.
All of my work can be viewed here: www.ashleyosbornphotography.com
Today I went to the apple store because my trackpad on my 15in MacBook Pro was not working. It was being weird and it basically looked like somebody had hacked my computer and was moving it around and I was also unable to left click. Each time I clicked it was as if I was right clicking and it was odd. When I was at the store, they told me it was common for this type of thing to happen, and they were going to replace it and have it ready for me in about an hour. So I left the store and wandered around for a while. About an hour later, I was waiting outside of the store again, a man from the store called and told me that there were some problems. He asked me to come in and sat me down and explained that some type of liquid (I still have no idea what the hell it was) was inside and was currently eating away at the motherboard. The only thing I can think of that happened was in the fall of 2010 when I spilled coffee in my backpack coming back to my dorm from class. Other than that, I have no idea.
He told me that they could fix it but they would have to completely replace the motherboard, send it in to be fixed and that it would cost me $1350 to get it fixed. My applecare won’t cover this because it was an ‘external source’ that caused the problem. I also explained to him that I am a photographer and I’m scared of losing all of my photos. He told me to not even work on the computer because he thinks it could die any minute on me with no warning. As I’m typing now, my cursor is moving around and twitching.
I immediately started balling my eyes out in the store because the past few months of my life have been a mess. I just quit my job and started at Starbucks literally a few days ago. I barely know at this point how I am going to pay my rent for August. I don’t even have money to buy a hard drive to save my photos, but luckily I’m blessed with amazing friends and one of them (Brian Carpenter) just offered to buy me a hard drive so I can at least back up my work. I’ve also been able to back up my most important work on my roommates hard drive and I’m thankful for that as well.
My plan right now is to apply for a best buy credit card and make $100 payments a month on a new laptop. My parents can’t help me or anything so it’s basically all on me.
I hate being that person on the internet, but I seriously can’t function without a computer. Being a photographer, I need a place to edit and work on my photos. If I can’t do this, there will be no Highlight and no more Ashley Osborn photography. I had a 15inch MacBook pro. But Best Buy currently is selling a 13inch MB Pro and a two year full insurance plan for about $1800 so that's all I need. I can downgrade - I'm completely fine with that. I just need something.
EDIT: A refurbished 13 inch Macbook pro for $900.
It would mean the world to me if you could help me at all. Thank you so much.
I will email you about all rewards so you can chose your photos! :)

story:
It was four years ago to the day Blind Spot Gear launched the Kickstarter for the original scorpion light. Frustrated by the expensive and unintuitive professional-quality lighting rigs the market offered we set off to take the lighting industry by storm.

 

In aiming to bring accessible professional lighting within the budget of your average film maker Blind Spot Gear brought a unique company ethos to an industry where affordable lighting was largely dominated by a few big players and mass produced low quality options.  

The Scorpion Light did not disappoint, proving dependable in the world's most extreme locations. Its rugged portability, dependability, and flexible nature has made it the light of choice for professional photographers and filmmakers working with productions across the world in the most demanding environments.

Since introducing the Scorpion to the market we have been working and learning from our customers and we've drawn on this experience and knowledge to redesign the Scorpion Light for the mobile professional. 

Why did we make them?

There were a million lights, and none of them met our needs. They were bulky, expensive, flimsy, unintuitive and frustrating. We knew we could do better and so we decided to make a light that met the needs of the many at an affordable price.

 

What makes the Scorpion stand out?  

Flexibility, portability, and speed. Made from beautiful machine anodised aluminium the Scorpion is the full package, well organised and easily transportable, it provides a lighting set up that can be rigged nearly anywhere in a matter of seconds. When this is combined with an innovative gooseneck design and versatile barndoors it makes the perfect light when time and space are tight. Once experienced in action it's a set up you'll find hard to do without.

 

Why are we updating them now?

You (our Kickstarter backers) brought Blind Spot Gear and the Scorpion to life four years ago. As incredible a product as the original was, we have learned a lot since. From experience gained and feedback received we knew we could make this core product even better.  

What are you getting?   

A brand new lens design and LED makes the new Scorpion Light 30% brighter, 2400 lux at a meter, while also proving an increased colour quality which, with a TLCI score of 94, it easily competes with industry leading lights. Ultimate flexibility, we've made huge improvements to the Scorpion's Gooseneck. Made from an improved brass/steel materials the neck is now thicker and 20% shorter providing more stability. We are keeping the 16mm spigot and 1/4 20 thread to give you a lighting set up that can be easily attached to almost anything. Increased portability, we know how frustrating and time-consuming transporting and setting up lighting rigs can be. With years of experience under our belts we have refined the organisation of both the Duo and Quad cases to provide a more intelligent, compact package. 

We've been amazed at the quality of productions the product has been used on. We can't wait for you to be one of them.

This rugged, extremely portable and flexible lighting system means you can light like never before. Lighting and filming in locations you could have only dreamed of previously. 

No matter whether you’re just starting out in your career, a pro or a full out Oscar winner this light will have a perfect place in your kit. The ultimate tricky location light, a beautiful hidden detail light or a full out 4 light interview set-up.

 

When will it all ship?

We expect all rewards to leave our warehouses during June 2018. We are confident we can meet this target - as they say this is not our first rodeo, in fact it's our 4th. We have great relationships with all our suppliers, our supply chain is in place and our logistics/warehousing partners are tried and tested.

Scorpion Duo with Tile Duo Demos

 

 

 

Blind Spot Gear was launched in 2014 comprising of a close-knit team of creatives based in Glasgow, Scotland. The lighting industry has long been dominated by a handful of companies and a raft of cheap, low quality lighting, making the landscape difficult for smaller professional brands like Blind Spot Gear to thrive in. It is a fiercely competitive market, both online and offline. Whilst the story of Blind Spot Gear so far has been a success; the reality is that we still face the daily challenge of being up against the giants.

Launching a pre-order campaign on Kickstarter allows us to bring the Scorpion V2 to life.

We’re passionate about the product experience we’ve got to offer and we can’t wait to share it with you all. With your support, we can make our new product a reality.

Thank You

Blind Spot Gear is comprised of 6 team members that have worked incredibly hard to bring this Kickstarter campaign to life. We really do hope that you like it and whether you’re a new backer of Blind Spot Gear or have been with us since the beginning, we’re hugely grateful for your support.

Risks and challenges

With 3 previous successful Kickstarter campaigns under our belt and a number of products already on the market, Blind Spot Gear have a good handle on the various hurdles faced when launching a new product. In the past we have run into some unexpected delays and problems: this is inevitable when you are trying to do something brand new. With this project however, the core product is ready to go and all the development on the accessories is complete and ready for production.

In short we have learnt a lot and have never been more prepared to launch. We are all very confident we can hit all the targets outlined in the campaign.

Many Thanks 
Billy and the Team at Blind Spot Gear

story:
Recommended by:

SmoothVu™ is a complete hand-held production studio that Includes 3 axis brushless motor stabilizer, professional recording mic, high intensity adjustable LED lights, hard case, and wide angle lenses for your smartphone. We even include a tripod so you can be in the video too!

Capture memorable moments more easily and professionally from your smartphone.

Ever try and create videos outside?  Sound quality may not be so great, is it? How about when there is wind blowing or it is overcast or dark out? Or how about making a video inside your car, or in you house... the lighting is horrible!

With just a stabilizer, you capture this amazing footage, like of your roommate jumping off the 2nd story balcony into the pool! You can’t wait to post onto Facebook. But when you download the video the wind was blowing and you couldn’t hear your roommate yell “Oh, sh**!” when he jumped.  

Creating great video requires four things: 1.) Good video (your Smart Phone) 2. Steady not shaky video (stabilizer) 3. Good sound (high quality microphone) 4.) Good lighting. SmoothVu gives you all of that and more

Smooth Slo-Mo!

SmoothVu will help you create clean, crisp, clear videos. We have created the world’s first fully integrated stabilizer with professional quality accessories to make the world’s first hand held production studio. Great for any profession! Real estate professionals can now make movie quality videos of their homes for sale. YouTubers can have production quality videos. TV personalities can make videos on the go! Weddings can now be filmed which you can be sure of great quality.

Easy to use

Is SmoothVu just for Pros? Definitely not! SmoothVu was created for everyday use. We wanted to create the best tool to capture life’s moments…..on the trail, biking, boarding, driving, etc. Our goal was to make an easy to use SmoothVu right out of the box. Power on, clip on accessories (mic, light) and go!

Real 3 axis stabilization

3 Axis and the cheaper 2 Axis. What is the difference? With a 2 axis stabilizer, you can see the yaw-axis jittering. It's like being in a fast car - flat but real jerky on the side to side. With 3 axis, you have true smooth video which calibrates for the x,y and z axis. Making truly stable and smooth videos. The SmoothVu has brushless motors for quiet, smooth, responsive action

Active tracking, set the App to follow a face. Set the camera by itself and it will follow that object automatically. Great for those that want to be in the video. The App will allow the camera to follow you so you can walk around in the video and the video will capture your every move.  

The SmoothVu App allows you to upload your story.  Sometimes forget your lines? Or too  much to remember?  We  can help.  Simply upload your message and the teleprompter feature will scroll through your story.  Never miss a word again! 

360 Degree Panoramic Filming 

Motion Time lapse function

Smart Buffering Turn Off: Prevent your smart phone from hitting the stabilizer after you turn it off.

High Efficiency Control Algorithm: The stability has an adaptive control algorithm with real time compensation (16,000 time/s) and ultra fast sampling (80,000 time/s )  

The SmoothVu has a side port to allow charging from the SmoothVu battery instead of using your phone's battery. 

LED Lighting Adjustable light intensity switch, rechargeable power, will give you the ideal amount of light needed under any situation to give you incredible videos.

Incredible 3-5 hour charge time. Comes with 2x batteries to give you a total record time of 6-10 hours! A combined 5,200 mAh of charge! The charger is included 

IOS or Android compatible wide angle and macro lenses

 

We include a set of wide angle lenses so you if you can get everything into your desired shot.

 

The Team:

Bob Gruder, I’ve developed law enforcement video camera systems, consumer camera systems as well as run two software companies developing enterprise solutions.

Andy Peacock, As a pioneer in remote controlled aerial filming for movies and TV, I have been involved with brushed and brushless stabilizers since their invention.
Former Head of Content for 360fly. I helped them develop and release the HD and 4K versions of the 360fly. I have taught about VR and 360 at the University of California at Irvine and at The Tisch film School at NYU

story:
We bring you a magical quick release plate for your camera

“Magic Plate”

Don’t need to remove it from the Ballhead
Just press the Magic Release Button to tilt the camera
You can quickly switch between vertical and horizontal mode

 

This is The lightest solution ever for portrait (vertical) mode
When you want to compose your photos vertically, you will tilt your ballhead 
It is difficult to adjust the ballhead freely.
Perhaps buying L-brackets is a solution.
Because of its size and weight, you may consider not to use it.
It may make the battery cover blocked and the use of the shutter release cable influenced.
We want to provide a better solution for you so that's why we started this marvelous project.

 

Just press the Magic Button to unlock and flip the camera 
You can switch to the portrait mode easily.
All you need to do is tighten the Lock Handle to fix the camera
The Magic Plate will allow you to release exposure in silence corner. 

 

 

The function of Magic Plate is similar to L brackets.
The size and weight is half as much as L-brackets

 

Compatible with most Arca compatibility. 
Standard Strap hole/Safety stop screws
Compatible with Peak Design Capture Clip v3(vertical insertion only)

 

 

Beautiful curve and cutting bevel
Dark tones but smooth touch
It is the contradictions that make our product one of a kind
Our three characteristic colors accompany you in the silence atmosphere

Silence Black

 

Corner Gray

 

Metal Red

In such a corner , we are as lonely as you are

 

As we intended, we want to develop lightweight products
But on the strength requirements, we also focus on
It's high-strength design is compatible with nearly all cameras
We recommend using under 2kg for the best experience

Work with Canon 5D3+Battery Grip+Canon 70-200 F4 L IS+580ex II flash
(Total is 2895g)

 
30kg Push Force Load Test
 

 

 

Numerous prototypes were designed and tested
We inspect the structure of locking functions of 0 & 90 degree
Multiple functions were created for this magical gadget.
We designed and refined it.

Finally, the fantastic Magic Plate was created

This is our first project 
I am very happy to finally be a part of indiegogo
Silence Corner was founded by a mechanical engineer who loves photography
We hope that our products can make your gadget minimal
and will be the most reliable tool in your hand.
We have created an amazing solution, but we look to you to help make our dreams a reality. 

We are

Ｓｉｌｅｎｃｅ　Ｃｏｒｎｅｒ


The Logo of Silence Corner image is from Manta
Manta's elegance inspires us 
The silent ocean describes the atmosphere of the silence corner
It symbolizes the unknown and challenges faced by photography enthusiasts in finding the perfect picture
While enjoying traveling alone, you are also facing the lonliness. 

 
We are fascinated with photography
We are enthusiastic about products' research and design. 
Let us exercise our imagination to bring enthusiasm to photographers
Find your own corner

story:
Hello Fellow Dreamers!

I'm Nathaniel Pierce, a fashion photographer that hails from Charlotte, NC and relocated to NYC only 6 months ago. I moved to this phenomenal city to gain in-state residency to complete my double major in fashion photography and cinematography hopefully at SVA. Initially I was accepted to FIT but was unable to afford the out-of-state tuition requirements leaving me with a single option - work hard, save money and move to NYC to intern, assist and work until the year requirement to gain residency is complete.

Since I've moved here, I have worked with numerous clients on both small and grand scales. I've done everything from headshots for actors to jewelry designer campaigns to backstage editorial photo shoots for deisngers for fashion week. It has been a wonderful journey and I'm extremely grateful for all of the opportunities I've had the pleasure of receiving in the short span of 6 months that I've lived here. I've always had high hopes and ambtions with where I'm going in life and I definitely have the right amount of drive and persistence to make this happen!

Heartbreak

My camera and all of my equipment was stolen on 2/19/13 while I was shooting an event a venue in the Williamsburg area of Brooklyn. Taken from me was my Nikon D200, VR 55-200mm lens, 18-55 lens, battery packs, chargers, bag, and a SB-800 flash. My camera and equipment means the world to me. It is the tool for my success and all of my creative endeavors. This camera was a gift to me from my wonderful Aunt and Uncle and the VR 55-200mm lens was a going away/good luck gift from very close family member of mine. Everything I owned has the utmost sentimental value to me - and now it's gone. Not only did I lose items that held incredible personal value, I also lost the tools of my craft that were intended to help me succeed in this intense, competitive journey I decided to embark on.

 

Please Help Me

While I have worked a lot since I've moved to this city, most of my work leading up to this point has been pro bono or voluntary work in order to gain connections, strengthen my resume and expand my portfolio. With that being said, I don't have the funds necessary to replace my equipment. I've finally gotten to the point where I have steady bookings for many different projects and assignments and things were definitely picking up for me leading up to this point. With my camera being stolen, I will most definitely lose clients and contacts considering the fact that I will no longer be able to work for them without my camera and equipment.

In order to replace my equipment in time for my clients' projects, I will have to work hard to raise approximately $1575 in the next 20 days. With this amount of money, I will be able to get back on track and continue to follow my dreams and ambitions! I will be purchasing another camera sufficient to my line of work as well as a flash, a standard lens and a zoom lens. Everything else that was taken, I will hopefully replace over time but these things are the most important items at this time! If you can contribute something, ANYTHING - It will mean the world to me because you're helping me continue to follow my dreams and desires!

 

Can't Contribute?

If you can't contribute, that's fine! Please just spread the word about my indiegogo page to anyone who will listen or might be interested! I need all the help I can get and I will forever remain grateful to everyone even if I don't make my deadline. It means the world to me that there are people out there who care enough to help and support others in their time of need.

 

Websites

Facebook Fanpage: Nathaniel Pierce - Fashion Photography

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Nathaniel-Pierce-Fashion-Photography/103038683067672

 

Photography Website:

http://npiercewish.wix.com/photography

 

 

 

Thank You!

Thank you to everyone!!! I will forever remember this and forever remain in your debt.

I've done everything from headshots for actors to jewelry designer campaigns to backstage editorial photo shoots for deisngers for fashion week. It has been a wonderful journey and I'm extremely grateful for all of the opportunities I've had the pleasure of receiving in the short span of 6 months that I've lived here. I've always had high hopes and ambtions with where I'm going in life and I definitely have the right amount of drive and persistence to make this happen! 
Heartbreak
My camera and all of my equipment was stolen on 2/19/13 while I was shooting an event a venue in the Williamsburg area of Brooklyn. Taken from me was my Nikon D200, VR 55-200mm lens, 18-55 lens, battery packs, chargers, bag, and a SB-800 flash. My camera and equipment means the world to me. It is the tool for my success and all of my creative endeavors. This camera was a gift to me from my wonderful Aunt and Uncle and the VR 55-200mm lens was a going away/good luck gift from very close family member of mine. Everything I owned has the utmost sentimental value to me - and now it's gone. Not only did I lose items that held incredible personal value, I also lost the tools of my craft that were intended to help me succeed in this intense, competitive journey I decided to embark on.
 
Please Help Me
While I have worked a lot since I've moved to this city, most of my work leading up to this point has been pro bono or voluntary work in order to gain connections, strengthen my resume and expand my portfolio. With that being said, I don't have the funds necessary to replace my equipment. I've finally gotten to the point where I have steady bookings for many different projects and assignments and things were definitely picking up for me leading up to this point. With my camera being stolen, I will most definitely lose clients and contacts considering the fact that I will no longer be able to work for them without my camera and equipment.
In order to replace my equipment in time for my clients' projects, I will have to work hard to raise approximately $1575 in the next 20 days. With this amount of money, I will be able to get back on track and continue to follow my dreams and ambitions! I will be purchasing another camera sufficient to my line of work as well as a flash, a standard lens and a zoom lens. Everything else that was taken, I will hopefully replace over time but these things are the most important items at this time! If you can contribute something, ANYTHING - It will mean the world to me because you're helping me continue to follow my dreams and desires!
 
Can't Contribute?
If you can't contribute, that's fine! Please just spread the word about my indiegogo page to anyone who will listen or might be interested! I need all the help I can get and I will forever remain grateful to everyone even if I don't make my deadline. It means the world to me that there are people out there who care enough to help and support others in their time of need.
 
Websites
Facebook Fanpage: Nathaniel Pierce - Fashion Photography
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Nathaniel-Pierce-Fashion-Photography/103038683067672
 
Photography Website:
http://npiercewish.wix.com/photography
 
 
 
Thank You!
Thank you to everyone!!! I will forever remember this and forever remain in your debt.

story:
Help Fund a Ministry!

Lael has been learning how to take better photographs for our family and as a tool to help families that can't afford expensive professional photographers.  She would really like a good portrait lens to get better results, and this lens is the one recommended by the pros!  

Lael is really excited about photography, but also very aware of the high costs associated with the "hobby".  She bought an entry level SLR with a kit lens, but is not happy with the results.  She tries very hard not to spend money on unessentials, so this is a "wish list" item.

Here is a link to the lens:

http://www.nikonusa.com/Nikon-Products/Product/Camera-Lenses/2180/AF-S-NIKKOR-50mm-f%252F1.4G.html

The plan would be to use any funds raised to purchase the lens.

PERKS!

Fund 10 dollars and receive a handmade thank you card!

Fund 50 dollars and receive a 1 hour photoshoot.  Lael will edit the best pictures, and will give you a CD of all the photos for you to use as you see fit.  Will take pictures in the Goshen, Indiana area.

Fund 100 dollars and receive a 2 hour photoshoot.  All photographs will be yours to keep, edited and originals.  Will take pictures at the location of your choice (Michiana area only please).

Thanks all!

story:
Lifetime Replacement Warranty

The Universal Camera Strap does have a warranty. In fact, a lifetime warranty! For as long as you own the product, you're 100% insured against defects in material and workmanship. 

However, we do NOT provide a warranty against damage or any other defects/issues caused to your camera gear WHILE using or NOT using the Universal Camera Strap. In addition, we will not replace lost or stolen Universal Camera Straps.

If your camera breaks while using our product, we are not liable for your camera gear, its repair/replacement, nor act as a financial insurance agency against potentially harmful issues to your camera equipment. The Universal Camera Strap acts as an accessory to help enhance your shooting experience. That is it. We strongly advise you seek out and invest in insurance for your gear just as any other professional would do in any other industry! :)

Customs & Duties

Unfortunately, we cannot mark any pledge/reward as a 'gift', except for those pledges that end up receiving some sort of free item with their order. In addition, import duties and taxes are NOT INCLUDED in our reward levels. These charges vary by country and are completely out of our control. We are shipping the Universal Camera Strap all over the world and it is impossible for us to build the various customs charges into the various reward levels of Kickstarter.

But, this online tool can help you calculate additional costs;

http://www.importcalculator.com

Remember, we are the creators of KUVRD and its products, not international customs. You can use this tool as estimates when determining additional costs in receiving our products.

30-Day Money Back Guarantee 

As stated in our warranty section, we will happily replace the Universal Camera Strap for any defects in material and/or workmanship. 

We also provide a 30-Day Money Back Guarantee Policy. If you're unsatisfied with the Universal Camera Strap for any reason - within the first 30 days of receiving the Universal Camera Strap - we'll send you a full refund. We're not here to take advantage of our backers nor exploit their belief in us by sending them something they weren't expecting or are unsatisfied with.

Just remember, every dollar from this campaign will be directly used to paying off mold fees, patent fees, actually producing the camera strap and the associating components, producing the packaging, fulfilling those orders and paying off all other expenses incurred thus far.

Risks and Challenges

Our biggest foreseeable challenge will be handling and communicating any structural modifications, aesthetic revisions or altering some aspect of the camera strap and STILL fulfill within our estimated deadlines. Any changes that we determine to be incorporated into the design and functionality of the camera strap will come directly from backers.

In the past, we released the original version of the Universal Lens Cap, made NO changes to the lens cap throughout the life of the Kickstarter Campaign and then, after 8 months of shipping out orders and recognizing common themes, requests and suggestions for how to make the product even more desirable amongst photographers, we launched v2 of the Universal Lens Cap (Micro & Magnum) and did so with the all the modifications already in place... which meant going through another Kickstarter Campaign without having incorporating any kind of structural or functional enhancement.

However, because the Universal Camera Strap came about in large part thanks to backers, we're wanting to head into this campaign making sure that we attend to all the revisions, alterations, modifications, enhancements etc. WHILE the Kickstarter Campaign is live so as to incorporate any enhancements into the Universal Camera Strap before heading into the 'mass-production' phase and eventually begin shipping pledges to backers.,

Luckily, we already have the factories, communication channels and lead-times figured out. And, because we've made sure to add a 'buffer' of time for unforeseen hiccups, we feel confident that any amelioration of the camera strap can be incorporated into the molds so that everyone enjoys it while still fulfilling on time!

There are always unforeseeable risks, setbacks and hiccups which is why we plan to be transparent and do everything we can to keep our customers (you, the backer) happy. If something arises, you'll be the first to know about it.

If something arises, you'll be the first to know about it.

story:
Introduction. 

  • Bio

Hello!! My name is Jenni. I am a 24 year old woman, currently seeking to manifest my dreams and goals into this reality. My quest for happiness has taken me around various states, attempting to find my calling in life. My most recent modeling endeavor has landed me in Ferndale MI, 15 minutes north of Detroit. One of my favorite cities in the whole world. One thing has held true over my travels, and that is photography. I have skipped meals, danced past the opportunity of having a roof over my head, and fled the chance to hold someone close at night to be entwined with my passion for pictures. I believe photography helps my imagination grow and keeps my heart calm. I have explored many things with photography, but not nearly enough. Fueled with passion and drive, I have learned from myself as well as my friends along the way.

  • Why a campaign?

I created this campaign to help me further my photographic adventures. I've had to pass up many great personal image and job opportunities due to a lack of professional lighting equipment. There are many tricks I'd love to perform, and emotions I need to capture, but these are not feasible without the correct lighting equipment. I hope to have the chance to pursue my artistic dreams in the near future. That is why I am here on this site, asking for help from all of you. Please help me light my way.

  • Why Help?

By helping me, you are helping an individual in the world make their dreams come true. You will be aiding my understanding of existence, helping it come to life through imagery. You can help inspire others, you will help build art, and push these things further and deeper into the world, and our minds.  

What kind of help, and what I can offer.

  • How much, and why.

I am asking for $2,000 for the perfect starters light kit. I would love nothing more than the opportunity to continue taking my photography to the professional level and not have to turn down paid jobs, as well as compromise my vision.

  • What if you don't reach your goal?

If my goal is not reached I will still acquire parts to the light kit! I am not going to just lay down and let this opportunity pass me. I am determined to make this dream come true! 

  • What is in it for you?

As donations come in I will be setting prizes/rewards/treats for all of the people who make this possible for me. 

bounty will include, but is not limited to (at least not yet)

  • Public thanks
  • Handmade hairclip/hat as a unique photo accessory (you get to keep)
  • Photographic prints (my photography, or modeling {limitations})
  • Photographic prints made into magnets (limitations)
  • 3 hour Modeling session (Includes 3 fully edited pictures)
  • 3 hour modeling session (Includes makeup and 3 fully edited pictures)

and so on...

Usefulness

  • Tell me again, why?

Nothing more than what is here. Your donations will afford me to capture art in a way that I am not presently able. This will allow me to be more creative without limitations, as well as help me create with individuals that I may have not been previously able. I look forward to being able to create new friendships, bonds, and art with this new equipment. Please help me inspire others and push my skill to a whole new level. 

As well as some fun-tastic prizes!!!

 

  • I want to help, but I can't afford to! 

I totally understand, If you cannot donate then helping spread the word of the goal I am attempting to accomplish, along with a link to my campaign would be more than terrific! I am happy to know that people care enough to help me out in any way that they can! Huge thanks to all of my current and future supporters!

story:
VRDL360 Camera

THE COMPACT VR CAMERA FOR 7K PHOTOS, 3K VIDEO. PRE ORDER AT WWW.VRDL360.COM

 

 

VRDL360 is the most efficient 360 VR camera for capturing 7K quality photos, 3K video,

and instant sharing . VRDL360 is compact in size so it easily  fit in your pocket or bag making it a traveler's new go-to gadget.

 

 

Whether you enjoy extreme sports, the great outdoors, traveling, or taking selfies, capturing immersive photos and video with VRDL360 is as easy as it gets. Through VRDL’s easy to use companion desktop software, you can livestream your experiences to friends and family on Facebook and Youtube.

  • ​7K INDUSTRY STANDARD QUALITY - VRDL360 is equipped with dual 16mp CMOS Sony sensors with f/2.0 lenses for capturing 32mp photos, with an ISO reach of 1600 for shooting in low light settings.
  • SOCIAL LIVE STREAMING- With VRDL360 desktop software, easily live stream 3K video on YouTube and Facebook so your friends and followers never miss an exciting moment.
  • VRDL360 APP - VRDL is paired with a companion app that allows you to easily create custom VR photo and video experiences like tiny planets and fish eye.

 

Redefining the Compact 360 Camera 

VRDL360 is the most advanced compact 360 VR camera and is capable of shooting up to 1,000 true 7K photos.

 

With over 40 years of combined experience in computer science, design, and engineering, the team at VRDL360 is determined to design the first 360-degree VR camera to combine 7K photo, 3K video, live streaming, and instant sharing for the average user to shoot and share high-quality, 360-degree images and video. 

  

 

VRDL360 is packed with key features that make it a must have camera for adventure seekers, photography & videography enthusiasts, or those of you who are looking to take your selfies to the next level!

 

 

 

Production Has Already Started!

 

 

 

 

 

See What The Experts Have To Say...

 

 

 

4K Industry Standard Quality

Experience high quality camera optics the way they are intended to be seen, without the illusion.

VRDL360 provides all of the feature qualities (ISO, aperture, speed etc.) you would expect from Sphericam, Vuze, other 360 cameras, all within a conveniently compact and affordable camera smaller than the size of your smartphone. 

 

DUAL 4K LENSES 

With 16mp per 4K lens, VRDL360 can capture every pixel of detail and color.

VRDL360 is equipped with dual 16mp CMOS Sony Sensors with f/2.0 lenses for capturing 32mp photos, with an ISO reach of 1600 for shooting in low light settings.

Each lens is made of  9 elements in 8 groups and features non-sphere glass, making it easier for the camera to focus on any subject to reduce optical distortion when capturing images on the go.

 

BREATHTAKING PANORAMIC VIEWS

VRDL360 is the most advanced compact 360 camera that is perfect for capturing life's most memorable moments from all angles.

VR Dongli's experience in panoramic technologies is apparent in the VRDL360 camera. With a click of a button you can capture every pixel of each panoramic photo and video with the advanced communication and stitch processing technology from VRDL360's companion app.

VRDL360 makes it possible for the average consumer to shoot panoramic photos and videos and provide many opportunities to capture high quality content on the fly. 

VRDL is an ideal camera for a variety of sectors and use cases including, travel, entertainment, business, and real-estate just to name a few.

 

F/2.0 APERTURE & ISO 100-1600 RANGE

VRDL360 is equipped with hardware that makes it possible to shoot in many low light situations while still capturing high quality photo and video content.

Many cameras in the market today with impressive aperture and ISO range settings are often too expensive for the average consumer looking for a quality and affordability in their next camera.

VRDL360 has an impressive F/2.0 lens aperture  which allows more light to enter the camera allowing you to capture vivid images without worrying too much about lighting.

When you do find yourself in situations with very limited lighting such as concerts, and other low lit or indoor events VRDL360's ISO range of 100-1600 provide sufficient compensation for the lack of light that is available. 

 

 

SOCIAL LIVE STREAMING

Increase your social media appeal by sharing your adventures in real-time.

VRDL360 makes it possible to share content on your favorite social media platforms including: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, WeChat, QQ, Qzone, and many more. 

 

FACEBOOK LIVE 

VRDL360 supports Facebook Lifestream integration through VRDL360's companion app for all your live stream needs.

Now that Facebook has become one of the most popular social platforms for lifestream social sharing, VRDL360 gives you unlimited capabilities for creating custom 3K live video experiences for your family and friends on Facebook.

With VRDL360 and Facebook live, you'll have your friends wishing they tagged along with you at your next party, concert, graduation, or backpacking trip. 

 

YOUTUBE LIVE STREAMING

Whether you are a Youtube personality or simply sharing your adventures, VRDL360 will allow you to give your subscribers something to look forward to once they experience the high quality streaming capabilities of VRDL360 paired with your personality and adventurous lifestyle.

VRDL360 will allow you to put down the bulky cameras and accessories so you can conveniently stream on Youtube in  unmatched 3K quality whenever you feel the need to share your experiences.

VRDL360 and the companion app allows you to connect to Youtube & Facebook using two optional modes:  1. Cellular Data or 2. Wifi. With just a few simple steps the app will allow you to quickly connect to Youtube for live streaming without skipping a beat.

 

TWITTER

In a world where social engagement is at an all time high, VRDL360 has integrated instant sharing with Twitter.

Live tweeting has just become more interesting with VRDL360. If you feel the need to share content on the fly, snap photos or video from your VRDL360 camera and instantly share on twitter with customized message (in 140 characters or less). 

VRDL360 also makes it possible for you to choose between posting your images in 360 degree format or in standard format for those moments when it is ideal to take a standard photo. This all can be done simply in VRDL360's app with supported social media platforms like Twitter.

 

 

VRDL360 APP

Creating custom VR experiences with 360 degree views just became user-friendly. 

VRDL360 comes paired with a powerful app that serves as the hub for user generated content allowing you to customize photos and videos on the fly and instantly share with family and friends.

 

MULTIPLE VIEW MODES

Let your creative juices flow with VRDL360's multiple view mode features. With 4 view modes, you can customize the perspective of your photos and videos.

VRDL360'S companion app allows you to edit photos and videos on the fly without having to download or export manually to a computer. Enjoy 4 creative 360 view modes such as: Fisheye, Perspective, Little Planet, and VR.

Add the finishing touches to your photos and videos with a variety of included filters just as you would in some of your favorite social media platforms such as Instagram and Facebook.

 

VRDL360 DAILY SELECTIONS 

View and share your  photos and videos with the VRDL360 user community.

The VRDL360 app allows you to join and explore the many VRDL360 users who share their content just as you would discover user-curetted photos and videos on your Instagram's Explore tab.

The VRDL360 app is powered by a powerful algorithm that curates the content of users who opt-in by selecting "Share via VRDL360 Cloud" before posting their photos and videos to their favorite social media network. This allows your 360 VR photos and videos to be seen by users all over the world.

 

DEDICATED WIFI CONTROLS

Stay connected to your VRDL360 with your favorite smartphone devices while on the go.

VRDL360 comes with a built in dedicated Wifi network that allows you control the camera directly through the companion app on your smartphone. This allows VRDL360 to quickly communicate and respond to your actions within the app and which is ideal when traveling and mounting the camera on drones.

With the dedicated Wifi module comparable to most home wifi networks you can quickly send large photo and video files as well as experience ideal live streaming performance. 

 

 

 

 

VRDL360 Product Technical Specifications

  • Object distance: Approx. 3.94 inches - ∞ (from front of lens)
  • Shooting mode Still image: Auto, Shutter Priority, ISO Priority,Time Lapse, Burst Shooting  Manual (App); Live streaming: Auto; Video: Auto
  • Exposure control mode: Auto
  • Exposure compensation Still image: Auto & Manual 
  • ISO sensitivity Still image: ISO 100 to 1600; Video: ISO 100 to 1600; Live streaming: ISO100 - 1600
  • White balance mode Still image: Auto & Manual; Video: Auto & Manual; Live streaming: 
  • Shutter Speed: Auto & Manual
  • Recording: medium External Micro SD
  • Power source: Lithium battery
  • Battery: 2000 mAh (Approx. 1,000 photos or 2h video recording when used standalone)
  • Image file format Still image: JPEG (Exif Ver. 2.3); Video: MP4 (Video: MPEG-4 AVC/H.264, Audio: AAC)
  • External interface Micro USB terminal: USB 2.0
  • Exterior/external dimensions: 1.85 inch (W) x 5.11 inches (H) x 0.7 inch (D)
  • Weight: Approx. 0.23lb
  • Lens Configuration: 9 elements in 8 groups
  • Lens Apperture (F value): F2.0
  • Image sensorsize: 1/2.3 CMOS (x2)
  • Output Pixels: Equivalent to approx. 24 megapixels (x2)
  • Still image resolution: L: 7000 x 3500, M: 3072 x 1536
  • Video resolution/frame rate/bit rate: L: 3072 x 1536/30 fps/16 Mbps
  • M: 2048 x 1024/30 fps/6 Mbps
  • Live streaming resolution/frame rate L: 3072 x 1536/30 fps
  • M: 2048 x 1024/30 fps
  • Wi-Fi Communications Protocol: HTTP & rtsp
  • Built-in Gyroscope for electronic image stabilization
  • HDR 3 brackets

 

 

VRDL360 Product Timeline

 

 

 

Meet The  VRDL Dongli Team

Zidane Xu got his master degree in Computer Science and has worked as a core team member in the first ever street view service provider, City8 which was launched one year earlier than Google’s. He’s a VR geek with 10 years’ experience in image algorithm related technologies. He wants to bring VR fun to more people from around the world by providing the best VR experience at an affordable cost to everyone.

 

 

Jason Chen, graduated from Peking University, top in China, with his master degree in Electronic Engineering. He got the second place in Localization task of 2014 ImageNet Large Scale Visual Recognition Competition and has worked as a core team member on computer vision in a public security department for over 3 years. He’s leading the team for the VRDL360 app for both iOS & Android.

 

 

Gilbert Lee has more than 20 years’ experience in hardware manufacturing and delivering and also has a profound amount of knowledge about products in the field of multimedia technology.

 

 

Hunter Wen, worked as an expert engineer in street view department at Baidu.com, the largest search engine in China and a Fortune 500 company, and he has also been the core team member at City8, playing a significant role for in its release.

 

 

​

Joe Rao, has more than 10 years’ experience in digital marketing and has also worked for the parent company of City8 for 7 years. Joe has also led Easypano Holdings Inc. a leading panorama & virtual tour software company since 2009 until the end of 2013. He’s a passionate VR tech lover. 

 

 

Liming Zou, since he graduated as a computer science major from the university in 2014. He's now responsible for the development of UI and some key features of VRDL360 app.

 

 

Tim Zhang computer science major in university and graduated in 2014, is now in charge of the development of Android app of VRDL360. He serves a significant role in the team as he needs to make the Android app possible from scratch, and now it's almost there.

 

 

Rui Lee has a unique appreciation for art work, which came from her early year's participation in art training. After her graduation from college, she put herself in designing all kinds of stuff with special love in UI design. Now she's in charge of all the designing tasks in the team.

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Are you offering a warranty on VRDL360?

  • Yes, we are offering a 1 year warranty. Warranty is only for exchange of a defective unit.

What are all the supporting resolutions and fps of the video (frames per second)?

  • 2K @30fps, 3K @30fps

Can you take time lapse videos?

  • Yes, you can set the camera to time lapse mode and choose the time lap between 3s/5s/10s through the App.

Will there be an Android App?

  • Yes, both Android and iOS App are available.

How do you know how much power is left in the battery?

  • You can see the battery status on the camera screen or in the App.

Q: How do you know how much memory is remaining?

  • You can see the remaining storage status by connecting your camera to the computer or in the Settings of the App.

Q: What is the sensitivity in low-light?

  • The aperture is F2.0, and the ISO is between 100-1600.

Q: What is the maximum supported Micro SD card storage?

  • 128G.

Q: Does VRDL360 come with a memory card?

  • No, we are not including a memory card with your order.

Q: What's the video recording duration for 3K@30FPS and 64G of memory?

  • At 30FPS, 64G will record about 4.75 hours.

Q: Will a charging cable come with VRDL360?

  • Yes, each package will include a Micro USB for charging.

Q: How many hours will VRDL360 last if only used for taking pictures?

  • There are many factors and conditions to calculate this, but generally the battery life should last for about 1 day.

Q: Can VRDL360 connect to a microphone through a 3.5mm mic adapter?

  • VRDL360 does not have a 3.5mm port.

Q: Can you stream live video using VRDL360?

  • Yes, you can stream live vide using the application.

Q: Is VRDL360 compatible with a standard tripod?

  • No, but we’re providing optional base compatible with standard tripod.

Q: How do you control the white balance, or is this automatic?

  • It’s automatic.

Q: How long will it take to completely charge the internal camera battery?

  • This depends on the type of charger you are using, but generally it will take 2 hours.

Q: What is the Battery Life (estimated time) of VRDL360?

  • 3K@30fps is estimated at 2 hours.

Q: What is the focal length for VRDL360?

  • Focal length of VRDL360  is 1.18mm。

Q: What is the WIFI range?

  • WIFI range is about 10m - 20m.

Q: Can we find the app on the Android and iOS stores?

  • You can find VRDL360 at App Store for your iOS device and soon it will be available at Google Play.

Q: You mention on the page that the memory card that is supported is Micro SD, would this be Micro SDXC or Micro SDHC?

  • Yes, both Micro SDXC or SDHC are also supported.

Q: Is the focus automatic?

  • Yes, it is automatic.

Q: how would you recommend attaching this to a drone?

  • We are working on partners to provide mounts to drones.

Q: VRDL360 can charge on 100-220 volts right?

  • The VRDL360 should not be charged on 100-220 volt while it should be charged by a Micro-USB cable, which means it depends on the USB adapter in your region.

Q: What is the bitrate of the camera for videos?

  • H.264 codec.

Q: Can you adjust the aperture and shutter speed?

  • The aperture can't be adjusted while shutter speed can be changed through the VRDL360 app.

Q: Do you have provision for firmware update in case of a buggy first release?

  • Yes. We will continue to provide firmware updates for fixing the bugs and improving image quality.

Q: What is the depth of field of the VRDL360 lens?

  • 0.2m - ∞.

 

 

Designed & Managed by Agency 2.0 - The #1  Crowdfunding Marketing Agency

At Agency 2.0, our commitment is to the backers by vetting every crowdfunding campaign we work with to ensure the quality product designs, fulfillment practices and the team behind the campaign.

When backing an Agency 2.0 crowdfunding campaign, you can rest assured we did our homework so you do not have to knowing Agency 2.0 crowdfunding campaigns:

  • Fulfillment rates far exceed the industry average in on-time delivery
  • Agency 2.0 has touched every product in advance of coming on board
