story_txt:
VRDL360 CameraTHE COMPACT VR CAMERA FOR 7K PHOTOS, 3K VIDEO. PRE ORDER AT WWW.VRDL360.COM  VRDL360 is the most efficient 360 VR camera for capturing 7K quality photos, 3K video,and instant sharing . VRDL360 is compact in size so it easily  fit in your pocket or bag making it a traveler's new go-to gadget.  Whether you enjoy extreme sports, the great outdoors, traveling, or taking selfies, capturing immersive photos and video with VRDL360 is as easy as it gets. Through VRDL’s easy to use companion desktop software, you can livestream your experiences to friends and family on Facebook and Youtube.

​7K INDUSTRY STANDARD QUALITY - VRDL360 is equipped with dual 16mp CMOS Sony sensors with f/2.0 lenses for capturing 32mp photos, with an ISO reach of 1600 for shooting in low light settings.


SOCIAL LIVE STREAMING- With VRDL360 desktop software, easily live stream 3K video on YouTube and Facebook so your friends and followers never miss an exciting moment.


VRDL360 APP - VRDL is paired with a companion app that allows you to easily create custom VR photo and video experiences like tiny planets and fish eye.

 Redefining the Compact 360 Camera VRDL360 is the most advanced compact 360 VR camera and is capable of shooting up to 1,000 true 7K photos. With over 40 years of combined experience in computer science, design, and engineering, the team at VRDL360 is determined to design the first 360-degree VR camera to combine 7K photo, 3K video, live streaming, and instant sharing for the average user to shoot and share high-quality, 360-degree images and video.    VRDL360 is packed with key features that make it a must have camera for adventure seekers, photography & videography enthusiasts, or those of you who are looking to take your selfies to the next level!   Production Has Already Started!     See What The Experts Have To Say...   4K Industry Standard QualityExperience high quality camera optics the way they are intended to be seen, without the illusion.VRDL360 provides all of the feature qualities (ISO, aperture, speed etc.) you would expect from Sphericam, Vuze, other 360 cameras, all within a conveniently compact and affordable camera smaller than the size of your smartphone.  DUAL 4K LENSES With 16mp per 4K lens, VRDL360 can capture every pixel of detail and color.VRDL360 is equipped with dual 16mp CMOS Sony Sensors with f/2.0 lenses for capturing 32mp photos, with an ISO reach of 1600 for shooting in low light settings.Each lens is made of  9 elements in 8 groups and features non-sphere glass, making it easier for the camera to focus on any subject to reduce optical distortion when capturing images on the go. BREATHTAKING PANORAMIC VIEWSVRDL360 is the most advanced compact 360 camera that is perfect for capturing life's most memorable moments from all angles.VR Dongli's experience in panoramic technologies is apparent in the VRDL360 camera. With a click of a button you can capture every pixel of each panoramic photo and video with the advanced communication and stitch processing technology from VRDL360's companion app.VRDL360 makes it possible for the average consumer to shoot panoramic photos and videos and provide many opportunities to capture high quality content on the fly. VRDL is an ideal camera for a variety of sectors and use cases including, travel, entertainment, business, and real-estate just to name a few. F/2.0 APERTURE & ISO 100-1600 RANGEVRDL360 is equipped with hardware that makes it possible to shoot in many low light situations while still capturing high quality photo and video content.Many cameras in the market today with impressive aperture and ISO range settings are often too expensive for the average consumer looking for a quality and affordability in their next camera.VRDL360 has an impressive F/2.0 lens aperture  which allows more light to enter the camera allowing you to capture vivid images without worrying too much about lighting.When you do find yourself in situations with very limited lighting such as concerts, and other low lit or indoor events VRDL360's ISO range of 100-1600 provide sufficient compensation for the lack of light that is available.   SOCIAL LIVE STREAMINGIncrease your social media appeal by sharing your adventures in real-time.VRDL360 makes it possible to share content on your favorite social media platforms including: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, WeChat, QQ, Qzone, and many more.  FACEBOOK LIVE VRDL360 supports Facebook Lifestream integration through VRDL360's companion app for all your live stream needs.Now that Facebook has become one of the most popular social platforms for lifestream social sharing, VRDL360 gives you unlimited capabilities for creating custom 3K live video experiences for your family and friends on Facebook.With VRDL360 and Facebook live, you'll have your friends wishing they tagged along with you at your next party, concert, graduation, or backpacking trip.  YOUTUBE LIVE STREAMINGWhether you are a Youtube personality or simply sharing your adventures, VRDL360 will allow you to give your subscribers something to look forward to once they experience the high quality streaming capabilities of VRDL360 paired with your personality and adventurous lifestyle.VRDL360 will allow you to put down the bulky cameras and accessories so you can conveniently stream on Youtube in  unmatched 3K quality whenever you feel the need to share your experiences.VRDL360 and the companion app allows you to connect to Youtube & Facebook using two optional modes:  1. Cellular Data or 2. Wifi. With just a few simple steps the app will allow you to quickly connect to Youtube for live streaming without skipping a beat. TWITTERIn a world where social engagement is at an all time high, VRDL360 has integrated instant sharing with Twitter.Live tweeting has just become more interesting with VRDL360. If you feel the need to share content on the fly, snap photos or video from your VRDL360 camera and instantly share on twitter with customized message (in 140 characters or less). VRDL360 also makes it possible for you to choose between posting your images in 360 degree format or in standard format for those moments when it is ideal to take a standard photo. This all can be done simply in VRDL360's app with supported social media platforms like Twitter.  VRDL360 APPCreating custom VR experiences with 360 degree views just became user-friendly. VRDL360 comes paired with a powerful app that serves as the hub for user generated content allowing you to customize photos and videos on the fly and instantly share with family and friends. MULTIPLE VIEW MODESLet your creative juices flow with VRDL360's multiple view mode features. With 4 view modes, you can customize the perspective of your photos and videos.VRDL360'S companion app allows you to edit photos and videos on the fly without having to download or export manually to a computer. Enjoy 4 creative 360 view modes such as: Fisheye, Perspective, Little Planet, and VR.Add the finishing touches to your photos and videos with a variety of included filters just as you would in some of your favorite social media platforms such as Instagram and Facebook. VRDL360 DAILY SELECTIONS View and share your  photos and videos with the VRDL360 user community.The VRDL360 app allows you to join and explore the many VRDL360 users who share their content just as you would discover user-curetted photos and videos on your Instagram's Explore tab.The VRDL360 app is powered by a powerful algorithm that curates the content of users who opt-in by selecting "Share via VRDL360 Cloud" before posting their photos and videos to their favorite social media network. This allows your 360 VR photos and videos to be seen by users all over the world. DEDICATED WIFI CONTROLSStay connected to your VRDL360 with your favorite smartphone devices while on the go.VRDL360 comes with a built in dedicated Wifi network that allows you control the camera directly through the companion app on your smartphone. This allows VRDL360 to quickly communicate and respond to your actions within the app and which is ideal when traveling and mounting the camera on drones.With the dedicated Wifi module comparable to most home wifi networks you can quickly send large photo and video files as well as experience ideal live streaming performance.     VRDL360 Product Technical Specifications

Exposure control mode: Auto

Exposure compensation Still image: Auto & Manual 

ISO sensitivity Still image: ISO 100 to 1600; Video: ISO 100 to 1600; Live streaming: ISO100 - 1600

White balance mode Still image: Auto & Manual; Video: Auto & Manual; Live streaming: 

Shutter Speed: Auto & Manual

Recording: medium External Micro SD

Power source: Lithium battery

story: Hey everyone, my names Luc Burns and I'm from a small town in southern Connecticut. Photography is a recent passion that I've found and would love to continue to pursue it. I currently attend Green Mountain College in Poultney, Vt. I have been on the fence about trying to get a new Macro lens for quite some time now, but, being a college student, I don't really have money to spare. Hence why I'm starting this project. The lens I would love to get is the Canon L series 100 mm macro lens. For those not familiar with photography that means it's a very high quality close up lens. I could do great work with this and would love to get my hands on it, and that's where you all come in. Anything that you kind folks can donate would help me immensely. As I have said this is a huge passion of mine and I would love to make this happen. Thank you.

story:
My name is Ashlee and I am a photographer.I'm also a wife and a new mom.

This year for my birthday all I want is a new lens. I can't do it on my own so I need your help! I'm really dying to add 3 lenes to my bag but each lens costs between $1200-$1500! I'm not planning on being able to buy the best versions {yet} but i'm hoping to add the less expensive versions of either the 35mm or the 85mm to my bag. Every time I save up for one something comes up and I have to use the money on something else such as a medical bill or fixing something on my 107 year old home!

**The money I get from this will ONLY go towards my new lens!**

While no donation is to small I will be giving some perks for some of the higher donations!

Fund $15 and recieve a free 5x7 landscape print of your choice signed by me

Fund $50 and recieve a free mini session

Fund $100 or more and recieve a free family/portrait session

Fund $200 or more and recieve a free family/portrait session AND get an 11x14 print from your session!

THANK YOU!!!

Here are some links to the lenses I'm hoping to get.

http://www.bhphotovideo.com/c/product/12182-GRE...

www.bhphotovideo.com/c/product/12119-GREY/Canon...

story:
We believe in the future of content creators, so we spent the last 15 months putting our passion to the test, creating what we believe is the evolution of smartphone filming. We feel more and more people are responding to the innate call to create and share their visions with the world. With DreamGrip™, we want to provide the necessary components for professional film and photo making while merging them with the technology that everyone has today - a smartphone.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

George Denisov started his business in mobile phones and accessories in early 2000. His MXS Ltd was booming together with the blossom of the first smartphones and tablets market. The further business development required strong ties with Hong Kong and China. With a MBA and PhD in Law, George’s meticulous nature pushes the DreamGrip product and team to a point of perfection.

In late 2015 George developed the concept of DreamGrip™, and spring 2016 the first prototype was tested. It took a while to bring the product from just a concept to fully functional filming system. And even now he is 100% focused on the product to secure and tackle all the issues of preparing for mass production.

Broderick is a digital filmmaker by education but has carried his vision forward in a number of companies and a number of global brands. In 2005 Brodie founded a company called The Media Merchants (TMM) replacing traditional billboards with projections onto building walls and surfaces. TMM executed projects all across North America, Brazil, and Africa.

Since 2013 Broderick has been working with startups in Canada, China, and Southeast Asia in respect to drones, IOT, and digital content. It is important for him to be at the forefront of innovation whle hitting the market at the right time.

 

 

Which smartphones can I use with the DreamGrip™ system?

You can use almost any smartphone, that has at least one camera; 15mm thick or slimmer; less than 105mm wide, and 170mm high. So far we have not faced any compatibility problems with any well-known models. Do not hesitate to send a direct message to hello@dreamgrip.com if you have a specific question regarding your smartphone model! 

How do I connect the DreamGrip™ Bluetooth Remote control?

To connect the DreamGrip™ Bluetooth controller, You switch on Bluetooth controller, and set it to pairing mode. Then open Bluetooth settings on your phone and choose DG Control to make the pair. To learn more on how to use it we will provide you with a detailed manual. We're happy to answer any questions you have. 

Which lenses can I use with your system?

You can use any lens with the thread of either 17mm or 37 mm. These two sizes are kind of the new standard for mobile phone lens suppliers, so you can choose any.

Meanwhile we have chosen a selection of recommended lenses that we have made our tunings to. After almost a year of testing different optics we think our lenses now have the best P/Q ratio. Although please mind the fact that there still is no lens yet suitable for everyone and everything. We will share more information about optics in the Academy, coming soon.

Which filters can I use with your the DreamGrip™​ system?

You can use either 37mm or 52mm filters, or any other filters, that can be screwed on top of your lens. You also can use other filter sizes with 37mm or 52mm hoods that have special threading.

Is the system compatible with newer devices such as iPhone 7 or dual camera phone?

We have been developing a truly universal system, so the compatibility with new models is important. We can’t be 100% sure smartphones would not ever turn to have a crossed or rounded shape. But for now we believe new models will fit DreamGrip™ and deliver you the amazing filming experience as long as they fit in the size limits mentioned above.

What is DreamGrip™?

DreamGrip™ is a new filming system for any smartphone. It is a rig that helps you to connect and align your phone conveniently with photo and video filming equipment. You may use different optics, lights, microphones, mount on a dolly, monopods, tripods, and many other support systems - all is connectable to DreamGrip™.

All the parts of the system are replaceable, so you will be able to assemble your custom version based on all the filming needs you have.

What is the purpose of DreamGrip™?

DreamGrip™ is designed to help you to use a number of existing photo and video accessories to create better content with your smartphone.

How much does DreamGrip™ cost?

We did our best to design DreamGrip™ in the most cost efficient way. Finally we managed the suggested retail price for the DreamGrip Evolution™ to be set at $129 with Bluetooth the remote control, CPL filter and branded strap.

Where can I buy DreamGrip™?

The first final product will be delivered to backers of the project, and later the DreamGrip™ will be available on our e-store with a number of accessories for it. We are also finalizing our distributers and retailers around the world in December 2016/January 2017. 

What do we get when we order?

You will have the DreamGrip™ system with a number of accessories according to your choice.

How does the Bluetooth™ Remote send the control commands to the device?

Via radio signal on a given frequency using Bluetooth™ protocol. Your smartphone software will recognize the command and transmit it to your phone to perform.

Could you include your technology in smart phones in the future?

You may need different accessories to have the best shot in different conditions. So we think you still benefit from using DreamGrip™ and the accessories with your smartphone, and your future new smartphones for quite a while.

How do I charge DreamGrip Bluetooth™ Remote? What is the battery life time?

We are considering two options currently: battery or rechargeable accumulator to power the remote control. Battery is a better choice we think, and we expect it’s lifetime for about a year. We will inform you once the choice is confirmed.

What's the controlling distance?

It is standard 10 meters like for most of Bluetooth devices. But the best clear signal you have within 3-5 meters.

Will there be updates to the Bluetooth Remote in the future?

We can’t be sure now, but we will update the software as time goes by.

When does shipping begin?

We are scheduling the first shipments mid February 2017. We are working hard to start mass production as soon as possible, but it does take time, and want to ensure you are given the absolute best product.

Where does it ship? How much is shipping?

The shipping costs by national post are included for Canada, China, Hong Kong, and US. You may need (maybe not) to pay extra if you have other delivery instructions, but no more, than actual delivery costs are.

We will always be looking at more solutions, so please check in with this as we are constantly trying to offer the best or free shipping to all our supporters.

Do I have to pay VAT / GST?

It depends on your country tax legislation. We will provide the original receipt with the actual price and declare the value to delivery companies.

What happens if my DreamGrip™  breaks or stops working?

Well, the construction is quite durable. Although you still need to take care of it, save it from dropping or accidentally sitting on it. In the case of a problem during common use, please, contact our support by mail. We will consider the case and ship you the spare part for replacement for free during the warranty period if the problem had not been caused by a damage. After the warranty period you can buy parts in the e-store or from resellers.

How can I check the status of my pledges?

You can check in by any of our emails on site or through ghout the campaign details.

Who should I contact if I'm interested in a distribution partnership on in purchasing in bulk?

Please contact us directly at hello@dreamgrip.com. 

Who should I contact if I'm a journalist?

Don't hesitate to contact us directly at hello@dreamgrip.com. 

If I have other questions, who should I contact?

We are here to answer any of your questions! Don't hesitate to contact us directly at hello@dreamgrip.com.
story_txt:
We believe in the future of content creators, so we spent the last 15 months putting our passion to the test, creating what we believe is the evolution of smartphone filming. We feel more and more people are responding to the innate call to create and share their visions with the world. With DreamGrip™, we want to provide the necessary components for professional film and photo making while merging them with the technology that everyone has today - a smartphone.
 




 
 
 

 

       George Denisov started his business in mobile phones and accessories in early 2000. His MXS Ltd was booming together with the blossom of the first smartphones and tablets market. The further business development required strong ties with Hong Kong and China. With a MBA and PhD in Law, George’s meticulous nature pushes the DreamGrip product and team to a point of perfection.In late 2015 George developed the concept of DreamGrip™, and spring 2016 the first prototype was tested. It took a while to bring the product from just a concept to fully functional filming system. And even now he is 100% focused on the product to secure and tackle all the issues of preparing for mass production.Broderick is a digital filmmaker by education but has carried his vision forward in a number of companies and a number of global brands. In 2005 Brodie founded a company called The Media Merchants (TMM) replacing traditional billboards with projections onto building walls and surfaces. TMM executed projects all across North America, Brazil, and Africa.Since 2013 Broderick has been working with startups in Canada, China, and Southeast Asia in respect to drones, IOT, and digital content. It is important for him to be at the forefront of innovation whle hitting the market at the right time.  Which smartphones can I use with the DreamGrip™ system?You can use almost any smartphone, that has at least one camera; 15mm thick or slimmer; less than 105mm wide, and 170mm high. So far we have not faced any compatibility problems with any well-known models. Do not hesitate to send a direct message to hello@dreamgrip.com if you have a specific question regarding your smartphone model! How do I connect the DreamGrip™ Bluetooth Remote control?To connect the DreamGrip™ Bluetooth controller, You switch on Bluetooth controller, and set it to pairing mode. Then open Bluetooth settings on your phone and choose DG Control to make the pair. To learn more on how to use it we will provide you with a detailed manual. We're happy to answer any questions you have. Which lenses can I use with your system?You can use any lens with the thread of either 17mm or 37 mm. These two sizes are kind of the new standard for mobile phone lens suppliers, so you can choose any.Meanwhile we have chosen a selection of recommended lenses that we have made our tunings to. After almost a year of testing different optics we think our lenses now have the best P/Q ratio. Although please mind the fact that there still is no lens yet suitable for everyone and everything. We will share more information about optics in the Academy, coming soon.Which filters can I use with your the DreamGrip™​ system?You can use either 37mm or 52mm filters, or any other filters, that can be screwed on top of your lens. You also can use other filter sizes with 37mm or 52mm hoods that have special threading.Is the system compatible with newer devices such as iPhone 7 or dual camera phone?We have been developing a truly universal system, so the compatibility with new models is important. We can’t be 100% sure smartphones would not ever turn to have a crossed or rounded shape. But for now we believe new models will fit DreamGrip™ and deliver you the amazing filming experience as long as they fit in the size limits mentioned above.What is DreamGrip™?DreamGrip™ is a new filming system for any smartphone. We are working hard to start mass production as soon as possible, but it does take time, and want to ensure you are given the absolute best product.Where does it ship? How much is shipping?The shipping costs by national post are included for Canada, China, Hong Kong, and US. You may need (maybe not) to pay extra if you have other delivery instructions, but no more, than actual delivery costs are.We will always be looking at more solutions, so please check in with this as we are constantly trying to offer the best or free shipping to all our supporters.Do I have to pay VAT / GST?It depends on your country tax legislation. We will provide the original receipt with the actual price and declare the value to delivery companies.What happens if my DreamGrip™  breaks or stops working?Well, the construction is quite durable. Although you still need to take care of it, save it from dropping or accidentally sitting on it. In the case of a problem during common use, please, contact our support by mail. We will consider the case and ship you the spare part for replacement for free during the warranty period if the problem had not been caused by a damage. After the warranty period you can buy parts in the e-store or from resellers.How can I check the status of my pledges?You can check in by any of our emails on site or through ghout the campaign details.Who should I contact if I'm interested in a distribution partnership on in purchasing in bulk?Please contact us directly at hello@dreamgrip.com. Who should I contact if I'm a journalist?Don't hesitate to contact us directly at hello@dreamgrip.com. If I have other questions, who should I contact?We are here to answer any of your questions! Don't hesitate to contact us directly at hello@dreamgrip.com.

story:
Why PLC-Uno

I have been designing, fabricating and manufacturing micro-controller based devices since 1988. My areas of interest have been custom-built industrial automation controllers, PMDC servo drives and CNC.

In my experience of industrial automation, the biggest bugbear has been the Programmable Logic Controller. PLCs come in as many flavours and colours as the companies manufacturing them, some with proprietary programming software, which need to be bought at great cost; some with free software. With myriad software and standards, handling PLCs in the field is a nightmare for the engineer working with industrial or home automation.

With the Arduino environment having become the de facto Open Source software and hardware standard over the last few years, it was only natural for us to start building a Programmable Logic Controller for the Arduino environment.

We have fabricated a successful prototype of the PLC, which is compatible with the Arduino IDE as the Arduino Uno. Please watch the video of the PLC in action.

The PLC-Uno has 8 x optically isolated 24VDC inputs (24VDC is the industrial standard across the globe), 1 x 0-5VDC analog input, 6 electrically isolated relay outputs rated 10A at 220VAC and 1 x analog output, selectable between 0-10VDC output or 4-20mA output, via a set of jumpers. We have plans to design similar PLCs around the Arduino Mega256 and the Arduino Due cores.

The PLC-Uno will be open source hardware and will be compatible with the Arduino(tm) environment and with Bitlash(tm) scripting and anything else that is Arduino(tm) compatible.

What We Need & What You Get

Here are some details:

  • We require US$ 10,000/- of funding to bring the PLC-Uno into production, make up a stock of approximately 100 PLC Uno and build an automated website to enable the distribution, sale and support of the device.
  • For those who fund us to the tune of US$ 75/- and above, we have attractive perks - please refer to the perks elsewhere on this page.
  • If we do not reach our funding goal, we will still stay the course. We may not be able to manufacture the first batch of 100 PLC-Uno but we'll manufacture as many as we can. That is why we have selected flexible funding.

The Impact

The impact of this project are manifold:

  • An Open Source PLC is a certain need in an industry that is awash with thousands of brands programmable using thousands of proprietary environments.
  • Imagine setting up a project to pump water to an overhead tank and switch on and off your porch lights for the night and day automatically. You would require a commercial PLC from Siemens or Allen Bradley or many other companies like these, with analog and digital inputs and digital outputs, costing in the range of US$ 200 per PLC minimum, maybe more. Add on the cost of the PC software for programming the PLC and you have on your hands a very expensive project indeed! With an Open source project like PLC-Uno, the same project would cost below US$ 90. :)
  • PLC-Uno is a valuable tool for the Arduino community. Once it is ready for delivery, it will also be released as Open Source hardware, for anyone to copy and fabricate.
  • This device will be followed up by more powerful cores, supporting far more I/O and much faster speeds. We plan a version called the PLC-Mega and another called the PLC-Due.

Suggestions

  • We want your suggestions - please write to rajiv.personal AT gmail DOT com:
  1. Is an Ethernet interface needed?
  2. Is a GSM interface needed?
  3. How about the IIC and SPI buses being exposed outside?
  4. Is an RS-485/422 interface useful?

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • You can spread the word - the more of us join in this project, the better it will be for the entire community.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word to others in the community, via social networking.

Disclaimer

  • This project is a derivative of the Arduino and though it is 100% compatible with Arduino software, it is in no way associated with the Arduino.
  • We heartily acknowledge all trademarks and copyrights.

story:
Ghost is the world's easiest drone to fly. It is perfect for first-timers and experienced pilots alike.  Help us make drones more accessible to everyone!


With our smartphone app and a GoPro, you can become an aerial filmmaker. Be the star of your adventures!


There is no bulky RC controller to carry around. You also don't need a co-pilot, since control is through one-click commands on your phone. Auto-follow mode keeps the camera on you.


Ghost arrives ready to use and fully assembled.  A small G-Box communicates between the smartphone and the drone. The 2D gimbal fits a GoPro and keeps your shot stable. No need for a buddy or expensive helicopter. You can record all of your adventures easily and share them with your friends. 


We wanted to improve on the auto-follow that exists now. We have made our auto-follow feature work to let you film yourself. This is super fun, as you can use it for action sports, from trail running and biking, to surfing and snow sports. Our auto-follow will continue to film you as you make turns and change direction, always keeping the camera on you. 

Here is a clip of an actual auto follow trial we did at Stanford. Our runner is holding the phone and small G-Box (about the size of the phone), and the Ghost is filming her with a GoPro3+ Black Edition.

In less than one day after I got the SDK with my Ghost, I was able to implement a simple app that can do speech control for my Ghost. I wish I could tell you how cool it is just as easily as I tell my Ghost to 'Take off!' - Felix W., Developer + Fan

In case you want to define your own way of flying your Ghost, every shipment comes with an extremely easy-to-use yet powerful and versatile software development kit (Ghost SDK). The Ghost SDK allows you to control your Ghost with commands as high level as "take off," "fly to xyz," "loiter" and "land" (and lets Ghost figure out how), or with as low level as setting the spinning speed of the propellers, the inclination of the drone body, or the orientation of the GoPro camera. With the Ghost SDK, you get full control and potential of your Ghost, and even the sky's NOT the limit any more.

Additional funding will let us give you even more great features for your drone. We have already started development, and want you to tell us which ones you want and help us deliver them to you!

Help us offer you more colors. If we reach $150K in funding, we will give our supporters on Indiegogo the chance to vote for their top 5 favorite new colors* to add to our offering. If you want a new color, you will receive it starting Feb 2015. Otherwise, choose black or white for a ship date of Dec 2014-Jan 2015.

*Please note: Colors pictured are just placeholders. We will offer a large selection of colors from which our voters can choose, and narrow it down to the top 5. We will also allow for personal submissions. We want you to choose!

Integrate with waterproof smartwatch to make it hands-free and take it on your adventures.

We have updated our $500K stretch goal to the new TILT MODE. Like nothing you have ever seen, it revolutionizes the way you control the drone by simply tilting your phone! You can use this feature both outdoors and indoors. 

Help us put it in every Ghost, and make it work with iOS (currently works with Android).

"[Co-founder] Xiong highlighted two "breakthrough" features on the Ghost: smartphone-tilt control and an auto-follow mode that's starting to become the norm. The former is very much what it says on the tin: Once the Ghost is in the air, you can rotate and tilt your phone as if you're doing the same to the drone." - Engadget 

Here is a video of our team using the new TILT mode. You asked for more Ghost footage, so here it is. All aerials in this video were shot with Ghost.


This time, you decide!

We've made over $500K in just 3 weeks. Now, help us determine our next stretch goal! Where do you want Ghost to go? What do you want it to do? Vote now and tell us what you want next! https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/FR992S3

 


Travel light with just your phone, and let Auto Mode do the flying, so you can focus on generating the perfect shot. Point your finger on the map, and the drone flies to that spot. No bulky RC controller to carry around. Just your phone and a small G-Box.


Take off, hover, return and land are all pre-programmed for you. The app will alert you when the battery is low. This makes flying easy, so you can focus on getting amazing pictures.


Control the height and orientation of your drone by sliding the bars. Vertical bar controls the altitude. Horizontal bar rotates the drone to swivel the camera around to capture the perfect angle. 


Control the angle of your GoPro to shoot versatile videos. Vertical bar allows you to tilt the camera up toward the sky and down toward the ground. Horizontal bar allows tilting right and left.

For advanced control, use the micro control feature to make more precise adjustments to the drone in any direction. The smart phone screen is great for flying longer distances, but too small for pinpointing exact locations. Use micro control mode to adjust the drone's position in any direction over shorter distances. Slide in the direction you want the drone to move and watch Ghost go. Moving up will make the head of the ghost fly forward (red lights). Moving down will make it fly tail first (blue lights). (In Auto Mode, Ghost flies head first only).


Ghost is compatible with GoPro, including Hero4. A smartphone-app controlled 2D gimbal stabilizes your shot. Ghost is also wind resistant, water-proof, with automatic return if the connection is lost. Night mode has LED lights to track drone in the sky. This makes capturing images in these conditions possible.


You can integrate with a third-party recording monitor to preview your photos and videos as the drone is flying.

We know delays have been a challenge in crowd funding campaigns, and have chosen to launch when we could deliver the product to you. Our manufacturers have been great partners. They have helped us shorten production lead-times for parts, so that we can quickly assemble Ghost once orders are placed. We own our own assembly factories, which helps us execute quickly.

This also allows Ehang to deliver Ghost to you at an amazing price. While it's fun to play with, Ghost is meant for high performance seekers looking for amazing aerial shots. We have worked hard to deliver high quality hardware components and develop user-friendly software technology. 





"We are talking about a geek’s dream come true with a Smartphone operated, quad propeller drone that can be programmed to independently fly from point to point. Eat your heart out NASA!" - Mobile Geeks

"[Co-founder] Xiong highlighted two "breakthrough" features on the Ghost: smartphone-tilt control and an auto-follow mode that's starting to become the norm. The former is very much what it says on the tin: Once the Ghost is in the air, you can rotate and tilt your phone as if you're doing the same to the drone." - Engadget 

"[Ghost] drones makes controlling it as straight-forward and simple as possible through its mobile app." - Slash Gear





We are an international team of flight enthusiasts and adventurers, and founded Ehang to remove the barriers to drone use so everyone could enjoy aerial filming. Drones are traditionally hard to pilot, easy to crash, and expensive. We developed our first product, the Ghost Drone, to address these challenges so you can discover a new way to capture magic around the earth. 

Pre-order your drone to help us generate the volume we need to lower the cost for you and bring you additional features. Vote with your dollars and tell us which features you want us to develop.

Unlike many other drones being advertised, the Ghost Drone will be ready to ship between mid-December and end of January at the latest. With its lower price point and easy-to-use smartphone app, the Ghost Drone will make the perfect gift for first-time users and drone lovers alike.


  • Filmmakers & Photographers
  • Sports Enthusiasts
  • Travelers & Adventurers
  • GoPro owners
  • First time & experienced drone users alike
Here is a photo from our friends at Drone Promotions, who took this amazing aerial of Lake Tahoe before the snowfall. 


Take Ghost anywhere you take your GoPro. Whether it's going on a hike in the mountains, a music festival with friends, a visit to wine country, a pre-work surf, or snowboarding session, Ghost can come with you to record the moment from an incredible perspective. 


Here is a video we shot with Ghost at the Modern Sky Music Festival this year.

Song credit: Lindsey Stirling-Transcendence

Ghost can also film your favorite tourist attraction:


Instructions on how to build your own GHOST：


Note: The latest G-Box does not have an antenna.


We have already successfully developed key features like smartphone control and advanced auto-follow that actually work. Now we want you to help us launch Ghost into the U.S. market and take it to mass production through pre-orders and become an early adopter. There is no need to wait for months, as Ghost will be ready to ship as early as mid-December, just in time for the holidays, but no later than end of January (for black and white colors). The more demand we have, the more we can pass those savings to consumers through special deals, additional accessories and features. Take a look at our stretch goals below.  Help us develop Ghost and give us feedback to make it even better.

PRESS/PARTNERSHIPS: partnerships@ehfly.com

SALES/DISTRIBUTION + MANUFACTURING INQUIRIES: sales@ehfly.com

GENERAL INQUIRIES/CUSTOMERS: support@ehfly.com

TO JOIN BETA TESTER GROUP: beta@ehfly.com

CAREERS: careers@ehfly.com

INVESTING: investors@ehfly.com

While we are relatively new, our engineers have extensive experience in hardware and software, and have been developing Ghost for over a year. Throughout the course of R&D, we have created several generations of Ghost prototypes and have continuously improved functionality based on repeated testing. We are now fine tuning our design for mass production.

We have seen with crowd funding campaigns before us that hiccups might happen, especially in the manufacturing process. To minimize this risk, we have established strong relationships with parts manufacturers. We also own our own factories that are responsible for final assembly and shipping, making this a very smooth, reliable process. We understand that Indiegogo backers want their Ghost drones as soon as possible, but quality control is at the top of the list. Even though we are confident we can deliver before the holidays, there are always unforeseen challenges, or small changes that could cause delays. We have tried to account for these by opening our shipping window through end Jan.

Ghost drone has been repeatedly tested in lab and in real life, but we still expect issues to come up when put into unexpected circumstances and uses, as we push its performance. We will continue to put Ghost drones into the hands of developers, photographers, filmmakers, sports enthusiasts and travelers for real-life testing to make sure we deliver the best version.

With that said, the Ghost team thanks you for your support. We are dedicated to our timeline and will keep you informed on the status of our progress on the first of each month at a minimum, and will send further updates as we have them. We are committed to being transparent and keeping Ghost fans and Indiegogo backers informed. Our major milestones will be ship date, development of iOS, and our stretch goals as stated above.


We want you to share Ghost with your friends, and reward you for spreading the word. We just launched our referral program this week, so let your friends know. Here is what you get:


Instructions: 

See an easy visual guide here: HOW TO PARTICIPATE IN THE REFERRAL PROGRAM

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account.
  2. Click on the referral link under the Ghost video and share with your friends and/or share via the social buttons under the video.
  3. Make sure your friends use your unique referral link when they buy, so you get credit.
  4. You can check your account and see how many referral dollars  you have driven.

Details:

  • If your friends spend a combined total of $500+, you get a free battery.
  • If your friends spend a combined total of $1,000+, you get a free 2D gimbal.
  • If your friends spend a combined total of $2,000+, you get a free drone (without gimbal) in black or white.
  • If your friends spend a combined total of $3,000+, you get a free GoPro Hero4 Silver. 

Rules:

  1. You must be a contributor to the campaign.
  2. You will only get referral credit if you are logged in to Indiegogo, and share your personal referral link. Your friends must use this link to purchase their perk.
  3. You cannot receive more than one prize. Your final prize will be determined by the prize that is closest to your total referral contribution dollars.
  4. You will be able to choose from black or white drones for your free drone.
  5. Your extra battery will ship March 2015.
Extras:
We will announce who is in the lead, as special prizes will be announced to those amazing social butterflies who are the top referrers. Stay tuned!

Company

1.  Where are you located? Do I have to contact China if I have any issues?

We have an office in San Carlos, California, a short drive from Palo Alto and San Francisco. We have a team there that will be able to answer questions and help you if any issues arise. They are native English speakers, so there should be no language barrier.

2.  How long have you been around?

Our team in China has been working on the technology for 2 years, but just released a small Alpha test of Ghost in China this April. This is our first launch and our first introduction to the U.S. We hope you love Ghost!

3.  What are your future plans?

We are super passionate about the way people move around the world, and about flying, so we will continue to push technology in those areas.

4.  Why are you crowd funding?

We are still a small company that used a crowd funding site to do a small beta test an earlier version of Ghost in China. Now, we are doing the same in the U.S. We are hosting this pre-order campaign to test our concept out with the Indiegogo community and reach some early adopters who can be our partners, giving us feedback to make things better and evolve the product with us.

5.  How different are you than other drone companies?

First, we used videos of the Ghost actually flying. It was not shot with other drones or cameras. We actually used our auto-follow mode to film our runner at Stanford. We are ready to ship mid Dec-end Jan.

While we are working out certain features such as finalizing the iPhone app (the hardware part), adding in the secret feature (we are almost done and have already tested it), or adding in social features and integrating wearables (also already underway), we are almost done with the technology.

Second,  while we share the same passion as many of the other companies listed, and are personal friends with a few of them, we are quite different. Since our origins are in flight and model planes and adventure, we take a very technical and personal approach to product development. We want to make superior technical products very easy for the average consumer to use. We will always push the technical side, while keeping the consumer experience in mind. That’s why we were able to get auto-follow to work as the most sophisticated version out there. That is also why we are going to bring you the surprise development we stated in our $700K stretch goal. We wish we could share, and are super excited, but need to make sure we nail down the patent. And that is why we chose to pilot the drone with a smart phone.

Product (General)

1.  How does the technology actually work?

A small G-Box communicates with the phone through Bluetooth, and the G-Box communicates with the Ghost drone through wireless radio. It is all electrical and works with a battery.

2. Auto follow sounds COOL! How does it work?

Ghost captures the GPS enabled on a smartphone/smart watch. Simply press the Auto follow button, and our system does the rest. Currently, follow behind is the default. However, other follow modes are under development. Keep an eye out!

3.  Does Ghost support night filming?

Ghost is visible in the dark, as it is equipped with night mode flashing lights. Red indicates the head and blue the tail, so you always know where Ghost is in the air and how it is oriented. The definition of night shots depends on GoPro definition and ground luminosity.

4.  How does Ghost behave in wind or rain?

Ghost is wind and water resistant. Tests have shown that Ghost is able to fly in winds of up to 21 knot without significant impact on video quality. Ghost is water resistant with fully enclosed electronics. It works fine in light rain, but flying Ghost in heavy rain is going to be a challenge.

5.  How does Ghost handle obstacle avoidance?

The current system requires that you fly Ghost in open areas. The reason is that the avoidance system is not currently in place for the first version. We are working on incorporating the obstacle avoidance function; a system update will be available and rolled out.

Software

1.  What if I don’t have an android?

While we are ready to ship out the Android G-Box, we are still working on the iOS G-Box, which will be shipped in April. If you decide to purchase Ghost now with an Android G-Box, we are happy to ship you the iOS G-Box for an additional $50 (shipping included), which is way below market price.

2.  When is iPhone going to be ready?

The software already works. We are just working on the connection with the G-Box. It should be ready by March 2015.

3. What happens if the phone rings/ Ghost exceeds control range/ the battery runs out/ the GPS connection is lost

If you get a phone call while piloting Ghost, it will keep executing your instructions uninterrupted. Safety features are incorporated when facing failure scenarios. In case Ghost exceeds the control range (0.6 mile) or Radio Frequency connection is lost or broken, Ghost will kick into return mode. It will automatically return to the place of origin and hover at 10 meters waiting for further instruction (landing). If the battery drops to below 10%, you will get a voice alert.

4. What if I don't have cell service? Can I still fly Ghost?

You will need data to download the map of your flying area. For places without cell service, you can always download your map in advance

Hardware

1.  What if I want a color other than black or white?

If we reach our stretch goal of $150K, we will be offering 5 new colors that start being shipped in Feb 2015. If you want one of those, you can elect to have us ship you your done after January. Otherwise, you can receive a black or white one by mid-Dec/end Jan.

2.  What's special about your 2D gimbal? What if I prefer using my own gimbal?

Ghost's 2D gimbal excels at its stability, whether it has camera on or flies no-load.  The 2D gimbal keeps shots extremely steady and the camera pointed the same direction as Ghost banks and turns. It is compatible with all versions of GoPro or camera with similar size, and can also work independently with power supply. There is no need to set up and adjust the parameter. 

You can definitely mount your own gimbal on Ghost out of box. Any type of GoPro-compatible 2D or 3D gimbal would work. No extra software or hardware update needed. We will also be offering different gimbals (including 3D) in the future. 

3. Is it possible to fly Ghost manually using RC controller?

The answer is Yes! Switching from autonomous to manual control is possible. We are developing Ghost customized 8 channel receiver. That being said, Ghost is not compatible with existing RC controllers. The reason for this is that drones are prone to crashes when steered by RC controllers. To enhance steering safety and smooth manual control, we decided to develop proprietary RC controllers.

Customer Service + SHIPPING

1.  What is your return policy/warranty?

We are here to support you as you start flying Ghost. Firstly, we will be launching a how-to video and include a super simple visual manual for you, so that you know what you are doing, and avoid common mistakes.

If you encounter any serious problems or defects, you may contact us in the U.S., and we can assist you. We definitely stand behind our products and want to make sure you have the best experience.

That said, we cannot replace every Ghost that has simply been crashed due to user error, but are here to make sure you avoid that. If you keep it in auto mode and fly in areas high enough to avoid obstacles, you should be all set.

Also, we are always here to listen to your feedback. Call or email us!

2.  Do you ship international?

Yes. We charge $25 for Canada, Mexico, and Puerto Rico. $50 everywhere else. Distributor orders will be coordinated and priced out separately.

3.  What do you charge for shipping?

We charge $25 for shipping in the United States, including Hawaii, Alaska, Puerto Rico, Canada and Mexico.  $50 everywhere else. Distributor orders will be coordinated and priced out separately.

4.  Why is the shipping window mid-Dec to end of Jan?

We wanted to be incredibly careful to not over-promise and disappoint. While we are confident in mid-December, we wanted to set expectations that delays could happen around the holidays and betting on end Jan would be better. If we do better than that, we look forward to surprising you with a holiday treat from Ghost. This is also why we offer gift cards for your loved ones. In case the physical product does not reach them in time, you can take a gift card to them.

5. Am I supposed to manually add shipping?

Yes, you have to add shipping on top of your selected perk before checkout!. Add $25 for shipping within United States, Canada, Mexico or Puerto Rico; or $50 for shipping elsewhere. Instructions are also clarified in Perks.
6. What if I already contributed and forgot to add shipping?

For shipping within United States, Canada, Mexico or Puerto Rico, use the same email address as your other contributions and select perk "I FORGOT SHIPPING $25" using  . For shipping elsewhere, select perk "I FORGOT SHIPPING $50".
story_txt:
Ghost is the world's easiest drone to fly. It is perfect for first-timers and experienced pilots alike.  Help us make drones more accessible to everyone!


With our smartphone app and a GoPro, you can become an aerial filmmaker. Be the star of your adventures!


There is no bulky RC controller to carry around. You also don't need a co-pilot, since control is through one-click commands on your phone. Auto-follow mode keeps the camera on you.





Ghost arrives ready to use and fully assembled.  A small G-Box communicates between
the smartphone and the drone. The 2D gimbal fits a GoPro and keeps your shot stable. No need for a buddy or expensive helicopter. You
can record all of your adventures easily and share them with your
friends. 



We wanted to improve on the auto-follow that exists now. We have made our auto-follow feature work to let you film yourself. This is super fun, as you can use it for action sports, from trail running and biking, to surfing and snow sports. Our auto-follow will continue to film you as you make turns and change direction, always keeping the camera on you. 

Here is a clip of an actual auto follow trial we did at Stanford. Our runner is holding the phone and small G-Box (about the size of the phone), and the Ghost is filming her with a GoPro3+ Black Edition.


In less than one day after I got the SDK with my Ghost, I was able to implement a simple app that can do speech control for my Ghost. I wish I could tell you how cool it is just as easily as I tell my Ghost to 'Take off!' - Felix W., Developer + Fan
In case you want to define your own way of flying your Ghost, every shipment comes with an extremely easy-to-use yet powerful and versatile software development kit (Ghost SDK). The Ghost SDK allows you to control your Ghost with commands as high level as "take off," "fly to xyz," "loiter" and "land" (and lets Ghost figure out how), or with as low level as setting the spinning speed of the propellers, the inclination of the drone body, or the orientation of the GoPro camera. With the Ghost SDK, you get full control and potential of your Ghost, and even the sky's NOT the limit any more.



Additional funding will let us give you even more great features for your drone. We have already started development, and want you to tell us which ones you want and help us deliver them to you!
Help us offer you more colors. If we reach $150K in funding, we will give our supporters on Indiegogo the chance to vote for their top 5 favorite new colors* to add to our offering. If you want a new color, you will receive it starting Feb 2015. Otherwise, choose black or white for a ship date of Dec 2014-Jan 2015.
*Please note: Colors pictured are just placeholders. We will offer a large selection of colors from which our voters can choose, and narrow it down to the top 5. We will also allow for personal submissions. We want you to choose!



Integrate with waterproof smartwatch to make it hands-free and take it on your adventures.



We have updated our $500K stretch goal to the new TILT MODE. Like nothing you have ever seen, it revolutionizes the way you control the drone by simply tilting your phone! You can use this feature both outdoors and indoors. 
Help us put it in every Ghost, and make it work with iOS (currently works with Android).
"[Co-founder] Xiong highlighted two "breakthrough" features on the Ghost: smartphone-tilt control and an auto-follow mode that's starting to become the norm. The former is very much what it says on the tin: Once the Ghost is in the air, you can rotate and tilt your phone as if you're doing the same to the drone." - Engadget 
Here is a video of our team using the new TILT mode. You asked for more Ghost footage, so here it is. All aerials in this video were shot with Ghost.


This time, you decide!
We've made over $500K in just 3 weeks. Now, help us determine our next stretch goal! Where do you want Ghost to go? What do you want it to do? Vote now and tell us what you want next! https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/FR992S3








 
Travel light with just your phone, and let Auto Mode do the flying, so you can focus on generating the perfect shot. Point your finger on the map, and the drone flies to that spot. No bulky RC controller to carry around. Just your phone and a small G-Box.


Take off, hover, return and land are all pre-programmed for you. The app will alert you when the battery is low. This makes flying easy, so you can focus on getting amazing pictures.


Control the height and orientation of your drone by sliding the bars. Vertical bar controls the altitude. Horizontal bar rotates the drone to swivel the camera around to capture the perfect angle. 


Control the angle of your GoPro to shoot versatile videos. Vertical bar allows you to tilt the camera up toward the sky and down toward the ground. Horizontal bar allows tilting right and left.


For advanced control, use the micro control feature to make more precise adjustments to the drone in any direction. The smart phone screen is great for flying longer distances, but too small for pinpointing exact locations. Use micro control mode to adjust the drone's position in any direction over shorter distances. Slide in the direction you want the drone to move and watch Ghost go. Moving up will make the head of the ghost fly forward (red lights). Moving down will make it fly tail first (blue lights). (In Auto Mode, Ghost flies head first only).


Ghost is compatible with GoPro, including Hero4. A smartphone-app controlled 2D gimbal stabilizes your shot. Ghost is also wind resistant, water-proof, with automatic return if the connection is lost. Night mode has LED lights to track drone in the sky. This makes capturing images in these conditions possible.


You can integrate with a third-party recording monitor to preview your photos and videos as the drone is flying.





We know delays have been a challenge in crowd funding campaigns, and have chosen to launch when we could deliver the product to you. Our manufacturers have been great partners. They have helped us shorten production lead-times for parts, so that we can quickly assemble Ghost once orders are placed. We own our own assembly factories, which helps us execute quickly.
This also allows Ehang to deliver Ghost to you at an amazing price. While it's fun to play with, Ghost is meant for high performance seekers looking for amazing aerial shots. We have worked hard to deliver high quality hardware components and develop user-friendly software technology. 











"We are talking about a geek’s dream come true with a Smartphone operated, quad propeller drone that can be programmed to independently fly from point to point. Eat your heart out NASA!" - Mobile Geeks
"[Co-founder] Xiong highlighted two "breakthrough" features on the Ghost: smartphone-tilt control and an auto-follow mode that's starting to become the norm. The former is very much what it says on the tin: Once the Ghost is in the air, you can rotate and tilt your phone as if you're doing the same to the drone." - Engadget 
"[Ghost] drones makes controlling it as straight-forward and simple as possible through its mobile app." - Slash Gear









We are an international team of flight enthusiasts and adventurers, and founded Ehang to remove the barriers to drone use so everyone could enjoy aerial filming. Drones are traditionally hard to pilot, easy to crash, and expensive. We developed our first product, the Ghost Drone, to address these challenges so you can discover a new way to capture magic around the earth. 
Pre-order your drone to help us generate the volume we need to lower the cost for you and bring you additional features. Vote with your dollars and tell us which features you want us to develop.Unlike many other drones being advertised, the Ghost Drone will be ready to ship between mid-December and end of January at the latest. With its lower price point and easy-to-use smartphone app, the Ghost Drone will make the perfect gift for first-time users and drone lovers alike.












Filmmakers & Photographers
Sports Enthusiasts
Travelers & Adventurers
GoPro owners
First time & experienced drone users alike

Here is a photo from our friends at Drone Promotions, who took this amazing aerial of Lake Tahoe before the snowfall. 










Take Ghost anywhere you take your GoPro. Whether it's going on a hike in the mountains, a music festival with friends, a visit to wine country, a pre-work surf, or snowboarding session, Ghost can come with you to record the moment from an incredible perspective. 

Here is a video we shot with Ghost at the Modern Sky Music Festival this year.
Song credit: Lindsey Stirling-Transcendence
Ghost can also film your favorite tourist attraction:

Instructions on how to build your own GHOST：

Note: The latest G-Box does not have an antenna.

















We have already successfully developed key features like smartphone control and advanced auto-follow that actually work. Now we want you to help us launch Ghost into the U.S. market and take it to mass production through pre-orders and become an early adopter. There is no need to wait for months, as Ghost will be ready to ship as early as mid-December, just in time for the holidays, but no later than end of January (for black and white colors). The more demand we have, the more we can pass those savings to consumers through special deals, additional accessories and features. Take a look at our stretch goals below.  Help us develop Ghost and give us feedback to make it even better.


PRESS/PARTNERSHIPS: partnerships@ehfly.com
SALES/DISTRIBUTION + MANUFACTURING INQUIRIES: sales@ehfly.com

GENERAL INQUIRIES/CUSTOMERS: support@ehfly.com
TO JOIN BETA TESTER GROUP: beta@ehfly.com
CAREERS: careers@ehfly.com
INVESTING: investors@ehfly.com




While we are relatively new, our engineers have extensive experience in hardware and software, and have been developing Ghost for over a year. Throughout the course of R&D, we have created several generations of Ghost prototypes and have continuously improved functionality based on repeated testing. We are now fine tuning our design for mass production.
We have seen with crowd funding campaigns before us that
hiccups might happen, especially in the manufacturing process. To minimize this
risk, we have established strong relationships with parts manufacturers. We
also own our own factories that are responsible for final assembly and shipping,
making this a very smooth, reliable process. We understand that Indiegogo backers want their Ghost drones as soon as possible, but quality control
is at the top of the list. Even though we are confident we can deliver before the
holidays, there are always unforeseen challenges, or small changes that could
cause delays. We have tried to account for these by opening our
shipping window through end Jan.
Ghost drone has been repeatedly tested in lab and in real life, but we still expect issues to come up when put into unexpected
circumstances and uses, as we push its performance. We will continue to put
Ghost drones into the hands of developers, photographers, filmmakers, sports
enthusiasts and travelers for real-life testing to make sure we deliver the
best version. 
With that said, the Ghost team thanks you for your support. We
are dedicated to our timeline and will keep you informed on the status of our
progress on the first of each month at a minimum, and will send further updates
as we have them. We are committed to being transparent and keeping Ghost fans
and Indiegogo backers informed. Our major milestones will be ship date,
development of iOS, and our stretch goals as stated above.




We want you to share Ghost with your friends, and reward you for spreading the word. We just launched our referral program this week, so let your friends know. Here is what you get:


Instructions: 
See an easy visual guide here: HOW TO PARTICIPATE IN THE REFERRAL PROGRAM



Log into your Indiegogo account.


Click on the referral link under the Ghost video and share with your friends and/or share via the social buttons under the video.


Make sure your friends use your unique referral link when they buy, so you get credit.


You can check your account and see how many referral dollars  you have driven.


Details:



If your friends spend a combined total of $500+, you get a free battery.


If your friends spend a combined total of $1,000+, you get a free 2D gimbal.


If your friends spend a combined total of $2,000+, you get a free drone (without gimbal) in black or white.


If your friends spend a combined total of $3,000+, you get a free GoPro Hero4 Silver. 


Rules:



You must be a contributor to the campaign.


You will only get referral credit if you are logged in to Indiegogo, and share your personal referral link. Your friends must use this link to purchase their perk.


You cannot receive more than one prize. Your final prize will be determined by the prize that is closest to your total referral contribution dollars.


You will be able to choose from black or white drones for your free drone.

Your extra battery will ship March 2015.


Extras:We will announce who is in the lead, as special prizes will be announced to those amazing social butterflies who are the top referrers. Stay tuned!

We have an office in San Carlos, California, a short drive from

questions and help you if any issues arise. They are native English speakers,
